name: Beautiful Kreuzberg studio/WiFi (reg. pend.)
space: - beautiful studio apt in downtown Berlin - bright, scenic view on river - swans and boats pass by - 3 min to walk to subway station Kottbusser Tor - full size loft bed (sleeps 2), comfortable sleeper-couch  - sheets and towels provided - shower bathroom, maisonette kitchen w. fridge, stove and coffee maker - close to everything; lots of nightlife; coffee shops and restaurants abound - WiFi (16MB), stereo, tv About the location:   Kreuzberg is a Bohemian part of town, similar to the East Village in NYC. It's very colorful and you will meet people from all around the globe just stepping out the door. Maybachufer is one of the most sought after locations in Kreuzberg since it has a scenic view on a river (Landwehrkanal).  The area is a shopping paradise, you'll find anything from brand new to used to vintage at your fingertips. There is also a huge fruit market (all about half price compared to a supermarket) held twice a week and a flea market held once a week.

name: Design Jewel in the midst of MITTE!
summary: Welcome to my nice little apartment I am renting as a superhost since 2011. I just entirely renewed the decoration, I am sure you'll love it! It is situated in the very heart of the heart of this facinating city! As your neighbor, I will be able to answer personally any wishes or questions! See u soon! Stéphanie
space: Hackescher Markt: The "place to be" in Berlin!  NEW DESIGN 2019!!! I entirely renewed the decoration of my cosy apartment, sure you will love it! Very nice, full furnished designer apartment in the heart of Berlin MITTE, between Alexanderplatz and the well-known Hackesche Höfe, in the "WEINMEISTERSTRAßE".  MORE MITTE IS IMPOSSIBLE! ;-) The Hackeschen Höfe, the Alexanderplatz, the Museum Island and Unter den Linden within walking distance!! The flat is 35 sqm and is part of a 150 sqm private loft but separated from it (it will be yours). It is a so called "Altbau", that means an old Berlin house (see picture of the building front), with a garden for joint use (see picture).  DESCRIPTION A modern design small bathroom with design mosaic flags and a wide shower with massage shower, floor heating. A nice bedroom with a bed for two persons and a garderobe. A modern kitchen access with everything you need, as well as dishwasher and washing machine (built-in appliances) with a bar table and c

Hello! I'm french, 40 years old and live in Berlin with my German husband, my daughter, who is 9 years old, my son, 7 years old, my second daughter, 3 years old and my baby boy, 5 months old! I would be glad to welcome you soon in the midst of Berlin Mitte, one of the most wanted area of the German capital!

Stéphanie

name: Studio-apt Kreuzberg: central/cozy
space: This apartment is 38 square meter big and it has everything that one needs to be to comfortable. A double bed (1,40x2,00), a simple equipped kitchen, a bath with shower and a whole ton of charm. You rent the whole apartment.  The dwelling lies in the area Kreuzberg, with its innumerable cafes, bars and designer shops, all conveniently within strolling distance. Kreuzberg lies very central actually. Three subway stations (Kottbusser Tor, Goerlitzer Bahnhof, Schoenleinstrasse) in walking distance serve the lines U8 (north/south) and U1 (east/west). So reaching other interesting areas (for example Friedrichshain in 5 min., Prenzlauer Berg in 18 min.) or well-known places (for example Alexanderplatz in 6 min., Potsdamer Platz in 11 min.) from here is fast and uncomplicated. Directly at the next junction is a bacery as well as an excellent organic supermarket which has all the green products one may require. The next grocery discounter is just five minutes away.  Enjoy peaceful sundays stro

host_about:
We like design, architecture and furnitures and after all we're a gatherer. And of course we like meeting people from all over the world.

Over time our own place was getting more and more crowded with flea market finds and design classics. So renting apartments seemed to be a good idea to get more space and to combine our interests...

If you are kind, respectful to my property and to the tenants privacy (no parties!) we're more than happy to welcome you in one of our two apartments and give you individual recommendations!

name: Hot Spot Berlin-Mitte apartment!
space: Charming and sunny apartment located in Berlin-Mitte, between Kastanienallee and Weinbergspark. Right in the middle but still quite quiet. Restaurants, cafés and bars are just a footprint away. The apartment has a bedroom with kingsize boxspring bed (160 x 200 cm), a living room with a fully equipped american kitchen (including fridge, espresso machine, dishes etc.) and a tiled bathroom with bathtub. The nice balcony is heading south, perfect to relax, have dinner or just to enjoy the sunset. The appartment is fully furnished (with LCD-TV, washing machine, dish washer, heating, oven...) It’s perfect for a couple, but also for a single or two friends. The size is approx. about 60 qm in size and it’s on the 3rd floor with a lift.  Tram, bus and U-bahn (tube / subway) (station: Rosenthaler Platz U8) stops are just a few minutes walk away. Wireless internet is also available. Towels and linen are provided, of course.

name: Charming Room in a beautiful flat
summary: The Flat is located on the 3rd floor in a typical old Berlin Townhouse in the area called Kreuzberg/Neukölln, a lively area with a lot of small bars, cafes, artgallerys and shopping opportunities. Even so it´s located in a lively area the flat itself has a relaxed and tranquil atmosphere.
space: The Flat is located on the 3rd floor in a typical old Berlin Townhouse in the area called Kreuzberg/Neukölln, a lively area with a lot of small bars, cafes, artgallerys and shopping opportunities. The apartment is bright and sunny, furnished and decorated with lots of love and care and has a tranquil atmosphere to it.The room has a real double size Bed, a tv, a small wardrobe and a sideboard for clothing, a tree in front of the windows and a hundred years old japanese painting of the fuji above the bed. You are welcome to use the kitchen and the Washingmaschine. W-Lan, Blankets, Pillows and Towels are there for you. In generally the atmosphere in the whole house is pretty special, since almost all of the neighbours know and like each other and we do enjoy our little chat´s meting at the staircase, doors or streetcorners. The metro stations Hermannplatz/Schönleinstrassse (U7, U8) are a 5 minute walk.

name: Cosy room in Mitte / Rosenthaler Platz
summary: Perfect location to explore the center of Berlin! The well-equipped apartment offers a living room with a balcony and a view on the tower of Alexanderplatz, a kitchen, a bathroom with a bath tub to relax after a long day in the city and a room (10m²) with a bed for two to enjoy the night. For all the cat lovers there's free cuddling time with my two cats on top :)
space: My beautiful DDR Plattenbau appartment is located between Rosenthaler Platz and Hackescher Markt in the heart of the Berlin district Mitte. The appartment has a sunnysided balcony with a beautiful view to green graveyard at the opposite site of the street and you can also see the TV tower. The way to U 8 Rosenthaler Platz is 2 minutes, to S-Bahn station Hackescher Markt it is 6 minutes far away. Total sqm of the flat is 57, Living room, bathroom and kitchen can be used as well. The rented room is 9,5 sqm and has a bed (1,40 m width), a shelf and a rack. Smoking on the balcony is possible. I will be at work at least from 9 am to 6.30 pm as I am working in a PR agency. Bedlinen and towels are provided.

name: Room vibrant but cozy Schoeneberg
summary: The room is located  5 minutes from the subway station Nollendorfplatz. It is very central, sunny. Restaurants, cafes and bars also nearby. WLAN included in the price.
space: Welcome to my apartment in the lively but cozy Schöneberg near the subway station Nollendorfplatz. I offer a 25 square meters large room with a comfortable double bed for 2 persons. The room is quiet and sunny, and also has two drawers for your clothes. The 3-room apartment is located on the 6th floor with elevator. The kitchen is fully equipped (including dishwasher, coffee maker and kettle) and can be shared. The bathroom is also shared and has a bath with shower. Wireless Internet is included. Towels and linen are provided. The room is 5 minutes from the subway station Nollendorfplatz and therefore very central. In a few minutes you are on Kurfürstendamm or Potsdamer Platz. In the immediate neighborhood there are several small shops, cafes and restaurants. Right on the corner is an organic supermarket. In Maaßenstraße there are numerous bars and snack bars. On Winterfeldtplatz you find a nice farmer's market. It's just fun to walk here and enjoy the many street cafes. I look forward

name: Central & Homelike Apartment
summary: Great place in one of the best neighborhoods in Berlin. Very central with Kastanienallee, Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt and Friedrichstraße very close by. Perfect to discover Berlin or to just enjoy one of the most exciting areas of the city.
space: The apartment is on the first floor right in front of the beautiful Arkonaplatz, a quiet park with a famous flea market on sundays. There is one living/sleeping room with a big bed (150x200), a couch, desk and W-Lan. The window faces the quiet & green Arkonaplatz. There is a full equipped kitchen with a table for up to 3 persons and a washing machine, as well as a bathroom with a big shower. The apartment is very central, it's located right next to the Mauerpark (a big park with the best flea market in Berlin on sundays) and the Kastanienallee (a very famous & trendy area with a lot of cafès, bars & boutiques). Brunnenstraße is very close as well with a lot of gallerys of young artists. You can reach Alexanderplatz with the U-Bahn in 5 minutes, the next supermarkt is 100 metres. Please respect that it's a non-smoker apartment. The apartment has available: Full equipped kitchen (without coffee machine) Fast wireless internet connection

name: X-Berg: central, quiet, bright, cosy and large
summary: In the heart of Kreuzberg, two minutes from the international, multi-cultural hustle and bustle of the famous Oranienstrasse, the room is located very quiet at the end of a large apartment with a view over a typical, historic Berlin commercial courtyard (and a chestnut tree). In the neighborhood there is a little farm, so that one may wake up in the morning by the crowing of the rooster. The guests (there is a second guest room) have their own newly renovated large bathroom.
space: The guest room is 25-m2 in size and is located on a 150-m2 large apartment opposite the guest bathroom. It has a 1.80 m wide bed with new mattress, wardrobe, sofa and a dining table with chairs. It is also equipped with a microwave, a coffee maker, kettle, crockery, coffee, tea, and a small refrigerator, so that you prepare your own meals/breakfast if you want (I don't serve breakfast! :) ) The flat (where the rental room is located) is in a very peaceful neighbourhood, and in the morning guests might even be awakened by a real cock crowing since there is a farm very nearby. Although this is an idyllic setting, the accommodation is actually very close to the authentic Berlin district of Kreuzberg, which is home to the famous street “Oranienstraße” with its numerous bars, restaurants, small terraces and international cuisine. In just a short stroll visitors can reach the famous bars „Sage-Club“, „Kater Holzig“, "SO36", "Berghain" (20 min walk) and more.

name: STUDIO NEAR KASTANIENALLE
summary: This high taste furnished apartment is located on Fehrbelliner strasse at the borders of Mitte with Prenzlauerberg. It is located 100 meters from Kastanienallee, 100 meters from Zionskircheplatz and Torsstrasse and a few minutes walk from Kollwitzplatz and Hackeschen Markt. The perfect location it combines business or shopping activities during daytime and a superb nightlife due to the cafes,bars,bistro's and restaurants of the area.
space: THE APARTMENT Τhis bright 3rd floor apartment is fully furnished and can accommodate up to four people. In the main room there is a queen size bed (1.60x2.00) and a sofa-bed that can sleep one person. There's also ADSL,TV,DVD and IPOD/RADIO dock. The second room is the dinning one with a table and 4 chairs which includes the kitchen.There is also a sofa-bed that sleeps one person. The kitchen is fully equipped.

name: Wonderful room  around Bergmannkiez
summary: Berlin room 18 sqm. Sunny with floorboards and stucco. Double bed 140x200 meters. Wi-Fi and a work desk. Large eat-in kitchen. 6 min> U7 Gneisenaustr. 15 min> Tempelhof Field and Victoria Park. Market Hall, organic supermarket cafes nearby.
space: Bed linen and towels are freshly washed available. The room has two large well designed windows. Every morning the sun shines into the room. If I am not there, it might be that friends or guests inhabit the other room. The old wood planks is a bright dream, combined with a beautiful Persian carpet. The bed is a very comfortable. There is a wooden desk and chair. A hanging rail, shelves and an antique dresser give the room the vitality. My kitchen is the central place in the apartment and is dominated by an old pine table. There is plenty of room to relax and cook in the kitchen. We are practically in the center of Berlin, and around the corner is a police station, which makes the place very safe. Two subway lines U6 "Platz der Luftbrücke"   and U7 "Gneisenaustrasse" are easy to reach in about 5 minutes walk. The old market hall in the immediate vicinity, is a melting pot of cultures and can provide you with delicacies from around the world. There is also several organic shops close by
description: Berlin room 18 sqm. Sunny with floorboards and stucco. Double bed 140x200 meters. Wi-Fi and a work desk. Large eat-in kitchen. 6 min> U7 Gneisenaustr. 15 min> Tempelhof Field and Victoria Park. Market Hall, organic supermarket cafes nearby. Bed linen and towels are freshly washed available. The room has two large well designed windows. Every morning the sun shines into the room. If I am not there, it might be that friends or guests inhabit the other room. The old wood planks is a bright dream, combined with a beautiful Persian carpet. The bed is a very comfortable. There is a wooden desk and chair. A hanging rail, shelves and an antique dresser give the room the vitality. My kitchen is the central place in the apartment and is dominated by an old pine table. There is plenty of room to relax and cook in the kitchen. We are practically in the center of Berlin, and around the corner is a police station, which makes the place very safe. name: Gemütliches Apartment mit Vogelzwitschern
summary: Das Apartment liegt in Kreuzberg, einem sehr lebendigem, jungen Stadtviertel. Die Unterkunft ist ruhig und idyllisch gelegen, die zum Teil antiken Möbel sorgen für Flair und Gemütlichkeit. In dem begrünten Innenhof zwitschern morgens die Vögel. Man vergisst fast in einer Großstadt zu sein.
space: In bester Lage Tauchen Sie ein in ein lebendiges Berlin mit seinem typischen Flair und genießen Sie mitten im pulsierenden Kreuzberg ein stilvolles Zuhause auf Zeit direkt an der Spree. Das ruhig gelegene Appartement in einer ehemaligen Marmeladenfabrik wurde im Januar (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) mit Liebe und sicherem Gespür für schönes Interieur eingerichtet. Entspannte Strandbars, szenige Clubs und gute Restaurants liegen um die Ecke.  Unzählige echt Berliner Kneipen haben die ganze Nacht offen und für den Appetit zwischendurch gibt es Imbissbuden mit Döner, Pizza und hausgemachten Burgern erster Qualität. Fünf Minuten sind es bis zum Künstlerhaus Betanien, zehn Minuten bis zum „Badeschiff“, einem Schwimmbad mit auf der Spree schwimmendem Ponton, von dem aus Sie große vorbeifahrende Schiffe bewundern können. Schnell hin und weg Die Verkehrsanbindung ist perfekt. Sie haben 300 m bis zur U-Bahn, 800 m bis zur S-Bahn und erreichen in kürzester Zeit alle kulturellen Highlights und Z
description: Das Apartment liegt in Kreuzberg, einem sehr lebendigem, jungen Stadtviertel. Man vergisst fast in einer Großstadt zu sein.
host_about:
Ich bin freischaffende Künstlerin und habe 2 Kinder, 14 und 16 Jahre alt. 
Wenn Ihr in Berlin einen schönen Aufenthalt verleben möchtet, seid Ihr bei mir genau richtig!
Ich wohne gleich nebenan und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite. 
Wir freuen uns über nette Gäste, die unser Leben mit neuen Anregungen bereichern!

name: Berlin-Mitte: Modern design, breakfast & balcony!
summary: “Are you a breakfast person? Do you want to enjoy a sophisticated modern ambience while staying in the very centre of Berlin? Ready for some insider tips?”
space: Easily accessible from both local airports, this premium accommodation is a little oasis amidst the bustling city: ultra-quiet, non-smoking and pet-free! Located in a renovated historic building with an elevator, your guest room is situated over the quiet inner courtyard. It has a queen-size bed (160 x 200 cm), private balcony, free Wi-Fi, a desk, lounge chair, flat-screen TV, DAB+ radio. The room is cleaned daily.
description: “Are you a breakfast person? Do you want to enjoy a sophisticated modern ambience while staying in the very centre of Berlin? Ready for some insider tips?” Easily accessible from both local airports, this premium accommodation is a little oasis amidst the bustling city: ultra-quiet, non-smoking and pet-free! Located in a renovated historic building with an elevator, your guest room is situated over the quiet inner courtyard. It has a queen-size bed (160 x 200 cm), private balcony, free Wi-Fi, a desk, lounge chair, flat-screen TV, DAB+ radio. The room is cleaned daily. The self-service breakfast includes German specialities, as well as cereals, juice and fresh fruit. An ultra-modern coffee machine is also at your disposal. Help yourself to all you can eat! The apartment has a modern bathroom and a streamlined kitchen, which guests share with their host Alexander. He has been operating this B&B in his spare time since 2003. Alexander, who knows Berlin intimately, loves to assist traveler
host_about: I am offering one room of my home in Berlin to travelers, who want to experience authentic German hospitality. Staying with me, you will get a lot more than just a key: I love sharing my very personal knowledge of must-see sights as well as less known places in Berlin and beyond. Let me inspire you!

host_about:
Ich freue mich darauf Euch in meiner Wohnung zu begrüßen. Bei Fragen könnt ihr Euch immer gerne an mich wenden.
Gregor "Marvel" (Designer und Künstler)
zog 1991 aus Frankfurt / Main in den frischen Bereich Ost-Berlins/Mitte und arbeitete seitdem als Kostüm- Bühnenbildner und Grafiker für viele Museumsausstellungen, Musikvideos, Performer und Fashionlabels. Er studierte Interieur und Grafik Design.
Da er nicht ohne Musik leben kann, ist alles was er in den jeweiligen bereichen erschafft, immer von und mit Musik entstanden.
Seit 2003 leitet er die FriendlySociety, eine Galerie-Fashion-Design-Salon mit zwei Musiksalonabenden im Monat und seiner eigene Designlinie. Im Moment ist er durch seine neuesten Kreation, dem Berliner Dirndl in der Presse sehr bekannt. Sein nächsten Projekte ist eine BarrockFashionOperaShow im Frühling, eine neue Modeedition, eine Design-Onlineshop sowie eine Modenschau im September in NYC... das wird bestimmt sehr aufregend :-)

name: Central, bright & charming in Mitte
space: The apartment is approx. 40 sqm with a small hall, a bathroom, a seperate toilette and a big room with sleeping area, living area and kitchenette. You rent the complete apartment. The room has really high ceilings (4m), with its glassy door and the two big windows it's very bright. There's a kingsize bed (1,60x2,00) on the one side of the room and a big wooden table with two chairs in the middle. On the other side of the room is a kitchenette with a fridge and two cooking plates. The kitchenette is simple equiped with pans, dishes and cutlery. There's bathroom and a separate toilette. The apartment is on the ground floor of an old building. Most of the tenants are living there for a lot of years, some of them lived there already before the fall of the wall (it's the former eastern part of the city). Actually this location is very central. It's in the area "Mitte", close to restaurants, bars, galleries, shops, fleamarkets and public transport facilities (subway U6, Schwartzkopffstrasse;

host_about:
We like design, architecture and furnitures and after all we're a gatherer. And of course we like meeting people from all over the world.

Over time our own place was getting more and more crowded with flea market finds and design classics. So renting apartments seemed to be a good idea to get more space and to combine our interests...

If you are kind, respectful to my property and to the tenants privacy (no parties!) we're more than happy to welcome you in one of our two apartments and give you individual recommendations!

name: Cozy & Bright Kreuzberg Studio Apt.
summary: A bright oasis with modern amenities in an "old-Berlin" building and neighborhood. If you want to live in a prime central location, in an environment that is as perfect for work as it is for relaxation, look no further than this gem!
space: This small (40sqm/400sqft) studio apartment gets lots of natural light, and is located in one of Berlin's top neighborhoods (or "Kietz", as it's called here), smack in the middle of over a dozen bars and restaurants, close to the famous Urbanhafen and Admiralbrücke. A perfect bachelor(ette) pad, or an intimate and stylish oasis/hide-out for a couple! The apartment is on the 3rd floor facing the courtyard area, and is in Berlin's much loved Kreuzberg district. This notoriously lively neighborhood used to be an almost entirely Turkish part of town, and still gets its festive, friendly and passionate flair from a strong and proud Turkish community. The many markets and fresh food, all within walking distance of this apartment, are a constant source of wonder and "entertainment" in the most natural sense. The place is for no more than two people, either close friends (the main couch is also a perfect bed for one person under 6'3"), or a couple, unless you aren't afraid of sharing close qua

host_about: Citizen of the World, born in Germany and emigrated to the USA at 16, now travel and work between California and Germany. My friends would describe me as kind and helpful, looking for sub-letters who are respectful of neighbours and want to bring a good attitude to this great neighbourhood and Berlin as a whole.

Bed and desk. 6 min> U7 Gneisenaustr. 15 min> Tempelhof Field and Victoria Park Market Hall, organic supermarket cafes nearby. Bed linen and towels are freshly laundered there. The hall from a classic old building, warm and sunny with large stucco and old wood planks. The studio room is 36 square meters. It has a real bed for 2 people and plenty of space for creative people. If Kay is not there. It may be that friends inhabit the other room or guest. My kitchen is the central place and is dominated by an old pine table. There is plenty of room to relax and cook in the kitchen. We are practically in the center of Berlin, around the corner, the police are very safe. Two subway line U6 Platz der Airlift  U7 & Gneisenaustr. are easily reached in about 5 minutes. The old market hall in the immediate vicinity, is a melting pot of cultures and we can provide you with delicacies from around the worl
host_about:
My love is music, dance, Hawaii, Australia, yoga, nature, kids and animals and happy helthy food.
I am self-employed. 
Aloha Kay

Aloha Kay

name: LOVELY ROOM IN OUR FLAT IN XBERG 36
summary: We, a film maker and a stage designer are currently renting a bedroom  in our shared appartment. Two little tigers are also living with us as well as we have some bees on our balcony because Mira, the film maker uses to be a bee keeper and loves to film bees.....
space: We, a film maker, a stage designer (and two cats) are currently renting a bedroom  in our shared appartment.  It´s a typical old building with its lovely chacteristics: wooden floors, high ceilings with moulding, double wing doors... in the heart of Kreuzberg.  The room faces to Lausitzerstraße, which is a more quiet side road of Wiener Straße. you don´t need to take your towels with you: you might get some from us.    WLAN connection is also provided. For further questions please feel free to ask!

name: Small Apartment in Berlin-Center
summary: In my cool Mitte-district apartment i can host two people. The apartment is close to all main sights and still has a quiet and green neighborhood. Parks and the Spree river are within walking distance.
space: This small Apartment is situated right in the center of Berlin.  Alexanderplatz and Brandenburg gate are not far away and the subway (U8, station: Heinrich-Heine-Straße) will bring you to your desired destination in Berlin.  Via www. bvg .de you can plan your routes through Berlin and also see the costs. There are many attractions and sights nearby. If you like to party, Berlin is the right place to be and some of the most famous clubs are within walking (but not hearing) distance. You can also chill in one of the parks arround the house. While you're enjoying the convenience of the central location of the apartment you will also notice the quietness within the bedroom.  Right behind the building is a small green park protecting the beedroom from street noice.  The apartment is equipped for nearly everything you can imagine. looking forward to hear from you Martin

name: Live like a Berliner in the city
space: Live like a Berliner in Schöneberg, the heart of city-West and 10 min. to walk to KaDeWe (Kaufhaus des Westens), the very famous store in Berlin and near to Kudamm. We offer you a very big (25 sqm) and bright room in our nice and cozy 100 sqm apartment with a beautyful balcony, and a separate guest-WC. - full furnished kitchen ( fridges,oven,kitchenware...) - free flat rate 100 Mb wireless internet connection - free flat-rate thelphone calls( within Germany) - towels - washing machine + dishwasher The area is the most interesting in Berlin with a lot of shops, Bars, nice restaurants, a big Park area ( Tiergarten). The apartment is 3 min. from U-Bahn Nollendorfplatz.  The flat is very quite, no loud noise! We are really friendly people and be glad to share our flat with people from abroad or traveling to Berlin. We will be happy to advise you about the best activities in the town and help you having a great time in the fun capital of Europe.

name: Rosenthaler Platz 60qm Loft Flat
summary: Nice, quiet and cosy flat in the best Mitte area with wifi, separate kitchen, big bathroom with washing machine and big bed (200cm x 140cm).
space: I'd like to welcome you to my cozy & calm apartment right in the middle of groovy and lively Mitte! The apartment is located right in the middle of one of the most exciting streets of Mitte/ Scheunenviertel with a wide range of restaurants, bars and clubs around the corner ... you couldn't live closer to such a vibrant and exciting area! No matter what day of the year, you always find something new just outside the apartment: an art installation, some new art gallery popping up, a small a cappella group singing in the courtyard or just a demonstration passing by! There is a variety of really nice restaurants and cafes to enjoy a nice drink, sitting in the sun and watching the interesting people passing by. Just around the corner of the apartment is the cafe "Oberholz" with one of the best coffee & panini in town. Around the corner you'll find also the best Sushi in Town the "DUDU" and the Rosenthaler Str. "Transit" Vietnamese Restaurant...really one of the best! However, if you fancy a

name: Room with Panorama View in Midtown
summary: Großes, helles Zimmer mit Aussicht auf den Fernsehturm in zentraler Lage. Nähe Alexanderplatz, Nikolaiviertel, Museumsinsel. Perfekte Verkehrsanbindung in alle Richtungen.
space: I am renting out a room on the top floor, ca. 26 m2, with double bed, mini kitchen, fridge, free Wifi. There is a guest toilet with washing machine, lavatory and sink. Bath tub and shower are shared. Towels and bed linen are provided for free.
description: I am renting out a room on the top floor, ca. 26 m2, with double bed, mini kitchen, fridge, free Wifi. There is a guest toilet with washing machine, lavatory and sink. Bath tub and shower are shared. Towels and bed linen are provided for free. I rent out the room plus bathroom. The rest of the flat is not for common use. I am happy to give any information needed. I respect my guests' privacy and ask them to kindly respect mine. The room is located near the river Spree, in the very heart of Berlin. In walking distance you can reach to the north – Alexanderplatz and Hacke’scher Markt, to the south – Kreuzberg with Oranienstraße, Prinzessinnengärten, Prinzenbad, to the east – Berlin night life with Sage Club, Kater Holtzig, Tresor, Maria am Ostbahnhof etc. and to the west – river Spree, Berlin’s historical harbour, die Museumsinsel, Fischerinsel, Märkisches Viertel and Nikolaiviertel. Public transport: U-Bahn and S-Bahn in north-south axis to Prenzlauer Berg and Neukölln, in east-west axi
host_about: Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus aller Welt und bin Ihnen bei allen weiteren Fragen gern behilflich!

name: Bright, well equipped and central
space: Facilities The living room comes with a laptop (Mac) including internet and a large TV with satellite connection. The kitchen is equipped with washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, coffee machine, toaster, kettle and the usual equipment. There are also some cooking and refreshment amenities like oil, vinegar, spices, tea and coffee available at your disposal. The bathroom is equipped with bathtub, hair dryer and towels. This apartment is a non-smoking apartment. Location Centrally located in the very heart of Berlin, your vacation getaway has the best of both worlds. Ideally situated on a quiet street in the city’s popular Mitte district, your apartment is just a stone’s throw from Kreuzberg — Berlin’s bustling cultural hub. Right in front of the building is an idyllic church (Michaelkirche) and next to it is a beautiful small park with a pond (Engelbecken). There, you can enjoy a drink at the charming Café am Engelbecken while gazing out over water or, in the winter

space: Lovely, fully furnished, light, 30m2, studio apartment, available for rent with HI SPEED WIFI. This is a great jumping off point for a single person or couple in Berlin. All the comforts of home in the Graefekiez, Kreuzberg, located between Hasenheide and Planufer. A central location in a quiet street. name: Sunny Kreuzberg Studio by the Water
space: Beautifully designed furnished apartment, situated along beautiful, treelined canal in one of berlin's most desired and trendy, lively, relaxed and artistic districts called Kreuzberg. The very quiet, peaceful and sunny apartment is . Many restaurants and Cafes are close-by. One of Berlin's most famous outdoor markets, the Turkish Market, takes place every Tuesday and Friday along the other side of the canal. A boat station is very close by from where you can discover Berlin from the water. The approx. 35 square meter apartment on the 4th floor has a balcony facing south, and has access to a communal rooftop terrace with views over Berlin. It has a fully equipped kitchen, a shower, internet, towels, soap and fresh bed linens are supplied. We have used natural, organic, high quality materials as much as possible. All products (soap, tea, coffee, cleaners, etc.) are also organic. Ideal for one person or a couple. - NO SMOKING - There are two subway lines within a short walking distance.

name: J.Roth Boutique Apartement Berlin
summary: Newly renovated to the highest standard and fitted with designer furniture and a soothing color palette, this studio apartment offers a stylish and comfortable base for 2 people. Perfectly located in Schöneberg.
space: Newly renovated to the highest standard and fitted with designer furniture and a rich colour palette, this studio apartment offers a stylish and comfortable Berlin base for 2 people. A luxurious daybed with loads of cushions transforms into a comfortable double bed (down pillows and blankets) at night and provides, together with a large sofa and coffee table, enough space to relax in style. A semi-open plan modern kitchen, fully equipped with oven/microwave, dishwasher, full-size fridge  and breakfast bar provides everything you need to have breakfast or even prepare a small meal. A luxuriously renovated bathroom with open-plan shower (rain shower) is completely bespoke & of highest standard. Clever space planning make this apartment seem bigger as it is and with loads of storage, Wifi Internet, flatscreen TV, iPod docking station as well as a washing machine this is an ideal base also for a longer stay. This smart and cozy apartment is located in Berlin’s beautiful Schöneberg neighbor

name: Bright room with a huge bed in a trendy area
summary: My place is in Berlin's trendy area, close to the canal, Hasenheide park, M41 bus stop (1 minute walk), U7 Metro stop (6 minutes walk). You will reach Potsdamer Platz in approx. 18 minutes by bus. Plenty of restaurants, cafes and trendy bars around. You’ll love the room, because it's bright and quiet.
description: My place is in Berlin's trendy area, close to the canal, Hasenheide park, M41 bus stop (1 minute walk), U7 Metro stop (6 minutes walk). You will reach Potsdamer Platz in approx. 18 minutes by bus. Plenty of restaurants, cafes and trendy bars around. You’ll love the room, because it's bright and quiet. You can use the kitchen and bathroom. I'm always glad to help guests and advice about the nice restaurants and bars around, also how to get around with public transport and so on. Kreuzberg is a hip and trendy area of Berlin. My place is surrounded by restaurants, some bars, however it is super safe and you don't have to worry to get back at night! I feel very safe here. There are also a lot of families living around, many playgrounds, a park just 10 minutes away. A bus stop a minute away from my house and a metro stop 7 minutes away.

name: Stylish, quite studio, Kreuzkölln
space: This is a charming and quite studio apartement in a typical old berlin apartement building. 4th floor with elevator, well equipped. The location next to Hermannplatz is in the center of "Kreuzkölln", the presently hippest place to be in town. The border district between Kreuzberg and Neukölln is a  lively and vibrating neighbourhood. Students and creative people are mixing with immigrants from all countries. Bars, restaurants, shops and other peculiar things are popping up every day. Hermannplatz provides perfect traffic connections with two underground lines and various bus lines. All kind of supply is just next to your door.  The flat has just been renovated completely. It has got a living/sleeping room with an ample bed, a little kitchen with room to sit for two people and a bathroom with shower. Living space measures about 36 qm (387 sqft). The windows point towards south-west, letting in lots of sun (if there is). Outside is a schoolyard with trees. So while beeing central the fla

name: Room in Neukölln/Kreuzberg + Bike
space: A quite double room in Neukölln/Kreuzberg - The most amazing and trendy neighborhood in Berlin - close to the center. DESCRIPTION- The 65 sqm flat is on the 3rd floor, and it receives enough sunshine through the window throughout the day. - Fully equipped kitchen with all modcons, utensils, dishes, pots and pans. - Wireless internet (WiFi) - Washing Machine with detergent - Towels and Linens - Hair Dryer I will gladly help you with any questions, suggestions, or translations :-) - BICYCLE for you to use free of charge (normally at least 7 euro / day to rent from a bike-rental company) to tour the very bike-friendly streets. Save some money on transportation and see more of the city! (The bike is an extra feature and it is not guaranteed to be in perfect condition.) -THE NEIGHBORHOOD- The Kreuzberg neighborhood is legendary. It is a multicultural landscape that has attracted many great icons throughout the past few decades. David Bowie, Iggy Pop, and Nick Cave all called Kreuzberg home

host_about:
I come from Slovakia and I'm 33 years old. I studied economies in Prague and Berlin, where I have lived since 2003. At the moment I work in a young internet company. I have lived in my present flat since 2007 and I really love its slight historical touch.
I like to spend my leisure time meeting friends, doing sports or relaxing after a long day at work. I also love travelling to foreign countries and visiting my friends all around Europe.
I want your stay to be as comfortable as possible so you can relax and experience the special culture and unique atmosphere of Berlin.
I look forward to hearing from you! Stefan

name: BERLIN MITTE

host_about: I´m an architect, born in Peru, grown up in Bonn and Hannover (Germany) and studied in Potsdam near Berlin. I work since 1999 as an architect in Berlin and also one year in Madrid. I love traveling and I used a lot of times airbnb. I had a lot of good experiences with traveling with airbnb to Israel, Spain, France and Ukraine and also enjoy to host people from all over the world and give them the opportunity to stay in the center of the center of Berlin. I´m looking forward to your stay in my home.

name: Beautiful room with great view in perfect location
summary: Das schön möblierte Zimmer befindet sich im obersten (7.) Stock direkt am Paul-Lincke Ufer, im für uns schönsten Stadtteil Berlins.  Vom Zimmer aus haben Sie eine tolle Sicht auf die Stadt.
space: The beautiful furnished private room is located in a lovely renovated & furnished apartment on Paul-Lincke Ufer.  Me and my girlfriend marie will share the apartment with you.  There is a beautiful view from the 7th floor (top floor with elevator) towards Alexanderplatz. Directly in so called "Kreuzkölln", the borderline of Kreuzberg an Neukölln. Quiet and charming neighborhood despite its central location, close to bus lines, shopping, supermarkets, cafes, beer gardens and restaurants. Three bus lines one 24/7. The bus 171 goes directly to Schönefeld airport. 15 minutes walking distance from U-Bahn (subway) U1 or U7 and U8, only two bus stops away (5min). Room includes: Double bed, wardrobe, table & chair, boiler & tee, fresh flowers & chocolates.    Bathroom consists of a large walk-in-shower with a rain shower head, a tub, sink, mirrored cabinet and toilet.  Private parking and wifi is included.  We live with you in the apartment and can give you good advices about the surrounding a

host_about:
Hallo,
Mein Name ist Reinhard. Ich bin Filmemacher und Kameramann. Ich habe einige Dokumentationen in Afrika gedreht und mache auch Imagefilme und ähnliches. Berlin ist seit ca. 5 Jahren mein Lebensmittelpunkt, auch wenn ich öfters unterwegs bin. Meine Freundin Marie-Eve wohnt auch in der Wohnung. Sie kommt aus Montreal und spricht Französisch, Englisch und auch sehr gut Deutsch. 

Hi, my name is Reinhard.  I am filmmaker and cameraman from Düsseldorf and I now live in Berlin with my girlfriend Marie-Eve.  We are a reliable, friendly, open minded couple and we both speak german, french and english.  We wish to share our home with like-minded visitors…so feel at home and enjoy your stay in beautiful Berlin!

name: Weser str. Beautiful One bedroom apartment!
summary: Lovely one bedroom apt in the living heart of the best young chic area of Berlin. walking distance to canal, parks, bars, cafes and more.  on the best street of the area- WESER STR>  where u can find boutiques and night life and culture.  The apt. is central bright and quite. the balcony is perfect for the summer month. A real gem in the heart of the city. perfect for a couples romantic get away..
space: A cosy one bedroom apartment with high cielings in a beautiful old building on Weser st. (corner of Fulda St.) theres is a Balcony that over looks the inner yard, and a lovely tree.  the apt. it self is 40 meter., with a big kitchen you can cook sit and rest in with a table and some chairs, and a sofa-bench. the bathroom in rather small but clean and cosy, with a shower that always has hot water!  the room it self is a big room with a double bed (there is a REAL BED now, all though the photos show a matt on the floor..) a living room area with a coffee table and A REAL SOFA NOW- an ikea sofa bed that opens up if u need to, even though the photos show a mattress on the floor (old photos) a couch and some other furniture like a big closet.  there is central heating, that works perfectly and wifi internet.  perfect for a couple or a single person but also possible for 3 people.  the neighborhood is one of the trendiest locations in berlin. its right in the center of kreuzberg-neukolln ("k

name: Beautiful guest room in Mitte!
summary: Spend time in the cultural heart of Berlin. You will have a large private room to yourself, in a rare and spacious flat, with a bathroom, wifi, washing machine etc. You will be surrounded by great historic books and vinyl records. And we love having guests!
space: We are living in a very spacious 5 room apartment (160qm) and would like to offer our very cosy guest-room to Berlin visitors. It is bright, app. 20 square meters with a single bed, a lot of books, vinyls and a huge table to work at. Ther is avery cute little dog in the house: Whoopi. So if you are allergic, please don´t apply. I have to mention aswell that we are smoking from time to time.

name: Central studio at Hackescher Markt
summary: Die Wohnung liegt mitten in der Mitte von Berlin mit Blick auf den Fernsehturm. Alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar und bequem. Trotzdem ist es erstaunlich ruhig.
space: Small studio between Hackescher Markt and Alexanderplatz. well situated with view to the TV-tower, just 400 m way. The studio has 32 sqm, for 2 persons, a very practical pantry kitchen with everything you need to prepare a meal and a good espresso or tea. King size bed, bathroom - no window -, wifi-internet, tv, stereo radio,  The apartment is on the 8th floor of a high building directly at the S-Bahn station, but still quiet looking at a small park. A sunny room with a ventilator and dark curtains for calm nights. Eating table with 2 chairs, samll table with 2 easy-chairs, wardrobe. The house is situated in a very urban neighbourhood with supermarkets, organic shops, bakeries, laundries, cinemas, theatre. only some steps walking and you are at Alexanderplatz, museum island, Humboldt university, the old jewish quarter - all ideal especially for culturally interested people. All public transport is nearby, even the night bus. It is the very center of an interesting city.

name: Kreuzberg Private Double Room
summary: Central Kreuzberg, perfect for food and bars, 140cm double bed, TV (Netflix, Amazon), three shelves and a clothes hanger, espresso machine and nice wooden chairs for coffee and dinner. Registriernummer: 02/Z/AZ/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Your room is a spacious 15m², has wooden floors, a nice comfortable double bed, a design desk and shelves, area to hang your clothes up, and little details that you will like! The room is in our 90m² apartment, equipped with everything you need to have a great time: - Wifi - Fully-equipped newly renovated Kitchen - Washing machine - Bath tub - Wooden floor  - Double glazing - Central Heating - 3rd floor (quiet and bright) General apartment info We are a couple living in the apartment with our cat. Our household is clean, tidy, quiet and non-smoking. It is our home, and we do our best to provide our guests with all they need for their stay. So if you need something, a restaurant recommendation or a household item, just ask :)  PLEASE NOTE, we have a house cat. She is a well-behaved and friendly feline, and will not enter your room. name: Room in Beautiful Design in Mitte
space: Please read before contacting. This is a 'private room' listing and not an 'entire appartment' listing. SETTING The room is part of a lovely Altbau flat. Feel free and make yourself comfortable. The flat has a bathroom with bath tub plus additional separate toilet as well as an open plan kitchen. The room has amongst other things a 140x200cm double real bed, a clothing rail, a desk and a blackout blind so you will be able to sleep comfortably. The bedroom is on the other side of the my bedroom and right by the entrance which will give you more privacy. The flat is a typical Berlin Altbau from late XIXth Century. It still has its hard wooden floor thorough and double doors. It has been fully refurbished in 2012 meaning it is an old charming flat but modern and comfortable. It has been decorated with care mixing contemporary design items, alongside Eames design classic and 50's Scandi design. LOCATION The location is very central in a residential area near Köllnischer Park with metro les

name: Gendarmerie Fantasy Room in centre
space: Our building is located exactly where once the Berlin Wall stood. During the wall times this was nobodys land and after the wall came down modern residential buildings were build with exclusive equipment. Its now right in the center of Berlin located between Alexanderplatz and Gendarmenmarkt and we invite you to stay with us in our  gendarmerie fantasy room within a 135m2 apartment with 4 other rooms. The accommodation is designed with castle and knight motifs based on the Gendarmenmarkt (gendarme = Chevalier = Knight). The Gendarmenmarkt is a square in the historical center of Berlin and is considered "the most beautiful square in Berlin". In the center is the Concert Hall, designed by Schinkel, flanked on the south by the German and French on the north side of the cathedral. It received its current name in 1799 in memory of the Cuirassier Regiment stables of the "Gens d'armes" that the "soldier king" Friedrich Wilhelm I of Swabia built in 1736. Your private bedroom has a size of 16m2

name: Spacious in central Kreuzberg
space: Hi there. I am offering my apartment for short term rentals when i am not in Berlin. The bedroom has got a balcony and is furnished with a new king-size bed, chair, mirror and clothes rail. The living space holds a new couch and offers a beautiful view. In the bathroom there is a nice shower and a washing maschine. The kitchen offers everything you need to cook. Clean towels and sheets are provided. The apartment is located in Dieffenbachstrasse within the Gräfekiez. One street away from the canal, the Admirals Brücke or Kottbuser Brücke. 5min away from Kottbusser Tor, Kreuzkölln and Hermannplatz. The area is famous for its bars, clubs, restaurants and laid-back lifestyle. The metro (Schönleinstrasse) is at 5min walk: line U8 will bring you to Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt and the museum area in a few stops.

name: Sunny 2 room apartment Berlin Kreuzberg central
summary: ACCOMMODATION  45 square meters apartment with a cozy balcony in the heart of Berlin Kreuzberg!  Bright and sunny, since it's located on the 5th floor. Two rooms (living room, bedroom), a kitchen and a small shower bathroom.  If you´re 2 guests  for 10 days or more,  the price is much LESS.  Just send a request.
space: The bedroom which I sublet has a medium size – it is furnished with one comfortable double-bed (140 cm x 200 cm), a sofa, a desk. The other  room,is of the same size as the bedroom, furnished with a sofa, a small table. I don’t have a TV – there is wifi internet access though of course. The bathroom is small shower bath with ventilation, nothing fancy but functional, there is a sink and the toilet is in the same room. The balcony is the perfect south-west orientated place having breakfast on or relax with an open view (which is quite rarely in Berlin) to a lot of trees and a lot of birds to listen to. There is a tabel with a chair and also a sun lounger, if needed. The kitchen is well equipped with all the standard appliances such as a fridge-freezer, electric hob & electric oven. It  includes a washing-machine, plenty of kitchen accessories for those who like to cook. There is a round kitchen table that can seat 2 people very comfortably and up to 4 people at a squeeze. space: A quiet room in a 4 room flat is rentable with all things you need; light, a dishwasher, bathtub, washing machine, vacuum cleaner, elevator, balcony...

host_about:
Ich lebe seit 14 Jahren in Berlin, bin geschieden und habe zwei Kinder im Alter von 17 und 12 Jahren.
Nach Berlin zog ich wegen des Studiums. Wir lesen viel und bewegen uns gern im Freien, Berlins Umland ist reich an Seen und wunderschönen Wäldern. Ansonsten fahren wir gerne Fahrrad, viel und oft. Kochen täglich zusammen und singen, basteln. Wir sind eine lustige und warmherzige Familie.

name: Luxury URBAN apt on KaDeWe/Ku'Damm
summary: The apt offers an exclusive comfort and unique design in a quiet street located in the most central location in Berlin.
space: This stylish OdRoch apt includes all the necessities for your unforgettable stay and more. After a long day exploring the city you deserve enjoying a warm relaxing shower in a modern bathroom, turning on the air-condition, playing a movie from your iPad through the apple TV to the 46" LED TV and having the best sleeping experience with a top quality King-Size Box-spring bed. When waking up, the morning coffee from the Nespresso machine while enjoying the green balcony will assure your day a great start.

name: Kreuzberg: central, calm, spacious and cosy
summary: In the heart of Kreuzberg and  just two minutes from the international, multi-cultural hustle and bustle of the famous Oranienstrasse, the room is very quiet at the end of a large apartment with a view of our beautiful Berlin backyard. The guests (there is a second guest room) have their own newly renovated large bathroom.
space: The guest room is very quiet and bright (with morning sun), large (25-m2) and is located at the end of a 150-m2 apartment next to the shared guest bathroom.  It has just been renovated (2016), has a 1.60 m wide bed with new mattresses, a comfortable sofa, a large table with two chairs, a sink with stove and refrigerator, coffee maker, kettle and various utensils for self catering.  Despite the quiet location you walk just two minutes to the typical multi-cultural Kreuzberg scene of the famous Oranienstrasse next to U-Bahn Kottbusser Tor. You can have breakfast in countless coffee houses, eat in different restaurants with culinary delights and snacks cheap and tasty once around the globe. There is a wide selection of trendy bars, cocktail bars and typical old Berlin pubs as the "Max and Moritz" or "Henne". Internationally known clubs such as the "Sage Club", "Kater Holzig" or "Ritter Butzke" can easily be reached on foot.

host_about:
We like to travel, to meet new people ,to discover new things and listen new stories. That's why when we travel we try to avoid big hotels and we prefer to rent through airbnb and meet local people. In Berlin i live with my friend Billy
We are from Argentina and Greece,  the last 6 years we live in Berlin. Paula works in a kindergarten and Billy as electronic engineer. 

We both are very open, and friendly and we will try to do our best to maximize your joy in your trip, and we will treat you like our friends.

Best, 
Paula and Billy

name: Music studio Wrangelkiez
summary: Enter the wild heart of the Wrangelkiez! The Görlitzer Park, restaurants of all nations, bars, clubs, flea & turquish markets, Badeschiff - its all here! Special: If you are a DJ, Producer or Musician, you can use my studio at request.
space: My place at a glanc (Website hidden by Airbnb) If you look for a place where you can totally relax and escape the vibrant city, here it is: * super quiet location because the street is a blind alley * flat is right next to Görlitzer Park * step up and relax on a higher level...literally! * sleeping in weightlessness thanks to memory foam visco-elastic mattress & cusions. Goodbye back & neck  pain! :) * spacious and bright bath with bathtub * change color in bathroom to your mood * totally equipped kitchen for all your needs As the ad describes it, we SHARE the flat.  When I am around, my room is the music studio next door. Special: Music Studio request (Website hidden by Airbnb) Sometimes I have DJs or music producers who have to finish tracks on the road or play the vinyl they buy at Hardwax or Spacehall...they have the possibility to use my equipment in this case, see equipment below in Guest Access. By walking you reach the famous East side Gallery, the river and Oberbaumbrücke. It is also close to the street food market Markthalle9, Lido, Watergate club or Berghain. On top of that the room is located in a hidden quiet corner of the street.
space: The cozy room is a special place with a calm architectural/design flair. The room is located in a charming  flat with wooden floor and high ceiling. The flat is kept clean, I am a non-smoker and I don't have pets.

name: L. Feuchtwanger Boutique Apartment
space: Newly renovated to the highest standard and fitted with designer furniture and a rich colour palette, this apartment offers a stylish and comfortable Berlin base for 2 or 3 people. In the luxurious living room with its leaf golden wall you find a comfortable sofa-bed and chairs to relax in style at day as well as a big desk to work or to dine with friends. The table is made from oak-wood from sustainable forestry. The bedroom has a 180cm wide bed, lots of storage room and modern light installations (made by heavytool). A semi-open plan modern kitchen, dishwasher, full-size fridge, microwave/oven and breakfast bar provides everything you need to have or prepare a meal. All the wood is teak from sustainable forestry.  A luxuriously renovated bathroom with open-plan shower (rain shower) is completely bespoke & of highest standard. Clever space and light planning make it easy to feel at home and relax from a day of exploration. With Wifi Internet, flatscreen TV, iPod docking station as wel

name: The Little Cozy Suite near Spree
summary: Studio on the first floor of a modern building located in the very heart of Berlin, moments from the river Spree and Alexanderplatz (TV Tower). We are authorised to rent it to tourists, but our second home is also a great place for singles or couples of expats who need to spend a few months close to all the major sites in Berlin, theatres, museums and cultural institutions.
space: The flat has a design bathroom with rain shower and glass sliding door, fully equipped kitchen with ceramic cook-plate, combined oven/microwave, coffee machine, toaster and water boiler, a bed, a sofa bed and WiFi Internet. A flat screen TV is available but we do not provide cable access, instead we offer a streaming TV device and guests can use their own account to watch their favourite films on Netflix and other streaming services. Ample windows give access to a French balcony and a large sized balcony. A washmachine is available to guests in the common laundry space in the basement.

host_about:
Dear guests thank you for visiting our listings.  ** ⬇︎ Italiano a seguire ⬇︎**

Italian owners based in Holland since the year (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) We both like to travel and have a true passion for Europe, during the years we fell in love with a few towns and we have built our second home there. 

Like most ordinary people we have to work so for great part of the year we can offer our properties in Berlin and in Palermo to guests who, like us, love to stay in the heart of town, where memory of the historic past and lively atmosphere come together.

We are like the Yin & Yang.  
-Paolo is a dreamer,  but very down to earth, careful, precise, sincere, attentive to details ..someone say even too much maniac. 
-Valentino graduated in philosophy is a person available to dialogue of any origin or theme it may be, has a very practical mentality, brings interest to everything from the smallest news to the largest one and this skill sometimes leads him to be nicknamed from friends: (Hidden by Airbnb) . ;)

Paolo has almost 30 years experience in hotel business and loves photography and to create objects out of recycled materials, especially lamps and everything that has to do with light. We are proudly fitting our properties with some of his works.

We are both a bit vintage: reading classical literature or listening to music from the 70's ,80's and 90's, but we find Progressive House-Music TOP in this 21st century ;)

As a rule,  you will interact with us during the booking process, preparation of your trip and assistance while your stay in. 
-In Berlin we have a property-meager on site who will meet you at Check-in & Check-out and will look after you - only if you need so, as you will be totally free during your stay - while you are visiting  / exploring the city.
-In Palermo we use a different system of  Self Check-in & Self Check-out. But if you need assistance or in case of an emergency also here, our trusted  assistance on site can look after you. 

A special "Thank You"  goes to all guests, who already stayed in our accommodations. Their feedback improved our properties, time by time to give a better quality.  

We wish you a lovely, relaxed stay in our properties, but please do not forget to visit the exciting and inspiring towns out there ;) 

 **Your Home Away From Home**

Paolo & Valentino 

** Versione Italiana **

Cari ospiti vi ringraziamo per aver visitato i nostri alloggi.

Proprietari italiani con sede in Olanda dal (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) A entrambi piace viaggiare e avere una vera passione per l'Europa, negli anni ci siamo innamorati di alcune città e abbiamo costruito le nostre seconde case laggiù.

Come la maggior parte delle persone comuni, dobbiamo lavorare così per buona parte dell'anno possiamo offrire le nostre proprietà a Berlino e a Palermo a ospiti che, come noi, amano soggiornare nel cuore della città, dove il ricordo del passato storico e l'atmosfera vivace con se porta.

Siamo come lo Yin e lo Yang. 
-Paolo è un sognatore, ma molto con i piedi per terra, scrupoloso, preciso, sincero, attento ai dettagli .. qualcuno dice anche troppo maniaco. 
-Valentino laureato in filosofia è una persona aperta al dialogo di qualuncue origine / tema esso sia, ha una mentalità molto pratica, ama interessersi di tutto  dalle più piccole notizie alla più grandi e questo grande interesse a volte lo porta ad'essere soprannominato dagli amici più cari: (Hidden by Airbnb) ;)

Paolo ha quasi 30 anni di esperienza nel settore alberghiero, ama la fotografia cimentandosi a fotografare le sue opere, oggetti creati con materiali riciclati, in particolare  lampade e tutto ciò che ha a che fare con la luce. Orgogliosamente  fieri per avere integrato nelle nostre proprietà  alcune delle sue opere.

Siamo entrambi un po 'vintage: leggendo letteratura classica o ascoltando musica degli anni '70, '80 e '90, ma in questo 21 ° secolo troviamo la Progressive House-Music al TOP;)

Di regola, interagirai con noi durante il processo di prenotazione, preparazione del viaggio e assistenza durante il tuo soggiorno.
-A Berlino abbiamo un gestore di proprietà sul posto che ti incontrerà al Check-in e Check-out e si prenderà cura di te - solo se ne hai bisogno, dato che sarai totalmente libero durante il tuo soggiorno - mentre stai visitando e esplorando la città.
-In Palermo utilizziamo un diverso sistema di Self Check-in e Self Check-out. Ma se hai bisogno di assistenza o in caso d'emergenza anche qui, il nostro assistente fidato sul posto può prendersi cura di te.

Uno speciale "Grazie" va a tutti gli ospiti, che hanno già soggiornato nei nostri appartamenti. Il loro feedback ha migliorato le nostre proprietà, di volta in volta per essere sempre di qualità migliore. 

Vi auguriamo un piacevole e rilassante soggiorno nelle nostre proprietà, ma per favore non dimenticate di visitare le città così eccitanti e stimolanti là fuori;)

 **La Vostra Casa Lontano Da Casa**

Paolo e Valentino

summary: My appartment is located in the real and creative heart of Kreuzberg.  A bright and big room with a nice sofa to relax and a good bed to have a wonderful sleep. Bathroom and kitchen are fully equipped.
space: I`m Henrik, i like my appartment, to live there and specially to live in Berlin-Kreuzberg. I live now since 10 years in Kreuzberg and i don’t wanna live at an other place in Berlin. Kreuzberg is honest and and lively.  The area where I live is sourrounded with many lovely Café´s, Bars, Clubs, Cultural Places, Water and Parks. My Appartment has 3 rooms, a bathroom and a kitchen. Sheets, towels, coffee, tea and a lot of tips for Berlin are inclusive. Feel like at home.

name: Neukölln, Maybachufer, direkt!
summary: Unsere Wohnung befindet sich in einem gepflegten Berliner Altbau. Sie ist im Hinterhaus gelegen, was sie angenehm ruhig macht. Durch ihre Lage im 2. Stock sind die Räume hell und freundlich. Zum Appartement (30 qm) gehören ein  Wohn-/ Schlafzimmer, eine gut ausgestattete Küche und ein modernes Bad.
space: Einzigartig ist die Lage an einer der schönsten und spannendsten Stellen Berlin-Kreuzbergs direkt am Landwehrkanal (Maybachufer). Es gibt in unmittelbarer Umgebung viele Cafés und Restaurants, eine Schiffsanlegestelle liegt vor der Haustür, und zweimal wöchentlich findet auf der Straße ein großer orientalischer Wochenmarkt statt. Die U-Bahnstation Schönleinstraße (U8) liegt nur 150 Meter entfernt, die U-Bahnstation Kottbusser Tor (U1) 500 Meter.  Wichtiger Hinweis: Der Markt vor unserer Haustür ist schön und sehr attraktiv, aber Autos, die dort geparkt sind, müssen rechtzeitig andernorts abgestellt werden! (Am besten bereits am Abend zuvor. Marktzeiten sind Dienstag und Freitag von 09.00 bis 18.30 Uhr. Außerdem findet am Samstag ein Kunstmarkt statt - Autos dann bitte ebenfalls wegstellen.) Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung.

name: SUNNY BERLIN APPARTMENT
summary: The calm nest is located in one of the most developing neighbourhood that definitely has a Berlin spirit. The studio has been renovated in 2013 and is super light with an open layout. - Airport Schönefeld 45min - Airport Tegel  55 min
space: The house is located in a very quiet street. The appartment is on the 3rd floor and has a great view on the calm backyard with wild green, an old industrial loft building and a beautiful tree. The typical Berlin Altbau is in a good condition, but is still waiting to be renovated and has therefore it's own Neukölln charm. The positive surprise awaits you as soon as you enter the flat. The studio has been renovated in 2013 and is super bright with an open layout. You find a big storage unit in the entrance that offers space for any kind of stuff. There's a cleaning kit, vacuum cleaner, drying rack and washing machine for your use. The kitchen is brandnew and offers an oven, cooker, toaster, fridge (incl. Freezer), water heater, dish washer and a Brita. Lot's of table ware!!! The little dining area is by the window and offers space for max. 5 persons. The bench is a heirloom – be nice to it. name: Sonniges Dachgeschoss in Berlin Mitte
summary: Schönes, helles, sehr ruhiges Zimmer, geschmackvoll eingerichtet, im Herzen von Berlin (U-Bahn Rosenthaler Platz).  Küche&Bad, WLAN, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine.
space: Sehr zentral gelegene Wohnung, viele Cafe's in der Nähe. Viele wichtige Museen sind zu Fuß zu erreichen. U-Bahn und S-Bahn Station nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt.
description: Schönes, helles, sehr ruhiges Zimmer, geschmackvoll eingerichtet, im Herzen von Berlin (U-Bahn Rosenthaler Platz).  Küche&Bad, WLAN, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine. Sehr zentral gelegene Wohnung, viele Cafe's in der Nähe. Viele wichtige Museen sind zu Fuß zu erreichen. U-Bahn und S-Bahn Station nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt. 1  Schlafzimmer der 3 Zimmerapartment können genutzt werden, sowie Küche und Bad. Matratze liegt auf einem Lattenrost und ist sehr bequem. Die U-Bahn Station ist in 5 min. Fußweg erreichbar. Die S-Bahn Station in 15 min. Fußweg erreichbar, der Weg dahin ist durch historische Mitte, also man kann es ruhig geniessen!

name: Be Central - premium sunny & trendy design room
summary: Quite the unbeatable location in a gorgeous classic building. Feel at rest with a digital artist & psychologist and an entrepreneur. The room will be the cherry on the top during your European journey. Right at Berlin's center near Potsdamer Platz, next to two main subway lines, unique shops and dandy places for brunch or dinner just makes it perfect to discover the city and mingle with locals. It includes a bright bed, a handmade desk, a balcony, retro furniture & more. Don't want to miss it!
space: Just perfect for a couple or solo travelers. The Room is well equipped with a comfortable Japanese style bed (1,40m x 2,00 mts.), large writing desk, closet-mirror, a trendy arm chair, french press,Yoga mat, fresh towels and linens. The charming balcony in the room will give you a large view of the main street and one can see Potsdamer Platz and in sunny days even Alexander Platz will be visible making this room the best place to explore the city . The fully furnished kitchen with all the appliances is also at your disposal and can be shared with us as so the living room with a dining area. The flat is located on the fourth floor of a Historic-Reconstructed building, it's spacious high ceilings, classical moldings and semi-oval large windows, make the apartment look very bright and classy.  Two metro stations and bus stops next door makes it easy to commute around the city. Supermarkets, drugstores, post office, banks, restaurants and more are literally next door.

host_about:
Hello and thank you for reading this,

My husband John and I are a young multicultural couple living In the cosmopolitan city of Berlin and very eager to expand our travel experience and cultural knowledge.

Sabrina comes from the South of Germany, the Black Forest to be precise and has been living for over 10 years in Berlin where she finished her advanced psychology studies, she's currently a digital and traditional artist. John, Californian born, South America raised has studied international business/relations and is currently trying on building his own Startup and finishing his further MBA studies. He's also a licensed yoga teacher and is trying to learn how to play the Ukulele.

Our passions are diverse and I don't think we could explain them in here however just to mention a few: Traveling, Yoga,  arts, photography, eating, reading novels/biographies, music, philosophy, smart conversations and enjoying a nice warm day :)

name: cute little studio at Maybachufer
summary: this is a tiny, but cute little studio (26 m2) it offers  a small equipped kitchen, clean bathroom with a shower and a comfortable double bed. It´s ideal for couples and located right by the water in Neukölln, next to the border to Kreuzberg.
space: Even though it´s really small, I tried to build a space that I would feel comfortable in, when I´m traveling. So it´s not all IKEA.  A little bit of vintage furniture, a comfortable bed, nice wooden floors and a tiny custom made kitchen with all the basic equipment to be totally independent.
description: this is a tiny, but cute little studio (26 m2) it offers  a small equipped kitchen, clean bathroom with a shower and a comfortable double bed. It´s ideal for couples and located right by the water in Neukölln, next to the border to Kreuzberg. Even though it´s really small, I tried to build a space that I would feel comfortable in, when I´m traveling. So it´s not all IKEA.  A little bit of vintage furniture, a comfortable bed, nice wooden floors and a tiny custom made kitchen with all the basic equipment to be totally independent. The location of the studio is really nice, right by the river with a lot of bars, clubs, restaurants within a 10 minute-walk-radius. Within the last five years this area made a huge development and it is very charming and interesting with it´s clash of turkish culture and international hipsterdom. You can always reach me by email or phone and I´ll be happy to help you with all your questions regarding your stay in Berlin or in case of emergencies. Please note

summary: 2 Beautiful and spacious rooms . High ceilings, wood floors and big windows. The apartment has a very nice and positive atmosphere. Next to Spree canal-Paul Linke Ufer. name: Charming Altbau apartment
summary: This charming one bedroom appartment (57 sqm) is situated in a quiet street of Berlin´s trendy Kruezkölln area by landwehr canal. New fitted kitchen with all utensils, stylish living room, bathroom with shower and Wifi. Ideal for singles and couples.
space: The nabourhood is full of cafés, restaurants and bars. There are 3 different supermarkets no more than 3 minutes walk from the flat. The Landwehr canal is round the corner which is beautiful to walk along. There is a Turkish food market which runs Tuesdays and Fridays along the Landwehr canal, walking distance from the flat. There is also a flea market every other Sunday behind the flat also along the landwehr canal.  The flat is 5 minutes walk to Schöneleinstr Ubahn and 8 minutes walk to Hermannplatz. You can take the Ubahn and be in Alexanderplatz in less than 15 mins. The 171 bus which runs from Schönefeld airport, stops 3 minutes walk from the flat. name: Room in Berlin historical center
summary: The location of the apartment is perfect  for food gourmet, business people, for people interested in historical parts of Berlin, music concerts, bars for different tastes. Public transportation is reachable within a 5 minute walk.
space: I live in a charming 3 room flat in the heart of old Berlin, called Berlin Mitte.  I offer the guest room and sometimes (when I am traveling) my own bedroom.  The living room and kitchen can be used, as well the balcony (for smokers). The balcony is perfect when the weather is nice because it is quiet and it has got a good a nice view. You can sit there with a glass of wine....

name: Luxury Apt & SAUNA on KuDamm/KaDeWe
summary: OdRoch SPA apt – place of relaxation. Modern elegance, loving care and a natural atmosphere will help you to leave everyday life behind you.
space: This stylish OdRoch SPA apt includes all the necessities for your unforgettable stay and more.  After a long day exploring the city make some time for yourself. Find peace and treat your body in a steam sauna followed by a relaxing warm shower in our modern SPA bathroom, turning on the air-condition, playing a movie from your iPad/iPhone through the apple TV to the 46" LED TV and having the best sleeping experience with a top quality electric King-Size Box-Spring bed. When waking up, the morning coffee from the Nespresso machine while enjoying the green balcony will assure your day a great start.

OdRoch SPA apt is situated only a few steps away from the legendary KaDeWe department store as well as the main commercial street, Ku’Damm, where the top international fashion stores are to be found. Wittenbergplatz is only 200m away.   U-Bahn (Metro): U1

name: Studio Loft in Kreuzberg
summary: Top floor space in the much loved Kreuzberg area - fantastic area and great value. Easy access to public transport and perfectly located to get the most out of your trip to Berlin.
space: I am renting out my fully furnished place in Berlin. I work away from home on a very regular base so my place is free for you to enjoy.  It is in the popular Kreuzberg area of Berlin. It is on the top floor (5th floor – no elevator) and has: A light and spacious open living room with kitchen.  One bedroom with a double bed (180 x 200 cm). A bathroom with a shower, wash basin and a toilet. A wifi connection, television, refrigerator, dishes and other necessary kitchen utensils, electric stove. Fresh bed linen and towels.    As well as being in a characteristic, old renovated building that offers super views, it is also very quiet. It is perfectly situated to allow you to access the many places of interest that Berlin has to offer. Public transport is conveniently located with the U-Bahn (U6) within walking distance from the apartment; this takes you to the north and the south of Berlin. U7 is very close too and both of these U-Bahn lines connect to buses and trains that drive to the air

So, what are you waiting for? Come and visit Berlin!

name: Charming, central, long term sublet
summary: My cozy apartment has a bit of a bohemian feel and is very homey and comfortable. Just around the corner from a great Bi-weekly farmers market, many cafés & restaurants as well as a convenient U-Bahn station, it sits very quiet in a typical Berlin courtyard.
space: This is actually my apartment, not a commercially managed one.  It is in a quiet building and I am looking for a long term sublet of at least 2 month while I'm in my second home, the US. The apartment has a very cozy vibe and the green courtyard invites to have a coffee outside in the sun.  It is fully furnished and the kitchen, while a bit old and quite simple, is fully equipped.  The bedroom has a queen bed and a large shelf to hang and store your clothes.  It is a first floor apartment with large windows and high ceilings.  One bedroom, one living room, a kitchen with a small eating area and a slim but nice, all tiled bathroom with a bathtub and window.  Wifi is included.

We are a couple originally from Berlin Germany and South Dakota USA.
We live between The US and Europe.
We used to sublet our house in LA before we bought property in Tucson in 2018.
Most of the reviews are from our LA property that we no longer own.
Our style could be called eclectic, DIY with a love for vintage americana.

Check-in: from on 18:30 h (and according to individual agreement ) Check-out  until 14 h) I will receive and welcome you personally.  Before and during your stay I will be reachable via phone an
host_about:
I am living in Berlin since more than 25 years now and most of this time I did spent in Kreuzberg. I appreciate its diversity and normality. Every now and then I like to share or  lent my home to someone from somewhere else. 
If wished for I can provide you with informations and tips concerning Berlins sights, history and my personal favorite places. 
Being curious about your discoveries and looking forward to your visit!   

Seit über 20 Jahren lebe ich  in Berlin und die längste Zeit hiervon in Kreuzberg. Mir gefällt die Vielfalt und Normalität hier. Hin und wieder habe ich Lust mein Zuhause mit jemandem von woanders her zu teilen bzw. es "auszuleihen". 
Falls gewünscht gebe ich gerne Infos und Tipps zu Sehenswürdigkeiten, der Geschichte Berlins und meinen persönlichen Lieblingsplätzen. 
Bin gespannt auf Deine / Eure Entdeckungen. Ich freue mich auf Deinen Besuch!

name: pivate room in 100qm sunny artist flat in Neukölln
summary: Hey, we, 2 friends, live here together in a cozy sunny apartment in the heart of Neukölln. There are two big parks, lots of supermarkets in front of the door. Very good connected to metro and bus.  The apartment itself – full of light with huge double windows. A big bright living room offers space to chill, dance, read, sleep.. The apartment has got 100 m², with 4,5 rooms (3 smaller private rooms and a massive living room + big kitchen + big bathroom). You will just stay here with one of us.
space: There are 3 private rooms each with a bed for 2 people (150 x 200). In the center of the apartment is the beautiful huge bright living room. Additionally there is a big kitchen with lots of cooking equipment. We share one big bathroom with a shower AND a bathtub :-). All of the rooms have traditional old wooden floor and lots of light inside. So there is tons of space for everybody. We are rarely at home - you'd almost have your own apartment. It is a cosy and relaxed atmosphere here, but its not a party place. The neighbors are very nice, so, I expect my guests to be sensitive about noise. Looking forward to reed from you! Often I am out of town - talk to me for details ;-)

space: The apartment is located very centrally in Kreuzberg and is rather quiet even if there is a lot of Nightlife close by. name: Bright and spacious apartment
summary: Bright and spacious apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg. We offer our beautiful apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg situated in one of the most vibrant neighborhoods of Berlin. !!! Normally we only rent out a room but while we are on vacation from 07/02 to 07/12  you have the entire apartment with an equally big living and bedroom all to yourself!
space: In our beautiful apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg, my boyfriend and I offer a spacious (25 qm/ 270 sq ft) and comfortable room. With its big windows, high ceilings, mouldings, wooden floors and its modern furnishing the room combines the charm of a typical Berlin old building and the comfort of a modern flat. The room has a large king size bed, big flatscreen TV, lounging area with sofa and working place with a desk and chair. Window blinds will allow you to sleep in after a night out in Berlin's vibrant nightlife. The room is connected to an equally big living room .  Fresh towels and linens are provided upon arrival. Wifi included. The bathroom has a big tub and there is a separate WC in the front of the apartment. There is a fully equipped kitchen you are welcome to use. The area actually offers a variety of restaurants at different price ranges so there should be something in there for everyone. We are passionate about hosting and getting to know people from all over the world.

name: Balcony room in vibrant Neukölln
summary: Located in one of the most vibrant neighbourhoods of Berlin - Neukölln, we welcome you in our beautiful flat.  Near the closed down airport (Tempelhof) - now a park - and lots of cafés and bars in the area you are also well connected to all parts of the city.
space: The cozy, big room we rent out to you is bright, clean and tidy. Also we have a balcony where - during summertime - you can enjoy barbecues on. Guests will have their own private room. Bathroom/kitchen are shared. We cherish the privacy of our guests but they are always invited for a nice chat and some hints about what to do in Berlin. In the neighborhood we have many nice little cafés and bars as well as the closed down Tempelhofer airport which is now an awesome park to skate and have barbecues or just chill out in the sun.  Also there is the beautiful Körnerpark in baroque style that invites to hang out. Ringbahn ( S41/42)/ Subway (U8) / Bus (344) ...very well connected. We will gladly provide you with all details how to get around. Pro-tip: "FahrInfo Berlin" App in your App-store We are always looking forward to meeting new people! Gina & Benni
