name: Room (for 1-2) in flat shared with a guy
summary: Sunny bedroom with queen bed for 1-2 persons in a cosy flat in Kreuzberg. Important: during the stay, only my boyfriend Alex is in the flat!  Shared spaces: kitchen and bathroom. Lovely area, full of cafes, restaurants and parks. Close to the canal.  2 underground stations at a walking distance and 1 bus station in front of the door.
space: Cosy and sunny bedroom for 1 or 2 persons. Important: during the stay, only my boyfriend Alex is in the flat!  Located in the lovely Graefekiez (Kreuzberg), 5 minutes walk from 2 underground stations and with a bus stop in front of the door.  The flat, modern and spacious, is on the 3rd floor and has sun in the morning, a comfy double bed (180 X 200 cm), a wardrobe and a keyboard.

host_about:
Hi, We are Chiara and Alex :-)

I work as a communications and events manager within an environmental research institute. Basically, I give my 2 cents for a greener world! Alex is a freelancer in the advertising world.

We love Berlin and its never-ending energy. Work, friends, sport and swing are our daily bread. 

We are very seldom at home, but we will do our best to make the flat and your stay as comfortable as possible :-) So, take your chance and jump on board!

Cheers, 
Chiara

name: Amazing  Room in central Berlin
summary: The apartment is located on a busy street, close to lots of restaurants and bars, 1 min away from the subway station. The room is large, 23 square m with a king size bed and luxury mattresses.
space: The apartment is 120 sm and I live alone so you will get plenty of privacy. It is a typical old Berlin building 3.5m high ceiling and wooden floors. The flat is upper ground floor, so easy access if you've got big bags. The room is very large ( 23 sm), has a large antique wardrobe, king size bed (180cm x200cm), and fresh 100% cotton bedlinen and towels. All bedding is from the White Company, London. It can be a bit noisy on the weekend, because it is on a main road, 1 min walking distance from the tube/U-bahn station. I don't have any pets in the flat. I don’t use the instant booking system so when you contact me about staying in my home please tell me briefly about yourself and your travelling companion and the purpose of your visit to Berlin. Please also ask me any questions you may have.  I will consider same day bookings only if I’m home in Berlin. There is a mid-afternoon cut-off time so try not to leave it too late. Sincerely Vincent :-)

name: Lovely bright (prvt) room in share
summary: Private room in flatshare. The room is really lovely and looks out over our little balcony. Supermarkets, cafes, restaurants and bars are all within easy walking distance. Well-connected to the U-bahn and buses, and the S-bahn is just two stops away. PLEASE NOTE: Our check-in time is until 10pm. If you are unable to get to the apartment before that time then we may not be able to check you in until the next day. We hope you understand!
space: A beautiful apartment in the heart of Tempelhof, right by the stunning Viktoria Park (the highest natural point in Berlin) and 15 minutes from Kreuzberg or Neukölln. It's a 1920s building complete with elevator and secret passageway behind the fridge (true story!). Super warm and fully furnished. The room available is a large, white double room, which looks out on our little balcony. The room is cool in the summer months and is incredibly cosy and warm in winter. The apartment is quite old and has a few quirks to it. The shower is old-school German in that it is a hand held ordeal. There isn't a clip to hand the shower head basically (and no way to fashion one – trust us, we've tried!) but once you get the hang of it, it becomes normal pretty quickly.  The floors are quite squeaky too but as long as you're not stomping around we're very used to the general squeaks so don't worry about making noise if you come home after we're already in bed. Also due to the old wiring in the apartment

host_about: We are Alice and Tim! Alice is originally from NZ and Tim hails from London and we've been living in Berlin for just over six years (embarrassingly, our German language skills do not reflect this!). Alice is a graphic designer/photographer and Tim a musician. We're pretty relaxed and easy-going people who love to cook, travel, and also hang out and explore this vibrant city we're living in.

name: private room in Berlin Mitte
summary: 1 private room in Berlin mitte at nordbahnof with view on a parc. In a 80 m2 in the heart of Berlin. You can walk to museum insel, mauer park, Alexander platz, prenzlauer berg, Bundestag, Brandenburger Tor. Many restaurants and shops around.
space: Votre chambre fait 15 m2, avec un lit double de 160 cm, une méridienne, une table et deux chaises, une petite commode et penderie. des guides et infos sur Berlin sont également à disposition. Nous devons partager la salle de bain. Je travaille à la maison donc je n'ai pas à me dépêcher le matin et mon fils Carl part assez tôt à l'école. Vous avez donc la salle de bain sans stress pour vous le matin.  Vous pouvez utiliser la cuisine pour faire du café ou du thé et tisanes. Tout est à disposition. On aime beaucoup de le foot anglais, en particulier Manchester United. Vous pouvez regarder volontiers avec nous ou venir au pub avec moi. Si vous avez besoin de laver du linge n'hésitez pas à demander, j'ai un sèche linge donc le linge est lavé et séché en une demi-journée
description: 1 private room in Berlin mitte at nordbahnof with view on a parc. In a 80 m2 in the heart of Berlin. You can walk to museum insel, mauer park, Alexander platz, prenzlauer berg, Bundestag, Brandenburger Tor. Many restaurants and shops around.     Your room is 16 m2 big with a double bed (160 cm ),  a little sofa, 2 chairs and a table.  We have to Share the bathroom. I work at home, and Carl spends few minutes in the morning before going to school, so you will have it for you in the morning without stress. You can use the Kirchen for breakfast, and make tea and coffee as you will. We are English football enthusiasts, especially of Manchester United, we have sat program throyyugh internet to sport French channels. You are welcome  to watch games with us if you want ! You can use the washing machine and dryer.   We speak fluently French English and German. We are two French person in Berlin for 11  years. My son is 14 years old, I'm 38. I work at home so I'm always available if you nee

I'm French, I have been living in Berlin for 16 years in Berlin with my son 19 years old Carl. .
I'm currently studying at home development economics. You can ask me any question about the city. My door is always open.

name: Beautiful Place in Perfect Location
summary: Being  located in the absolute epicenter of Mitte but on a quit street my airy two-room apartment makes for the perfect sleep and the nicest of mornings enjoyed at the marble table while the sun fall through the large french windows.
space: The apartment features heated wooden floors throughout, 3meter high ceilings and 2,80m high french windows. The bathroom features a walk-in rain shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with 2013 AEG appliances. The furnishings are a simple mix of italian 20th century design classics, furniture by contemporary german designers and a few vintage pieces. The apartment also features a small collection of contemporary art encompassing works by among others Asmund Havsteen and Zara Pfeifer. The apartment design is conveniently split into a more private and a more representational part, making it easy to have smaller groups over for work, an aperitif or dinner.

name: Beautyful flat in old berlin style
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich in zentraler Lage in Berlin Mitte, eine der schönsten Gegenden in Berlin. Sie wohnen mit den Gastgebern  zusammen in einer schönen Altbauwohnung (95 qm) und schlafen im Schlafzimmer zum ruhigen Hinterhof gelegen.
space: Unsere charmante Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße in Berlin Mitte und ist daher der ideale Ausgangspunkt um die Stadt zu entdecken! Regierungsviertel, Museumsinsel, Alexanderpaltz sind nur einige der zahllose Sehenswürdigkeiten in der Nähe. Des Weiteren gibt es unzällige Galerien, Restaurants, Bars und Clubs zu entdecken. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten wie Bioläden, Edeka, Rewe usw. sind zu Fuß zu erreichen. Die gehobene Altbauwohnung (Gesamtfläche ca. 95qm) ist sehr großzügig geschnitten und hat zwei Balkone. Der Balkon auf der Rückseite ist vom Schlafzimmer und der Küche begehbar und ist dem wunderschönen und ruhigen Hinterhof zugewandt. Auf dem Balkon befindet sich ein Tisch mit Stühlen und zwei Liegestühlen. Der Balkon lädt also geradezu ein den ganzen Abend darauf zu verbringen. Die gesamte Wohnung ist modern eingerichtet und verfügt über drei Zimmer, Küche und Bad.

name: Urban at Heart
summary: Rent a cosy room in the urban heart of Berlin!
space: Quiet flat in a very central location! The flat is very close to the Bergmannstraße (walking distance: ca. 7 minutes) and to the new Park am Gleisdreieck. This is the perfect stay for discovering Berlin. PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THE FLAT IS LOCATED ON THE 3RD FLOOR (FELT LIKE 4TH SINCE THERE IS AN HIGH MEZZANINE) AND, LIKE THE MOST OLD BUILDINGS IN BERLIN, WITHOUT ELEVATOR! The apartment is located in one of the most beautiful streets of Berlin, designed in 1855 by the famous landscape architect Peter Joseph Lenné. Features include 1 double bed (160x200),  drawers, 1 bench, a washing machine with integrated dryer, 1 wardrobe. The kitchen equipment includes refrigerator, dishwasher, electric stove, oven, coffee maker, kettle, toaster, cutlery, tableware and cookware plus a table with a bench and two chairs.  Bed linen and towels are provided. Breakfast upon request for 3€/person (daily price).

summary: Attention friendly dog! One of your hosts will be a furry one. Bedroom with double bed (plus couchbed possible), desk & a closet. We renovated the apartment last year ourselves, so theres a wooden floor, an eat-in kitchen & a living room. And access to the (tiny, very old) bath with shower. Far away from being perfect and chic, but cosy. Important:  Internet can only be used by signing an assumption of liability for illegal downloading or streaming (see house rules)

name: Stay with the cool cats in Kreuzberg
summary: Enjoy this stylish 94 m2 apartment - with your own, private bedroom and your own, private washroom. Relax in a fully equipped & recently renovated home, just a short walk from U-bahn 6 & 7. It is the ultimate base to explore Berlin.
space: The apartment was redone and upgraded in 2013, including a new kitchen and two, separate washrooms. The electrical system is also completely new, with ridiculous amounts of power outlets in all rooms. The place is modern, clean, fully equipped and has a very Scandinavian feel to it, with wooden floors, high ceiling, big windows and lots of daylight. Blinds will help you sleep in after a good night out, though :) The place is tucked away in a very quiet street in an otherwise vibrant neighbourhood. You're sheltered from the usual cosmopolitan 24/7 noise, yet still you're just half a block away from the big city buzz. The guest bedroom easily accommodates couples, with a big bed (200x220 cm), a spacious wardrobe with lots of hangers, shelves and drawers. Three inflatable beds are available too, for special occasions. Perhaps you want some friends to stay over? That can most certainly be arranged.

host_about:
Hello there, stranger :) 

I firmly believe you choose AirBnb because you want a genuine experience; a stay with that extra something that hotels just can't provide. That extra something I aim to deliver. It can be local knowledge, a trip around the blocks, someone to help you plan your trip before you're here, a host that may recommend and book tables or places, or in other ways improve your stay. I'm here to help, and I want you to have a great time, whatever that entails, or means to you.

I'm a Norwegian journalist - and a freelance foreign correspondent - currently commuting between work in Oslo, Norway and spare time in Berlin, Germany. I've been travelling alone for years - on several continents - and hopefully you'll benefit from my experiences. I do believe I know a few things about what a traveler appreciates on the road. 

I love cooking; healthy, vegetarian or not, Norwegian seafood, anything that might tickle the taste buds. I read Spanish, German and Scandinavian languages too, but please allow me to reply to your message in English :)

I'm looking forward to hear from you. Welcome you are!

Cheers,
Thor

name: Lovely space in the heart of Kreuzberg
summary: Big and fully equipped room in Kreuzberg, where the international beat meets the ethnical soul, possibly the best area of Berlin.
space: The "altbau" apartment is composed by two bedrooms, large bathroom, a big luminous living room and a spacious kitchen.
description: Big and fully equipped room in Kreuzberg, where the international beat meets the ethnical soul, possibly the best area of Berlin. The "altbau" apartment is composed by two bedrooms, large bathroom, a big luminous living room and a spacious kitchen. Guests have full access to all facilities including wifi, washing machine and bath-tub. I'm usually at work during the day, but I'm reachable anytime. Right in the 'GraefeKiez', considered by most the jewel in the heart of Kreuzberg, it is the ideal location to enjoy cozy atmosphere, beautiful parks the dynamic and vibrant surroundings. Plenty of delicious restaurants, typical cafes and shops around the corner. Nightlife hot-spots are also easily reachable. 1 min to Schönleinstrasse U-bahn  5 min to Kottbusser Tor U-Bahn  5 min to Hermannplatz U-Bahn  Just 5 stops with the U-Bahn to Alexanderplatz and just 4 stops to Warschauerstrasse U-Bahn 30 mins from both airports with public transports

name: Beautiful large sunny room in Berlin Mitte
summary: Instead of the other wonderful sunny room (I rented out until now), from now on the most beautiful room in my large Mitte apartment. In the middle of Berlin's gallery hub, yet peaceful and quiet thanks to its location in the scenic Heckmann Höfe. The French balcony offers a view of the synagogue, TV tower, and Berliner Dom.
space: The room (35sqm) is bright and airy--as is the entire apartment. And there isn't a piece of furniture that doesn't have a story. (I collected most of the beautiful vintage pieces from old GDR institutions, and many of them I used in my art projects.)
description: Instead of the other wonderful sunny room (I rented out until now), from now on the most beautiful room in my large Mitte apartment. In the middle of Berlin's gallery hub, yet peaceful and quiet thanks to its location in the scenic Heckmann Höfe. The French balcony offers a view of the synagogue, TV tower, and Berliner Dom. The room (35sqm) is bright and airy--as is the entire apartment. And there isn't a piece of furniture that doesn't have a story. (I collected most of the beautiful vintage pieces from old GDR institutions, and many of them I used in my art projects.)  There is a large kitchen, bathroom, and the "green salon"--the spacious living room. (With a piano!) I love to have conversations about all manners life and art over coffee or wine, but this optional, of course. Berlin's Scheunenviertel is a neighbourhood abuzz with history--and art. You're right by all the galleries, and just a stone's throw from the famous Museum Island; cute cafés and great restaurants await your vi
host_about:
I'm a visual artist and experimental filmmaker. I came to Berlin just after the Wall came down, and have been living and working here since, although my projects take me to many places all across the globe. One central aspect of my artistic work is bringing people together at tables, and that's the spirit that I like to bring to hosting guests, too. I'm always happy to provide recommendations on Berlin's vast cultural offerings.
News: I just renovated the huge stunning sunny room with the french balcony, which is from now on available (instead of the other one I rented out until now)
A beautiful room in the same large, sunny apartment,
southern exposure, view of the synagogue, the Berliner Dom and the television tower, French-inspired courtyard, a splashing fountain, flowers and birds: 
no street noise
furnished with love and care! You are very welcome!

host_about:
Hello,

I am a queer film-maker and arts producer originally from Australia who has lived in Berlin, Germany for over 7 years.  I love to cook, watch films, & ride my bike through the city.  I enjoy the changing and vibrant music and art-scenes in Berlin & am always happy to exchange stories and tips on travelling!  
I am a very relaxed host - I will always try to accomodate and help where I can, so if you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask!

I share the house together with Ivan, a queer dancer and performer from Sweden. 

Our house is open and welcoming to all genders, nationalities and sexualities.

name: Modern, art apartment Berlin Mitte
summary: This charming, modern accommodation is perfectly located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, one of the oldest borrows of art and history in Berlin. Perfect, if you are searching for a demanding and cultural city trip as a couple ore by yourself.
space: This charming apartment is located at centre of Auguststrasse, in the heart of Berlin's Mitte/Mitte district. The accommodation is very quiet, overlooking a beautiful green backyard. You will find everything you need for a cozy stay. Bed sheets and towels are provided, the kitchen is equipped with a coffee machine and basic utensils for cooking. The heart of the apartment is the round bed, perfect for relaxing after a day in the city, while the original art pieces exhibited on the wall give this place a very unique touch. Wifi, a 40" flat screen tv and a 3D blu-ray player compleat the set up.

host_about: Hello dear Guest!  From our house to the very center like Alexanderplatz or Mitte you need about 15 min by metro. The metro station Hermannplatz (the lines U7 & U8) is only 3 minutes walk from the apartment. The place where I live together with my son (11) is a spacious, cosy and bright flat in Kreuzberg/Neukölln (100 qm) with a great view over the Hasenheide Park, which you can see from the balcony. The sunny balcony belongs to the spacious room which you can rent (25 qm) with a double bed. The whole house is really friendly, quiet and clean. Therefore we'd also appreciate, when our guests would share our way of living together :) Many shopping places, supermarkets, nice restaurants, bars, big green areas outside as well as free tea & coffee at our place are always here for you. Bis bald! Ciao! See you! Na razie! Alice

host_about: i am an Israeli living in berlin. we have just bought this  apartment in the center of tel aviv, which we use as a base during our visits to israel. most of the year the apartment is rented out on airbnb, but its still our home. we expect our guests to see the apartment as their home too. we screen our guests very carefully to make sure they will be good and caring guests. the apartment is  cosy, comfortable, well equipped, fantastically located and beautifully decorated! its our treasure. if you manage to complete a booking at this apartment you will not be disappointed, and just wait to return to it once again in the future.   our wonderful son Tom, lives in tel aviv. he is a responsible young man, who will welcome our guests, show them around the apartment and attend to their needs during their stay.

name: A Couple's Nest to Explore Berlin
summary: The apartment is ideally suited for a couple eager to explore the city. It's in the heart of Kreuzberg, near Kottbusser Tor, but at the same time very quiet and light, with a park view. It has wooden floors and some 70s furniture.
space: Nice and quiet and very central at the same time.
description: The apartment is ideally suited for a couple eager to explore the city. It's in the heart of Kreuzberg, near Kottbusser Tor, but at the same time very quiet and light, with a park view. It has wooden floors and some 70s furniture. Nice and quiet and very central at the same time. You can use anything there is. The washing machine is a wash dryer. I'm usually not able to receive you personally. If this is the case I leave the key for the apartment at a nearby kiosk. It's Kreuzberg, what can I say. :-) Kottbusser Tor 5 minutes, Moritzplatz 10 minutes. There is also a bus M29 on Oranienplatz.  From Schönefeld Airport: RE7 to Alexanderplatz, than U8 to Moritzplan. From Tegel Airport: X9 bus to Ernst Reuterplatz than U1 to Kotbusser Tor There's a week ticket for 30 Euros for public transport. If you buy single tickets, but 4 at once. It's considerably cheaper.

name: Big, calm and cozy Berlin apartment
summary: Based in central Neukölln, one of Berlin's most popular quarters, this flat is nice and cozy, your room spacious and bright. Since your room is the living room, you'll have the balcony and of course you're invited to use the well equipped kitchen and bathroom. The apartment offers everything needed and the room we rent out is perfect for one person, couples or two friends.
space: This flat is a REAL flat. I live in here and only rent it out from time to time. This means, you will have access to my private space. That's ok for me, but also demands a certain respect. On the other hand, you can live something truly original in Berlin, not a flat that has only been rented for making it a flat to be sublet. You'll see my flat is personalized and not a sterile hospital room but a place to feel really good in. Sometimes we rent out a second room for up to two people, so when the offer is set to up to 4 people, there will be a big second room with a queen size bed.

host_about: I live and work in Berlin, the capital city of Germany, where I enjoy the many colours of a buzzing life and where I love meeting new people and making particular experiences. I adore travelling and, in contrast to fast pace Berlin, I seek the calm and relaxing sides, look and reach out for nature and are much more interested in basic and moderate things and way less in comfort and mobility. I like the solitude when holidays can provide it and try to find as many meditative moments in everything, especially food and nature.

name: Apartment close to Bergmann hood
summary: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof.
space: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof, in der man auch mal vor der Großstadthektik entfliehen kann.
description: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof.  Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof, in der man auch mal vor der Großstadthektik entfliehen kann. An kalten Tagen kann man es sich vor dem Kamin gemütlich machen oder man genießt den Komfort einer Fußbodenheizung. Auch an warmen Tagen lässt es sich gut in der Wohnung aushalten, da sie aufgrund der Tiefparterrlage angenehm kühl bleibt. Der Bergmannkiez ist einer der schönsten Berlins und hat allerhand zu bieten. Ob es die alte Markthalle ist, in der man täglich frische Leckereien bekommt oder die vielen kleinen Cafe's und Geschäfte in denen man durchaus mehrere Stunden verbringen kann.

name: bright room in Neukölln
summary: The room is 22 sqm big and located in my 2 room apartment in Neukölln. Since it is on the top floor, the whole apartment is very bright and sunny. The room, as well the rest of the flat, is fully furnished with hopefully everything you will need.
space: The apartment has 74 sqm in total. There is a bathroom with toilet, washing machine, bathtub and extra shower, a fully equipped kitchen with a table to sit, a large balcony with sun in the afternoon/evening, my room and your room. In your room you will find a double bed, a sofa with table and several shelves. If you are 2 and prefer not to sleep in the same bed, I can also provide you with a mattress that you can put on the floor. The bed will of course be covered with fresh linen and I can also give you some towels, if needed. There is no elevator and I live on the top (5th) floor, so a minimum of sportiness is required :)

name: Very quiet studio directly next to the park
summary: Separate studio in maisonette apartment with separate bathroom.  Bedroom with double bed 160 x 200 cm / no kitchen, but seating area with espresso machine, water boiler and fridge. 7 minutes walk to Bergmannstrasse with many bars, cafés, and restaurants
space: The studio (40 sqm) for 2 persons is located in the lower part of a maisonette apartment. This is a separate, private area, which is of course lockable. We live upstairs From the shared, spacious hallway you have direct access to the studio, which is equipped as follows: - Seating area with table and chairs - Espresso machine, milk frother, water boiler and refrigerator - Bedroom with double bed (160 x 200 cm) - Bathroom with shower, washbasin and toilet Decorated to a very high quality, modern and tasteful standard. Parquet flooring in the hallway, seating area and bedroom. Stone tiled floor in the bathroom. Underfloor heating throughout. The house is located in an idyllic, car-free oasis right in the heart of Kreuzberg, on a listed site with cobblestone courtyards and lush green spaces.  Across from the house you can access Viktoria Park directly by a private gate using the front door key. This park is famous for the Freedom Monument at the top of Kreuzberg with a great view over Ber

name: Unique and Cosy atmosphere in Kreuzberg
summary: You`ll have a spacious 30m² room with HD projector and computer workplace in the centre of Kreuzberg. Also a beautiful bathroom with rain shower. The whole flat has a wooden floor where u can feel home
space: The spacious room is about 30 square meters and has a natural wooden floor. This or the original DDR seats are perfect for Relaxing after the Long Kreuzberg nights! The bathroom also has plenty of space, which is equipped with a 2 Person shower. You can feel comfortable with all the housemates and from a prime location having a great time in the most beautiful city. Please take note that you are not booking a place to stay just for yourself. We are a young family  in Berlin with a young son who has a lot of life energy. Our two cats are curious little creatures who will attempt to cuddle you if you like that. So if your looking for a Hotel then we ask of you to book a hotel because this place is something else.

name: Cosy, bright room in Kreuzberg near Görlitzer Park
space: Quiet, sunny attic apartment  with 3 rooms (1 for you), kitchen and bathroom. The apartment is on the 6th floor, no lift!!!   Your room has a 1,40 x 2,00m bed, a desk, a wardrobe and a fan for the summer. The house is situated in a quiet street but you will find everything you need around the corner. There are many bars, restaurants,  a grocery store (5 min by feet) and the Görlitzer Park (2min by feet).

name: Awesome room right in the heart of Berlin!
summary: Hey guys, I've been using airbnb for years to travel the world and now I can finally also offer my place to host some fellow travelers :) My place could literally not be more central. It's right on Hackescher Markt, one of the hip spots in Berlin Mitte. We got tons of cafes and bars around as well as the famous Isle of Museums - which is in 5 minutes walking distance. Essentially everything is really close by and easy to reach. Public transport is 1 min away, supermarkets are also close by!
space: My apartment is really awesome. It's right in the center of Berlin on the Hackescher Markt - which is a touristic hotspot because of all the cool museums, galleries and backyards. There's even a nice market happening right in front of the house of Thursdays and Saturdays, giving you a great local feel :) Because my apartment faces the backyard, even though you're right in the middle, it's still rather calm. My apartment has all the amenities you need and the room is really big for an AirBnB room - I know because I use AirBnB to travel the world ;) It's actually the room I've been living in for 8 years myself!

summary: In einer großen Berliner Altbauwohnung wird ein Zimmer mit eigenem Bad vermietet. Das Zimmer hat einen seperaten Eingang und verfügt über ein  Doppelbett mit 1.60 Matratze. Das Zimmer hat KEINEN Zugang zu einer Küche.

name: Großes Altbauzimmer im Zentrum
summary: In unserer großen Altbauwohnung vermieten wir ein großes schönes Zimmer. Trotz der zentralen Lage ist es sehr ruhig, da es im 2. Hinterhof gelegen ist und direkt an den Gleisdreieckpark grenzt.
space: Das Zimmer ist Teil einer großen Berliner Altbau-Wohnung. Es ist 19 m² groß und hat zwei große doppelflüglige Fenster und einen wunderschönen Dielenfußboden. Es gibt ein großes Bett (1,20m), zwei Schränke, ein Sofa, Schreibtisch, Sessel und Regal. Vor dem Haus gibt es einen schönen Sitzplatz unter der großen Kastanie. Ich vermiete dieses und ein weiteres Zimmer über Airbnb und wir teilen uns die gemütliche Wohnküche und das große Badezimmer (Dusche & Badewanne). Im Preis enthalten sind sämtliche Nebenkosten (Wasser und Strom), WiFi Mitbenutzung, Waschmaschinen- und Küchen Mitbenutzung.

name: Awesome room in Berlin
summary: The Appartement is located in very nice area Berlin-Neukoelln, right away on  popular street with lots of bars. There are many cafes and small shops all around, supermarkets, turkish shops, independent cinema nearby and much more! 5 min. of walking to the Metro station (U-bahn) and 15 min. to Kreuzberg. Also the apartment situated on the back yard, so it is quiet. I'm pretty sure you will fall in love with this part of the city!
space: The apartment is cosy, clean and bright. There is everything you need for spending an awesome time in Berlin. For those who's traveling by car, there is a FREE parking space in this area.  The IMPORTANT thing: there is a dog living in the apartment (sweet French Bulldog) he is very welcoming and lovely guy, he is not bothering at all...he never barks or eats things :) he is also all the time with me, so he won't be annoying. No hair no barking :)

name: Elegant&Privat Room w/Queen Bed  in Schöneberg
summary: The 20 square meter (215 sq. ft) features a queen size bed with fine linens and towels, a down comforter, smart TV, Base radio, electric kettle and basic toiletries. The room shares one luxurious marble bathroom, complete with bidet and shower.
space: This elegant and spacious (300 sq. m) Beletage home is located in a protected and historically significant building, built in 1896. It was completely renovated in 2012, with much care to preserve its original historical details such as the stucco and painted ceiling work. The luxurious interior design with original artwork, crystal chandeliers and classic furniture makes this home a unique lodging experience in Berlin.  Central location: We are ~3 minutes away from the Nollendorfplatz subway station (U1, U2, U3, U4).

name: My Bedroom at Potsdamer Platz!
summary: I am away for 2 weeks and i want You to stay in my room for that time.  Enjoy a beatiful located flat with your own private balcony. My two roomatesd will be there to welcome you and help with all your pressing berlin question.
space: My Bedroom will be comfortable for 2 People or a loving couple. (The bed is Queensize, 140x200cm)
description: I am away for 2 weeks and i want You to stay in my room for that time.  Enjoy a beatiful located flat with your own private balcony. My two roomatesd will be there to welcome you and help with all your pressing berlin question. My Bedroom will be comfortable for 2 People or a loving couple. (The bed is Queensize, 140x200cm) Apart from  my roomates private rooms, nothing is off limits. You are free to use both our bathrooms and make yourself something to eat in our kitchen or chill on our couch/ balcony anytime you want. You`ll get access to our 100mbit/s high speed Internet connection. If you need to wash some clothes/ iron them, we got you covered. Towels will be provided. Potsdamer Platz is in Berlin`s heart. You can pretty much find anything you want close by. -Shopping areas like Germanys biggest shopping mall (Mall of Berlin), OV Cinema, Berlins biggest Casino, Theaters (Blue man Group for example.) by foot you can go to tourist attractions like the: -Brandenburger Tor  -Checkpoin
host_about: Backpacker from Germany :)

name: Berlin@its best: central&cozy room
summary: The flat is located in the touristic center of Berlin and only 5 minutes walking distance from Alexanderplatz and the museum island! It's is very quiet and you will hear absolutely no noise from the street - the best reward for a 5th floor walk up!
space: Hello! I'm offering a double bedroom (bed size 1.40x2.00m) in my apartment in Berlin city center with less than five minutes walking distance to Alexanderplatz, Hackesche Höfe and Museum Island. Besides your bedroom (towels provided) with extra couch and chest of drawers, the apartment has an open kitchen with combined living kitchen and a big bathroom. The fully equipped kitchen has a dish washer, water kettle and oven. Of course, you can also use Wireless Lan (WIFI).  Note that the apartment is on the 5th floor without an elevator. You'll be rewarded with a sunlit and quiet flat! See you soon!

name: Nice room in the center of Berlin
summary: Important: 1. Please don't send me any booking request, but a "normal" message. Because I usually take more than 24 hours to confirm. Im not always online and work too much. If you write my anyway,  I will ask you to cancel the request+answer my questions. 2. Please send me your scheduled check-in and check-out hours, that I can personally receive you. Reason of the trip would be nice. 3. Please write to me only if you have at least 3 good reviews. 4. Please look at the house rules. Many Thanks
space: A nice room with ca. 16 qm in the 10th floor of an GDR building. A lot of people doesnt read my profile. They only want to book quickly a room.  But its important for me, that you read everything.  Im doing airbnb not as a professional host. So, I only accept 1 booking per month.  Im living in my flat and if you coming to my flat, its not like going into a hotel. Its more visiting a real person.  I hope you understand what I mean;o)

Berliner der gerne nach Südeuropa verreist. 
In Berlin bin ich in zwei Restaurants tätig, unter anderem in einem veganen Restaurant. Bin allerdings kein Veganer.
Würde gerne noch viel mehr verreisen, kann es aus beruflichen Gründen leider viel zu wenig.

Ansonsten bin ich aus dem Partyalter raus und mag eher gutes Essen und Getränke. 
Treibe aktiv Sport und bin Kunst und Kultur interessiert.

name: Central, quiet, and bright apt
summary: I indicate here the dates during which it's an entire apt. The rest of the time you'd be sharing the space w/me but have your own bedroom, of course. **I'll next be away 2-29 July, 23-25 Aug, 4 Sept-6 Oct (min.3 wk booking).** PLEASE indicate you are aware of this. I have a guestroom with a single bed in my lovely apt with balcony 2 minutes walk from Rosenthaler Pl station. It's quiet& bright; with a comfy mattress&good water pressure in the shower.  What else? Wifi, sheets, towels, etc incl.
space: It is a three room apartment: Two bedrooms and an open plan kitchen/living area with balcony. Full bathroom. Everything's fairly new and furnished to a high standard. Sonos speakers in all rooms, Dyson cordless vacuum, new washing machine. Very comfy guest bed. I find myself travelling quite a bit of the time so I am renting out the single bedroom while I am away (minus my bedroom, but it's still a full one bedroom apartment, not just a studio) and if needed also while I am in town, too. Single bookings only, please; no pets, no kids, no couples. Please note I don't have a drier, microwave, iron as I never use them. The bed is a single but v comfy and the place has basement bike storage access.

name: Unique vintage apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Beautiful and unique 40sqm vintage apartment in what I like to call the "Paris of Berlin". The apartment is located on a quiet cobblestone street between Bergmannstrasse, full of shops, cafés and restaurants, and the famous Tempelhofer field.
space: The apartment is set on the ground floor of a nice old building. The apartment has the original floors, high ceilings with ornaments. Most of my furniture is vintage and made from natural materials. But there is Wi-fi of coarse, don't worry! :)   This is my actual apartment where I actually live, so there is a lot of my stuff there. So I hope you just feel like visiting a friend! Welcome home! :)
description: Beautiful and unique 40sqm vintage apartment in what I like to call the "Paris of Berlin". The apartment is located on a quiet cobblestone street between Bergmannstrasse, full of shops, cafés and restaurants, and the famous Tempelhofer field. The apartment is set on the ground floor of a nice old building. The apartment has the original floors, high ceilings with ornaments. Most of my furniture is vintage and made from natural materials. But there is Wi-fi of coarse, don't worry! :)   This is my actual apartment where I actually live, so there is a lot of my stuff there. So I hope you just feel like visiting a friend! Welcome home! :) You have acces to the entire apartment. The Bergmannkiez, how this area around Bergmannstrasse is called, is full of small shops, nice cafés and amazing restaurants. You will find food from Tibet, Vietnam, Korea, India, Sudan, Italy, Austria, Turkey and many, many more right around the corner.  You will also find the "Marheineke Markthalle", a restored ma
host_about: Hi there, I am a journalist/filmmaker living in Berlin Kreuzberg. I love traveling and experiencing new cultures and places and I also love welcoming people from all over the world to my beautiful city! Hope to meet you soon :)

name: Sunny Design Apartment at Tempelhof
summary: A sunny two room apartment on the 4th floor, perfectly located to explore the vibrant district of Neukölln right at the Tempelhof field. Art work, authentic design, Danish antique furniture and quality equipment make a longer stay comfortable.
space: The flat possesses: BEDROOM: with a hand-painted mountaneous landscape, creating an atmosphere of serenity and harmony, suiting ideally for a good sleep. The sunny-side BALCONY extends from the bedroom and borders with the kitchen, inviting to have a comfy breakfast right on the balcony, overlooking the busy street of Tempelhofer entrance. KITCHEN: made from steel, wood and marble tiles it creates a natural feeling and allows for comfortable and creative cooking. The art work and the Danish design chairs and table turn the kitchen into a nice dining room. Amenities: Kettle, wash machine, dish washer, fridge, freezer, bialetti coffee maker, pots, pans, ice-cream machine. LIVING ROOM: Art work, sound system (4 speakers), built-in sideboard, allow for good relaxation and entertainment. BATHROOM: Luxury materials, rain shower head and built in ceiling speakers create a unique showering experience. WALK-IN Wardrobe: provides broader space for your clothes and luggage

name: Spacious and cozy room with balcony
summary: Welcome to my cozy two-room flat in the heart of Kreuzkölln. The flat is perfectly located in a small and quiet side-street of the well known Weserstraße and three minutes walking distance to the beautiful canal. Your private room has got a balcony!
space: The flat is situated on the first floor. It’s very cosy and lovely furnished. Sometimes it’s also possible to rent my room with another double bed for two more guests.
description: Welcome to my cozy two-room flat in the heart of Kreuzkölln. The flat is perfectly located in a small and quiet side-street of the well known Weserstraße and three minutes walking distance to the beautiful canal. Your private room has got a balcony! The flat is situated on the first floor. It’s very cosy and lovely furnished. Sometimes it’s also possible to rent my room with another double bed for two more guests. Bathroom and kitchen are shared and of course free to use as much as you want. Cooking basics like salt and sugar can be used by you. I want you to feel comfortable and I respect your privacy. But don’t hesitate to ask if you have any questions or if you need some tips. There are a lot of nice bars, cafes, galleries and small shops around. Two times a week there is a Turkish market at Maybachufer where on saturdays a design market takes places. For spending a bit time in nature Hasenheide and Tempelhofer Feld are only 15 minutes walking distance away. U-Bahn stations (U7, U8)

name: Cozy 20sq m room, for women only
summary: The flat is located in a typical old Berlin building, only few minutes from the riverside "Landwehrkanal". It's a privat room in a shared apartment. Besides you it's me and my little son living in the apartment. The room is big and very quiet.
space: My pictures are not professional, but honest. It's better to keep things true.:) The flat is in a quite building but on the one of the most lively and beloved area, witness the many cafes and restaurants which are now livening our street up. It is nearby the canal, between Kreuzberg and Neukölln. Twice a week you'll find a beautifull crowded Turkish market on the channel bank (Maybachufer), a handcraft market on saturday at the same place, and a new flea market (Nowkoelln Flowmarket) every second sunday.

name: Cozy Apartment
summary: This charming, new renovated accommodation is perfectly located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, one of the oldest borrows of art and history in Berlin. Perfect, if you are searching for a demanding and cultural city trip as a couple ore by yourself.
space: This charming apartment is located at centre of Auguststrasse, in the heart of Berlin's Mitte/Mitte district. The accommodation is very quiet, overlooking a beautiful green backyard. You will find everything you need for a cozy stay. Bed sheets and towels are provided, the kitchen is equipped with a coffee machine and basic utensils for cooking.
description: This charming, new renovated accommodation is perfectly located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, one of the oldest borrows of art and history in Berlin. Perfect, if you are searching for a demanding and cultural city trip as a couple ore by yourself. This charming apartment is located at centre of Auguststrasse, in the heart of Berlin's Mitte/Mitte district. The accommodation is very quiet, overlooking a beautiful green backyard. You will find everything you need for a cozy stay. Bed sheets and towels are provided, the kitchen is equipped with a coffee machine and basic utensils for cooking. The Auguststraße is one of Berlins most famous places to visit galleries, go shopping and experience great food. Some nice asian restaurants, local bars and fine dining locations are worth a visit. Berlins old city center (Sophiestraße, Hackescher Markt) is just around the corner. You can easily have a nice walk trough the neighborhood or use the public transport to go wherever you like. Subway, tram
host_about:
Seid 1995 führe ich erfolgreich eine Galerie für zeitgenössische Kunst in der Auguststraße. Meine Mitarbeiter und ich freuen uns gute Gastgeber zu sein. Wir lieben die kulturelle, gastronomische und internationale Vielfalt unseres Viertels.
Das motiviert uns unser bestes zu geben.

name: Zentral und gemütlich. Eigener Balkon.
summary: Kreativ und liebevoll eingerichtete Wohnung im Herzen von Berlin, begehrte Sehenswürdigkeiten, Gastronomie, Kultur, Theater, Veranstaltungen, Events, Lebensmittelgeschäfte, Bäckereien, Einkaufscenter und Geschäfte in unmittelbarer Nähe und fußläufig schnell erreichbar oder 5 Min mit dem Auto, so auch Checkpoint Charly, Brandenburger Tor, Potsdamer Platz, Alexander Platz u.v.m.
space: Ob Kultur Gast, Business, Schüler oder Student..., bestens geeignet. Nach einem anstrengenden und erlebnisreichen Tag, ist der Rückzug in eine ruhige und gemütliche Unterkunft am schönsten. Diese befindet sich in der sechsten Etage mit Fahrstuhl. Du schläfst auf einem komfortablen und sehr gemütlichen Design Wandbett 140x200. Zudem ist das Zimmer mit einer schönen Couch, welche ebenso zum Entspannen und Einkuscheln einlädt ausgestattet sowie ein Flachbild TV, ein großer Esstisch und ein schöner überdachter Balkon für das Frühstücken im Freien oder einfach nur für chillige Momente auch bei Regen.

host_about:
Ich arbeite als Projektkoordinatorin und Schwimmtrainerin. Meine Hobbys sind Sport, Zeichnen/Malen, Lesen. Freue mich über Gäste aus aller Welt und bin immer wieder interessiert neues über Land und Kultur zu erfahren.
Ich bin eine sehr freundliche und zuverlässige Person und Gastgeberin. Ordnung und Sauberkeit sind mir sehr wichtig. Ich respektiere und achte jedes Lebewesen und bin stets für Anstand und Ehrlichkeit.

name: Klein und auf Zeit Dein
summary: Das Zimmer liegt ruhig im HP des Hinterhauses eines Kreuzberger Mehrfamilienhauses. Es ist hell und freundlich mit einem Hochbett eingerichtet.   Liebst du genauso Sauberkeit und Ordnung wie ich, dann bist du ein willkommener Gast in meinem Zuhause.
space: Wer einen Fön, oder das Bügeleisen benutzen möchte kann mich ruhig ansprehen, ich teile diese Geräte mit meinen Gästen. Das Bett ist zum check in frisch bezogen und du bekommst ein frisches Händehandtuch. Weitere Handtücher liegen im Schrank bereit. Für das frisch Beziehen des Bettes wärend des Aufenthaltes ist der Gast selbst zuständig. Ich gebe auf Anfrage gerne frische Wäsche raus. Langzeitgäste bekommen auch gerne den Staubsauger für das Zimmer. Möchte ein Gast, dass wöchendlich das Zimmer gereingt und das Bett frisch bezogen wird, dann können wir ein zusätzlichen Preis verhandeln.

Wir teilen uns die Küche, die Essecke, das Bad und den Flur...Langzeitgäste können auch die Waschmaschine im Souterrain nutzen und dort die Wäsche zum trockn
host_about: Ich trage den Stempel Sozialarbeiterin und habe 3 Kinder. Ich bin offen für andere Menschen und habe meine Grenzen. Zu Hause bin ich sehr gemütlich. Ich freue mich über Ansprache, bin aber auch mit mir selbst zufrieden. Erwarte nicht, dass ich dich beschäftige, du darfst einfach sein.

name: Organic & Eco I Your room directly Rosenthaler Pl!
summary: Awesome place for visiting Berlin! Zentrally located in Mitte, around the corner from Hackescher Markt. Sleep like a baby and be in the middle of Berlin at the same time. Recommendations for cafés, restaurants and bars included! Feel at home!
space: Your cosy room in a wonderful flat directly at Rosenthaler Platz, the heart of Berlin-Mitte! Your room  Your private room includes a comfortable 1,40*2m bed, which sleeps up to two people, an Eames-Chair, a Marshall bluetooth box, and a big wardrobe, wherein you can put everything. You have a desk to work on. You can work in addition at the table in the kitchen. Wifi is accessible everywhere in the flat. Strong, darkening curtains give you a peaceful sleep. In winter I have warm winter blankets, in sommer light sommer blankets. Look forward to freshly washed, awesomely smelling towels and sheets! An iron and ironing board is available. A room with a view! Out of your window you see the Sophie-Church (Sophienkirche), the rooftops of Berlin, a chestnut tree, and the Berlin Dome, one of the most beautiful architectures in Berlin. name: colour your life in Berlin.
summary: Hello, do you want to spend a couple of days in Berlin, the city of joy? don´t miss the opportunity to enjoy the city and see life from another perspective. We offer a room to stay, comfortable, clean and in the middle of the place to be!
space: In our department, there is everything you need to spend a nice holiday but also the necessary tranquility if your trip is for business.
description: Hello, do you want to spend a couple of days in Berlin, the city of joy? don´t miss the opportunity to enjoy the city and see life from another perspective. We offer a room to stay, comfortable, clean and in the middle of the place to be! In our department, there is everything you need to spend a nice holiday but also the necessary tranquility if your trip is for business. During your stay, you can use the kitchen if you wish, the w.c. and the shower are separate rooms so you do not have to wait for someone to come out of the bathroom to take a shower or vice versa. For work reasons, there are certain days when I'm out of town. But I can always be reached by phone or online. My flatmate can also assist you in case of doubts. My home is located in the coolest area of Berlin. There are three parks in the vicinity, the canal and twice a week there is a market where you can buy fresh fruits and vegetables, as well as endless curiosities, on Saturdays, there is a market of designers. The be

name: cosy room in 3-room apartment at canal/Neukölln
summary: the apartment is furnished and decorated mostly by self made furniture and storytelling objects.
space: Hello and welcome! : ) The third room of the apartment can be rented for approx. maximum ten weeks. Spoken languages are German, English, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese. The big, fully equipped kitchen is located centered in the apartment and can be used completely. As energy and resources are not infinite and self-evident on our earth, we try to treat them in a healthy way. It would be nice if also you bring a consciousness or interest for the use of water and energy. The apartment ist just next to the canal/Neukölln where you can take a walk and also the weekly Turkish market can be reached in 5 minutes walking distance. name: Central luxury loft
summary: Loft 70 sqm for private rent for 2 people, bedroom, living room, bathroom. Apartment is on the 5th floor, no elevator: Very bright, very quiet because of insulated windows. Very central, very good connections.
space: The house where the loft is located was the first Ursuline monastery in Berlin. Built in 1746. Convent added in 1836. The girls' school was built in 1911. In 1985 a gallery with adjoining cafe was opened. An artists' refuge since 1984: Musician, photographer, sculptor and script writer. The café which I run was the first classroom. This is how the Ursulines began. In 1911 a girl's school was built. Fresh food is prepared in my café. The coffee is delicious and the cakes are home-made. The house is very central and everything can be reached on foot: Checkpoint Charlie about 5 minutes. Jewish Museum 10 minutes. Berlin Gallery the same distance. Likewise Potsdamerplatz, Alexanderplatz, Neue Mitte is not far. Very good transport connections in front of the house. The M 29 goes every 8 minutes. The U2 to Spittelmarkt goes every 5 minutes. Kochstrasse. U6 corner of Friedrichstrasse. Restaurants.Italian Sale e Tabacchi, opposite Nobel Restaurant Kochstrasse Rudi Dutschke Strasse

name: In the middle of Berlin, just 3 mins to Alex!
summary: Hello the lovely people of the world! We offer an  accommodation (renovated) in the east heart of Berlin for one person or a couple (second person costs only 10 EUR) with a small balcony. Near Alexanderplatz, so you have the TV Tower directly in front of your eyes. Nevertheless the room is quite and very nice for a proper rest.
space: As you can see from the reviews, the whole appartment is very clean.  Our building is very central, so that you just need 7 mins to the main station and the famous Alexanderplatz is 5 mins away to walk. Museum Island as well as many sights, such as the East Side Gallery, can also be reached on foot.  Although the location is so central, the accommodations are very quiet. The owners are living in the apartment.

But please be patien
host_about:
Ich bin  Mutter von einem Zweijährigen, begeisterte Soziologin in Genderfragen, verheiratet und arbeite bei einem NGO :) Familie, meine engsten Freunde, Bücher, Politik und gutes Essen sind Sachen, ohne die ich definitiv nicht leben könnte! 
Reisen tue ich gerne in die Städte, die nicht unbedingt chaotisch sind, weil ich selbst in einer chaotischen großgeworden bin. Den Strand liebe ich. 
Mama und ich sind seit Anfang 2016 Airbnb-Gastgeberinnen. Ich bin die, die hinter dem Computer sitzt und die Kommunikation erledigt, die meiste Arbeit wird von meiner Mama getan. Bisher wird sie immer als "sehr tolle Frau" bezeichnet, also macht sie was Gutes :)

name: Beautiful room in the center of Neukölln
summary: The apartment is located in Neukölln, bordering Kreuzberg (Kreuzkölln). There are many cafés, restaurants and bars around the corner. It will take you a 5 min walk to the the Tempelhofer Feld and the canal is as well in walking distance. Since the train station of the U8-line is in front of the building, it is easy to reach other areas in the city.
description: The apartment is located in Neukölln, bordering Kreuzberg (Kreuzkölln). There are many cafés, restaurants and bars around the corner. It will take you a 5 min walk to the the Tempelhofer Feld and the canal is as well in walking distance. Since the train station of the U8-line is in front of the building, it is easy to reach other areas in the city. The room is 20 sqm big. Furthermore you will have access to the bathroom and a small kitchen. I sublet the room when I go travelling. The apartment is placed right at the train station Boddinstraße. It will take you 5 min by foot to Hermannplatz and Gräfekiez and the canal in Kreuzberg are 5 min away by bike or 2 stops on the U8. You can reach the airport Tegel in 45 min by public transportation, to Schönefeld it will take you about 30 min. If you are coming by train, the main train station is reachable in 25 min. My flatmate and other guests might also at the apartment during your stay.
host_about: Tried airbnb already as a guest and it's a wonderful thing;-)

host_about:
Ich bin (noch) Student, 29 Jahre jung und lebe seit 8 Jahren in Berlin. Ich lese, reise, male und fotografiere in meiner Freizeit gerne und viel. Mag gutes Essen, interessante Menschen und fremde Städte. 

Als Gast bin ich: zuverlässig, ordentlich, gehe mit dem Eigentum anderer so um, wie ich mir auch den Umgang mit meinen eigenen Sachen wünsch. 

Als Gastgeber versuche ich meinen Gästen einen angenehmen Aufenthalt ihren individuellen Bedürfnissen entsprechend zu ermöglichen.

name: Hell und wunderschöner Blick - barrierefrei
summary: Große Fenster im 5.Stock direkt am Landwehrkanal. Moderne Ausstattung. Die Wohnung ist für Rollstuhlfahrer geeignet.
space: With a lift you reach the fith floor where our apartment is a retreat for a relaxing stay. A television set for cable TV and radio reception and with integrated DVD / CD player contributes to your comfort. The free WIFI – internet access let you stay in contact with your family and the world. Or just relax on the balcony watching boats and people. The apartment is equipped in an elegant and modern style. On 50 sqm the apartment offers ample space for the convenience of up to 4 guests with a big bed (180 x 200 box-spring type matrasses) in the separate bed room and a sofa-bed (160 x 200) in the living room. The kitchen is well equipped with dishes, glasses, cutlery and cooking wares and a dishwasher. In the bathroom you will also find a washing machine which is convenient for longer stays.

name: Renovated apartment in the center of Berlin
summary: This newly renovated flat does not only offer a tastefully furnished place, but it is also located in Kreuzberg, a popular and trendy district. Hundreds of cute, tiny stores are right aroung the corner, the connections couldn't be better. In case you like the flat and it's not shown as available, just contact me, we might be able to arrange something though.
space: The flat is small with 36 squaremeters, but every single centimeter of it is decorated with love. I put much value on cleanliness and that my guests feel well during their stay. I offer you a small welcome basket including different things always changing. Usually, I offer you some fruits and sweets and you are welcome to use anything in the kitchen (with the exception of food, but feel free to use herbs, spices and so on) and also in the shower. I will provide towels for you and of course bed sheets and the bed is prepared as well.

host_about: I like both; I love travelling around the world, sleeping in a tent or a car and being messy and not caring about tomorrow. But I also love going out fancy, having my own bed and a reason to wake up the next day because of the duties one has in life. Life is beautiful, people are and there is nothing better than being connected to the entire world.

name: Cozy & bright room in Kreuzberg
summary: The flat is right next to Paul-Linke-Ufer, 2 rooms, bathroom and big kitchen
space: Die Wohnung hat zwei Zimmer, ein Schlafzimmer, ein Wohnzimmer sowie eine großzügige Küche, die zum Verweilen einlädt.   Die Reichenberger Straße hat einen herrlichen Kiez mit unzähligen kleinen Bars und Restaurants in der Nachbarschaft. Bei jedem Spaziergang kann man etwas neues entdecken, kleine Shops mit allem was das Herz begehrt oder cozy Cafés zum abhängen oder auch arbeiten. Auch kann man sich beim Fahrradladen unten im Haus zu einem günstigen Preis ein Rad für den Tag leihen und so die Umgebung erkunden.

name: Cute Renovated Apartment in Graefe-Kiez (Bedroom)
summary: You will be living right next to the Landwehrkanal and the famous Admiralsbrücke – where to watch the most scenic sunset in Berlin, surrounded by shops and cafés in a lovely neighbourhood.
space: THE FLAT -   Modern meets rustic in the heart of Berlin-Kreuzberg: 72 qm (770 sq ft) two bedroom apartment, first floor in quiet rear house, completely renovated, features original 1900's details and high ceilings, original hardwood timber flooring and exposed brick, newly finished kitchen, modern bath, and flooring details.   A cozy space in a vibrant neighbourhood with a ton of coffee shops, cute restaurants, bars and music venues, flea markets, parks, endless places for breakfast or to eat even at night.  Just a 15 minutes’ walk from subway stops ‘Kottbusser Tor’ (U 1, U 8 or Bus N1) or ‘Südstern’ (U 7 or Bus 140); there is a taxi stand nearby. An island of calm amid the beautiful chaos of pulsating Graefe-Kiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg. After long days or crazy nights, you will come home to a warm cup of tea and your clean, comfortable and large bedroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. YOUR ROOM -   Private, very spacious bedroom 26 qm (270 sq ft)

name: Calm Room - District Center
summary: I offer a cozy room with a distinguished bed for two (plate slatted frame & grade a mattress) in a calm surrounding.  Outside lies one of Berlin’s artistic streets in a prestigious, historical and flourishing spot of center district with all its sights. Connections to airports are directly established. Main-trainstation is closeby. I love to introduce Berlin backgrounds and enjoy pleasant encounters. Monday-Thursday: for single travelers (coulpes send a request, please )
space: You will find a nicely renovated old building with high ceilings. You enjoy the feel of nice wooden floors, quality wooden windows, in an overall center district quality building. The windows are to a calm yard with no street noise. Furniture is a comfortably endowed bed with qualified shock-absorbing matrass (good for two!) in hardness H2 on a plate-frame duckboard.  There’s a a light table and a nice armchair, cozy lamps, darkening curtain and cupboard in your room. Laptop table is optional if you need to work. Towels are included and handed out on demand.

host_about:
I live in Berlin for over 8 years now, and have not regretted it. I love its multicultural atmossphere.
I got to know a lot of clubs, bars and restaurants, but am always surprised how quick Berlin changes.

I think Airbnb is a good way to get people together and share as well as promote local life!
I know how precious holidays is, that is why I ask my guests early about their preferences and try to find out individual wishes to recommend what fits you best. It makes me smile if guests travel on with precious memories.

On the photo you see me sailing in the Caribbean last winter, another endeavor I can recommend.

name: Vintage flat Berlin
summary: My flat is close to: Nowkoelln Flowmarkt, Chrome vintage Store, Burrito Baby, Moviemento Kino, Myxa Berlin, le bon, Brezel Company, Holy flat vegetarian.  It's appropriate for singles, couples, businesspeople and small families (with children).
space: It's a 50sqm cosy street level appartment with 2 rooms. In 1 room is my buero and the big one is reserved for you! The buero is rarely used and only during the day, so for the rest of the time the whole flat is yours. It's a chilled, vivid neighborhood with cafes and small shops nearby. At night it is still a mostly quite place. The overall energy is sort of artsy.

name: Bright and spacious room wth balcony and roof top!
summary: The apartment is located in Neukölln (Kreuzkölln), one of Berlins youngest and most vibrant neigbourhoods. Its on the 5th level, right underneath the roof and has a beautiful view across the city. No elevator!  The apartment has two private bedrooms and a shared kitchen and a shared bathroom.  Your room is approximately 18sqm with access to a little balcony, a proper bed and access to the roof top via a ladder.
space: The 60sqm, two-bedroom flat offers space for max 3 people.  The shared bathroom has a bath tub and a washing machine and you will find a fully-equipped shared kitchen with gas stove.

name: Spacious room in Graefekiez / Xberg / Neukoelln
summary: Hey there, I offer a big and bright room (30 sqm) in my nice flat (100 sqm) at Graefekiez or Kreuzkoelln. Comes with big bed (180x200 cm) and a small desk, we share the big living room kitchen and the bathroom with bathtub. Location's very convenient, short walk to the canal, organic-markets and underground not even 5 minutes away. It’s easy to get to Mitte, Neukoln. The apartment is located next to a busy road, so if you are really sensitive to sound this might not be the right place for you.

name: middle of Berlins city
summary: I'm letting a room in my cosy city centre apartment in Berlin Mitte/Prenzlauerberg. If you're on your own or a couple looking for a quiet but central place to stay for a good price look no further.  People living here work and live in Berlin so if you're staying with me you can truly experience the Berlin way of life. The main sights of Berlin can all be reached by foot e.g. Brandenburger Gate, TV Tower, Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz and many more.
space: I'm letting a room in my cosy city centre apartment in Berlin Mitte/Prenzlauerberg. If you're on your own or a couple looking for a quiet but central place to stay for a good price look no further. The flat is 80sqm and consist of kitchen, dining room/living room, balcony, office as well as two bedrooms. It's located in a quiet area and in a block of apartments typical for Berlin.  People living here work and live in Berlin so if you're staying with me you can truly experience the Berlin way of life. host_about:
Ohne Musik steh ich erst gar nicht auf, Tanzen immer und überall, egal wie. Essen am liebsten in meinen Lieblingrestaurants (Hans im Glück, Il Patrino & Feinschmeckerei) wenn das nicht geht, koche ich auch gerne, aber nur für zwei, alleine macht es einfach keinen Spaß. Ansonsten liebe ich Pasta, bzw. alles was irgendwie mit Italien zutun hat. Italien dorthin reise ich nämlich am liebsten, wenn nicht, dann nach Spanien(Barcelona, Madrid), Portugal, Frankreich, England, will unbedingt nach Schweden und Irland, Bodensee, Ost- und Nordsee,dahin aber am liebsten im Herbst, wenn es stürmt:-). Liege gerne am Strand dann aber nur mit einem Buch, am liebsten Henning Mankell, Charlotte Link, Ingrid Noll, Andreas Franz oder Hermann Hesse. Mag eigentlich sonst gerne auch Städtereisen, Berlin, München, London, Paris, Wien, Prag, sooft es nur geht. Dann am liebsten mit dem Auto, weil es einfach nichts schöneres gibt als autofahren. Dazu meine Lieblingcd´s: Mtv the very best of Unplugged, Der König tanzt, Mumfords Wir sind Helden, Tomte uvm... je nach Laune. Wenn ich hier bin, liebe ich den Englischen Garten, es gibt keinen schöneren, bei schlechtem Wetter liebe ich mein Bett, kombiniert mit Walt Disney Filmen und alle mit Julia Roberts und ok ich muss es zugeben, ich liebe einfach alle Klassiker und Schnulzen, dazu Ritter Sport weiße Vollnuss, oder Kinder Schokobons oder am End alles von Kinder..... Dann am liebsten mit dicken Socken damit ich wundervolle Wellfeetprodukte benutzen kann. Wenn ich nicht im Bett liege, gehe ich auch gerne ins Kino oder ins Theater. Vorallem Shakespeare, Goethe, Brecht, Ibsen, Satre haben es mir angetan, aber auch der Jugendclub in Wiesbaden... 
Wenn ich nicht zu Hause bin und auch sonst nirgendswo findest Du mich bei schönem Wetter wohl jetzt im Seehaus, Flaucher, Echinger See oder bei den Touris am Chinesischen Turm, entweder mit Radler, Vodka Schwarze Dose, Veneto Spritz oder Hugo in der Hand, im Winter eher mit nem Glas Wein bei mir in der Küche.

name: Central, quiet place in Kreuzberg with big terrace
summary: Our flat is located near Viktoriapark, which is a very central and quiet neighbourhood. Everything is spacious and cosy, including a big terrace heading to the green an quiet courtyard. Your private room will be our guest room (see pictures).
space: Our flat is located near Viktoriapark, which is a very central and quiet neighbourhood. Everything is very spacious and cosy.
description: Our flat is located near Viktoriapark, which is a very central and quiet neighbourhood. Everything is spacious and cosy, including a big terrace heading to the green an quiet courtyard. Your private room will be our guest room (see pictures). Our flat is located near Viktoriapark, which is a very central and quiet neighbourhood. Everything is very spacious and cosy. You have access to your private room and to the bathroom, kitchen, living/dining room. We are always available for questions via telephone, e-mail, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) etc. - and of course always in person when we are at home in Berlin. Despite the quiet location everything is nearby at a walking distance: several supermarkets and other shops, bars, restaurants, ice cream shops, two big parks and more and more ... Several metro and bus stops are just around the corner. The railway station Südkreuz is only about 2 km far, main station (Hauptbahnhof) about 4 km.
host_about: Matthias & Michele from Berlin. Matthias works as a PR journalist and a photographer. Michele is an antique dealer, working in Berlin and in Italy.  In terms of vacation we like to visit cities sometimes, but mostly far away places that are good for hiking, biking etc. Most of the times our dog Buddy is with us.

name: Bright apartment close to Alexanderplatz
summary: Cozy independent room (with private bathroom and kitchen)  in Mitte, area of Central Berlin, close to Alexanderplatz, one minute walk from Jannowitzbrücke U- and S-Bahn (train) station, offers accomodity for up to two guests including all needed facilities. This room comprises a comfortable super king size bed. A sofa also folds out to a second bed if needed. There is also a small desk with office chair, tv, and free wifi - fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with shower/bathtub, wash machine.
space: This is a well maintained and modern room in Mitte, the central area of Berlin. This room accommodation comprises a comfortable super king size bed. A sofa also folds out to a second bed if needed. There is also a small desk with office chair, tv, and free wifi. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a bench with 3 bar stools. Appliances include dishwasher,  fridge, microwave, kettle, electric stove with 2 hotplates and standard accessories such as cutlery, cups, plates, utensils, cutting board, etc. There is also a independent bathroom with shower and washing machine. The guests are provided with towels, bedsheets, shampoo and soap. There is a paid street side parking outside the building which is available most of the time. Free parking can be found in the neighbourhood. Close to Alexanderplatz and one minute walk from Jannowitzbrücke U- and S-Bahn (train) station.

host_about:
I'm 39 years old, 5”10 = 178 cm tall,  weigh 73 kg. I have green eyes, dark blond hair. I'm fluent in Russian and English.

I was born in Russia, but have lived in London for the past 18 years and Berlin for the past 6 years. I now have UK citizenship.

I like positivity and positive people, I just don’t need negativity in my life.

I only aloud to stay at my place beautiful people with beautiful souls.

I like to travel a lot.

You be good to me and i'll be good to you. Simple

name: Charming room @il.faro.blu.kreuzberg
summary: Spacious, bright, cozy apartment, in the heart of Kreuzberg, right by the boundary line between east and west Berlin.
space: We are renting a charming bedroom with a lovely private bathroom :) the room is furnished with a double bed, desk and wardrobe (take a look at the pictures) . The spacious and cozy apartment is situated in the heart of Kreuzberg. Wrangel kiez is a very lively area, both for day and night life. There are tons of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, flea markets. Not only, the neighborhood is surrounded by nature, canals, parks with huge trees, two minutes from the Spree river, on the line between East and West Berlin. The subway stop is Schlesischestor, very well connected with the rest of the city.
description: Spacious, bright, cozy apartment, in the heart of Kreuzberg, right by the boundary line between east and west Berlin. Not only, the neighborhood is surrounded by nature, canals, parks with huge trees, two minutes from the Spree river, on the line between East and West Berlin. The subway stop is Schlesischestor, very well connected with the rest of the city. Guests will have at their disposal a private bedroom and a private restroom. They will share with us the big bathroom (with bath tub and shower), the lliving room and the kitchen (for a coffee in the morning, or a tea on evening). We will be happy to provide info and advices abou
host_about:
Hello everyone. Lisa, 39 artist photographer and Boti 36, sound artist, have the pleasure to host you in our Heimat with two lovely cats Tabbi and Knobbie. We come from Italy, we have been living and working here in Berlin for more than 10 years.
We love animals, nature, creativity, sincere people and our beautiful planet.

name: Beautiful Apartment In Central Berlin!! (44 sq.m.)
summary: You'll love my accommodation because of the amenities & features but also for its quiet and central location.  The apartment is suitable for couples and business travelers and is located in the heart of Berlin's government district, within walking distance of the historic landmarks of Berlins center.  The Reichstag, Chancellery, the Brandenburg Gate, Hackescher Markt and the Gendarmenmarkt are reachable within a few steps.  Culture lovers are cared for as well in the immediate vicinity.
space: The house is accessed via a pleasant entrance and the apartment is reached via the staircase or an elevator system.  There is an spacious courtyard wich is greened. The pleasant designed apartment with two rooms is bright and has a small balcony. Theres a storage room for luggage available as well as a desk for working purposes. The high speed W-Lan is free to use.  In addition to that the small kitchen is equipped with everything that is needed for you to have breakfast or to be able to cook.  Toaster, kettle and a Nespresso machine with coffee pads are available as well. It would be good if you could plan your arrival until 8 pm, as the later check in will be expensive, which I will unfortunately charge you with 20 euro

name: schöne Altbauwohnung im Gräfekiez
summary: Die Unterkunft befindet sich im Herzen von Kreuzberg im angesagtem Gräfekiez. Sie liegt im Stadtzentrum und ist gut vernetzt mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. space: Das gemütliche Zimmer ist ca. 18m2 groß. Die großzügige Wohnküche der Altbauwohnung lädt zum verweilen und kochen ein.
description: Die Unterkunft befindet sich im Herzen von Kreuzberg im angesagtem Gräfekiez. Sie liegt im Stadtzentrum und ist gut vernetzt mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Das gemütliche Zimmer und die große Wohnküche sind typischer Berliner Altbau mit allem was man braucht. Wir freuen uns auf deine Anfrage. Das gemütliche Zimmer ist ca. 18m2 groß. Die großzügige Wohnküche der Altbauwohnung lädt zum verweilen und kochen ein. Für Fragen und Tips stehen wir euch gerne zur Verfügung! Es gibt viele schöne Restaurants und Cafés sowie Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Es gibt Wochenmärkte, Flohmärkte und viele kleine Läden in der Nähe. Außerdem verschiede Supermärkte. Direkt vor der Tür hält der M41 Bus, der zum Hauptbahnhof fährt. Zur U8 Schönleinstraße sind es 7min Fußweg. Parkplätze gibt es in der Umgebung, man muss eventuell etwas danach suchen.

name: In the center of Berlin at Potsdamer Platz
summary: In the heart of Berlin, at the Potsdamer Platz, a port of the city between East and West, you can reach the historic and cultural centers of Berlin within a few minutes, and of course the political ones as well, such as the Reichstag or Checkpoint Charlie. If you do not like the hustle and bustle of the city, the nearby Tiergarten offers relaxation and recreation. For shopping, there is also the Mall of Berlin, the Arcades, the Sony Center and within a short time you can reach the sights of Berlin

name: PARK1 - Studio apartment in a quiet courtyard
summary: My place is close to Hackesche Höfe. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: The PARK1 Studio is located in a modernised historic business complex. The complex was once filled with small businesses like a woodworking shop, along with the famous Mudd Club in the early 2000's. It was converted in 2010 into what it is today. The apartment overlooks the Krausnick Park.
description: My place is close to Hackesche Höfe. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The PARK1 Studio is located in a modernised historic business complex. The complex was once filled with small businesses like a woodworking shop, along with the famous Mudd Club in the early 2000's. It was converted in 2010 into what it is today. The apartment overlooks the Krausnick Park. The studio is only for our guests use. If you smoke, you can do that outside in the courtyard, but please make sure to not throw your cigarette buds to the ground. We normally leave the key with our neighbours, a small business in the same building complex or another small business just down the street from the complex. name: Bright Renovated Studio in Bergmannkiez, Kreuzberg
summary: A recently-renovated, furnished and equipped 40 sqm bright studio apartment, in a 2nd floor of a quiet side-wing 19th-century building, fronted by a green inner courtyard with a cozy sitting area. The apartment is located in a quiet street in Bergmannkiez, a chicky and vibrant neigborhood in the popular Kreuzberg quarter of Berlin.
space: General Description: •  Wide entrance corridor. •  One spacious room with sitting area and double bed. •  Open-space kitchen with an eating area (table and chairs). •  Bathroom. •  Wooden Floor. •  Built-in cabinet. •  Central heating. Also in the apartment: •  Fully equipped kitchen, including refrigerator, stove, oven, etc. •  Washing machine. •  Stereo sound system, including CD and DVD player. •  Internet Access and WiFi (up to 200 mb/sec). •  Smart-TV (49", 4K) with Cable channels.

name: Big Room In Berlin Mitte / Prenzlauerberg
summary: Do you like to explore Berlin’s most exciting and interesting area Mitte / Prenzlauer Berg? Just step out of your new door and immediately you are surrounded by good restaurants, stores, cinemas, markets and cultural diversity. 5 min. by foot from Hackescher Markt, 10 min by foot from Museums Insel. Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von I Due Forni, Cafe Fleury, Katz Orange | U.a. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, hohe Decken, die Lage und die Leute.
space: A spacious flat (71 m²) with two bedrooms. It is complete furnished with bed, writing desk, chair, mirror, wardrobe, side table and WIFI. The kitchen is fully equipped and the dining table offers place for five persons.  Rent includes linen, blanket, heater, electricity, WIFI, bathroom & kitchen.

name: Beautiful design Apartment right by the Canal
summary: Ihr habt die Wohnung für euch wenn ihr bei uns übernachtet! Voll ausgestattete, gemütliche Wohnung im Graefekiez in einem aufwändig kernsanierten Gründerzeithaus. Wir vermieten einen Teil der Wohnung, sind aber selber zum vermieteten Zeitpunkt nicht zuhause, so dass ihr die Wohnung für Euch alleine habt. You will have the apartment to yourself if you stay with us! We rent out our large apartment (except for our bedroom) when we are not there, you will have the spacious place for yourself
space: Die großzügige Altbauwohnung verfügt über eine große, vollausgetattete Wohnküche mit Balkon, ein gemütliches Wohnzimmer sowie einem Badezimmer mit Dusche und Badewanne und einer separaten Gästetoilette. Die Wohnung ist liebevoll eingerichtet, hat eine vollausgestattete Küche und ist sehr gemütlich.   Das Gästezimmer (ca. 10 qm) liegt zum Innenhof hin und ist sehr ruhig. Es verfügt über ein Bett für 2 Personen (1.40m x 2m) sowie einem kleinen Kleiderschrank.  Handtücher, Bettwäsche und eine Waschmaschine sind vorhanden.  The spacious flat has a big kitchen area with balcony, a cozy livingroom as well as a bathroom with shower and bathtub and a separate guest toilette. The kitchen is fully equipped and can be used by the guests. The guestroom (about 10sm)  is very quiet and has a bed for 2 people (1.40m x 2m)  and a small closet. Towels, bedsheets and a washingmaschine are available for the guests.

host_about:
Hey all, 
I am living in Berlin and rent out my apartment from time to time. I am a business consultant and gone a lot for travel and like to rent out to trustworthy reliable people who would like to spend a few days in lovely Berlin. You can contact me with any questions and I will try to answer as soon as possible. 

Cheers
Daniel

name: Tiny room with private external bathroom near Hbf
summary: A very small (9 m2) room with a private bathroom and comfy bed. Located in "Mitte" district. 300m (3 minutes) to "Schwartzkopffstraße" station (U6). 2,3km to Brandenburger Gate and 3km to Alexanderplatz on foot. Very quiet neighborhood. Easy to get both to West and East Berlin.  Advantages: great location + WiFi + towels and bedlinen are provided + hairdrier + fridge & microwave + free parking on the street Disadvantages: no access to the kitchen and no cooking facilities at all - lack of space
