name: Großes Altbauzimmer im Zentrum
summary: Das Zimmer ist Teil einer großen Berliner Altbau-Wohnung. Es ist 19 m² groß und hat zwei große doppelflüglige Fenster und einen wunderschönen Dielenfußboden. Trotz der zentralen Lage ist es sehr ruhig, da es im 2. Hinterhof gelegen ist und direkt an den Gleisdreieckpark grenzt.  Ich vermiete dieses und ein weiteres Zimmer über Airbnb und wir teilen uns die gemütliche Wohnküche und das große Badezimmer (Dusche & Badewanne).
space: Das Zimmer ist Teil einer großen Berliner Altbau-Wohnung. Es ist 22 m² groß und hat zwei große doppelflüglige Fenster und einen wunderschönen Dielenfußboden. Es gibt ein großes Bett (1,40m), einen  Kleiderschrank, ein Sofa, Schreibtisch, Sessel und ein großes Regal. Vor dem Haus gibt es einen schönen Sitzplatz unter der großen Kastanie. Ich vermiete dieses und ein weiteres Zimmer über Airbnb und wir teilen uns die gemütliche Wohnküche und das große Badezimmer (Dusche & Badewanne). Im Preis enthalten sind sämtliche Nebenkosten (Wasser und Strom), WiFi Mitbenutzung, Waschmaschinen- und Küchen Mitbenutzung.

name: Neukölln-central yet quiet- Parking space poss
summary: Fairly unique, secluded place. in between appartement houses you are still on your own. Though located on one of Neukölln's main and amongst one of Germanys most notorious roads you are not disturbed by traffic noise.  Lots of pubs, bars and restaurants are within 100m. Animals are welcome as long as they get along with cats. Please ask about a fee for your pet.  If you want to stay longer than 21 days please get in touch. 2 very kind cats live here. Parking space possible 5m from entrance
space: Large terrace with a table for 6 - 8 persons for cooking and  chilling . 2 cats live here who are friendly - even to dogs.

I would like you to feel safe and comfortable  - and homely. lots of Cafés, restaurants, bars - most of them are very reasonable Bus M41 - name of the stop: Fuldastrasse - 1 minute away Underground U7 - name of the stop: Rathaus-Neu
host_about:
mein Motto: die Welt ist mein Zuhause - 
the world is my home. 

habe eine coole wohnung in Neukoelln.
gross Terrasse, ruhig, Remise,
Büro mit Computer, Fax, Scanner steht zur Verfügung.

lese gern bücher mit inhalt - z.b. "der funke leben"; "steppenwolf"; "Fliegen ohne flügel"
höre gern music - grosse cd auswahl von 1980 an
2 katzen 
bus in 1 minute + u-bahn in 5 minuten erreichbar

bin unkonventionell und an menschlichem interessiert - sozusagen: what makes people tick. 

Englisch spreche ich fliessend. französisch reicht zum überleben

My motto: The World is my Home

name: Cozy Souterrain in Kreuzberg
summary: Our accommodation is close to all the popular cafés and bars around the Bergmann- and Gräfekiez, as well as Kreuzkölln (Curry 36, Mustafas Gemüse Döner, Room 77). It is just as fast to walk on the Admiralbrücke, in the Hasenheide or at the Kottbusser Tor. Because of its central location and easy access to Neukölln, Mitte and Friedrichshain, the apartment will let you enjoy your stay in Berlin. The accommodation is good for couples (even with a small child) solo travelers and business travelers.
space: Our Souterrain is a little oasis in the big city since it's located in a backyard and therefore quiet and cosy. Although it used to be a cellar there is enough light coming through the windows.  During the warm summer days it feels chilly enough and in winter it's cosy and warm.

name: Big, sunny and beautiful private room
summary: - Big room. - Big TV with Apple TV and Netflix. - Sunny Balcony. - In the heart of Nollendorfplatz. - 5 minutes walk to the Subway, with 4 different connection lines.  - 2 minutes walk to many cool restaurants and bars. - 10 minutes walk to the famous Kudamm (kurfürstenstraße), great to have a nice dinner or go shopping.  - 10 minutes walk to the famous KaDeWe.

name: Cozy bright room with own bathroom
summary: Meine Wohnung liegt in direkter Nähe zum Flohmarkt im Mauerpark,  und vielen kleinen süßen Cafés. Die Anbindung an S-/U- und Trambahn ist hervorragend (M10 ist 5 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt und fährt zum Hauptbahnhof), U2 Eberswalder Str. 10 Minuten)   My flat is very close to the Mauerpark Flee market, as well as the Berlin Wall Memorial, several cute Cafés, as well as museums, cinemas, Galleries. Great connections with all transportations (M10 is 5 minutes walk&goes directly to the main station).
space: My apartment is just one street away from the famous Mauerpark that hosts Berlins biggest flee market every Sunday.  The Tram M10 drives directly from the Main train station to "Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn Sportpark" from where you have another 5 minutes by foot to my apartment. The room is light, central but quiet. You are literally in Mitte at my apartment. Everything is easy to reach. There are also many small bars and cafés and excellent restaurants in walking distance.

name: Studio in central location
summary: Lower level studio apartment with all the mod cons for a comfy stay in a great living city - Berlin!
space: The apartment has a kitchen with a hob, oven, washing machine, fridge + all the other bits and pieces you need. There is a charming four poster bed with good quality mattress and we have hotel style fresh white linen + towels. There is a lounge setting with TV, DVD + stereo equipment. The apartment is a few stairs down, with the ground level outside at the height of the window sills. There are blinds on the windows for more privacy + for keeping out the sun in the morning. If you plan to rent a bike during your stay then you are welcome to lock it up in the grassed courtyard just outside the apartment. The area is full of Berlin life! Lots of markets, sites, cafes, restaurants, beer gardens within walking distance. The Berlin Wall once stood along the street + remnants, a landscaped memorial + a museum are a few minutes from the door. The house is perfectly situated in a quiet street with the underground station Bernauer Strasse at the end of the street. There are bakeries, cafes, rest

host_about:
I am an Australian Berliner! I have been living in Berlin for almost 20 years + having studied Architecture in Perth W.A took to the great apartments Berlin has to offer.

I have great people working for me, I have a 'thing' about good beds so if you want a good comfy bed on your travels I have only great ones!

I have a complete house full of apartments and hence have people to help me have everything run smoothly. I don't live in the apartments myself. I have renovated them all thou and they are my personal property. 
My apartments are of a hotel style with empty wardrobes etc. and no cosmetic collections filling the bathrooms. We have white hotel linen and towels freshly delivered and professional cleaning :)
I design my places all with you in mind. Travellers away from home wanting clean, comfortable, private bedrooms together with gorgeous big spaces to be together, eat, cook, chill on the couch.

name: Bright and spacious apt in best area of Kreuzberg
summary: This spacious two bedroom apartment (78 square meter) is literally located in one of the most beautiful streets of Berlin.  The bright apartment is of considerable charm with high ceilings and wooden floorboards, lovingly furnished.
space: The apartment is very well equipped including washing machine and TV, and in the kitchen you will find everything you'll need such as dishwashing machine, blender, kettle, and a wide range of moka pots... Free wifi The apartment comes with a comfortable king size bed (1,80 x 2m) and is suitable for 1-2 persons.  Smoke-free and pet-free home and this is how it should remain. : )

name: Moderne Kunst und originaler Stuck im Herzen Berlins
summary: Du wohnst in einem Gründerzeithaus mit hohen lichtdurchfluteten Räumen und schönem Deckenstuck. Die Eindrücke deines Berlinbesuchs kannst du wunderbar in ruhiger Umgebung bei einer Tasse Tee oder Kaffee in unserer Bibliothek Revue passieren lassen.
space: Wir wohnen in einer aufwendig renovierten Maisonette- Wohnung in einem wunderschönen Gebäude von 1896.  Eure Räume liegen in der dritten Etage im Vorderhaus. Die beiden je 30qm großen Zimmer sind mit einer großen Doppelflügeltür verbunden. Das Schlafzimmer mit Queensize-Bett, großem Kleiderschrank und Schreibtisch verfügt auch über einen Balkon.  Im Wohnzimmer warten viele Bücher und eine unglaublich bequeme Couch auf Euch.  Das Badezimmer in derselben Etage steht unseren Gästen zur alleinigen Verfügung. Es verfügt über eine begehbare Dusche, zwei Waschbecken sowie ein WC und ein Bidet. Die komplette Wohnung ist mit originalen Holzdielen ausgelegt. Die hohen Decken sind mit aufwendigen Stuckverzierungen versehen. In der Wohnküche können wir gerne gemeinsam eine Tasse Tee/Kaffee oder ein Glas Wein trinken.
description: Du wohnst in einem Gründerzeithaus mit hohen lichtdurchfluteten Räumen und schönem Deckenstuck. Die Eindrücke deines Berlinbesuchs kannst du wunderbar in ruhiger Umgebung bei einer Tasse Tee oder Kaffee in unserer Bibliothek Revue passieren lassen.
host_about:
Mein Mann und ich wohnen in einer wunderschönen Altbau-Maisonette-Wohnung, die wir erst vor kurzer Zeit aufwendig renoviert haben. 
Wir lieben Kunst , Musik, Sport und gute Gesellschaft. Deswegen haben wir uns entschieden, ab sofort nicht nur "airbnb "als Gäste ,sondern auch als Gastgeber zu nutzen.Als Berliner lieben wir unsere Stadt. Da wir gerne Essen gehen, entdecken wir immer wieder gute, neue Restaurants in unserer Umgebung. 
Wir gehen viel spazieren, fahren Fahrrad oder Motorrad, genießen unter Wasser die Ruhe beim Tauchen und über Wasser den Wind beim Segeln oder Surfen.

My husband and I live in a beautiful old building duplex apartment, which we have extensively renovated only recently.
We love art, music, sports and good company. That's why we decided, from now on not only "airbnb" as guests but also as the host to use.
As "Berliner" we love our city. Since we like to eat, we always discover good, new restaurants in our area.
We go for walks, ride a bicycle or motorcycle, enjoy underwater tranquility while diving and on the water the wind when sailing or surfing.

name: Cozy Room with balcony in Kreuzberg
summary: My apartment is located in the nice area of Graefekiez in Kreuzberg with a lot of cute cafés and bars. You get very good coffee here and the best ice cream in town. Its only 15 min by Bus to Potsdamer Platz and the same to Alexanderplatz. Its beautiful to walk at the canal, the big park Hasenheide or to shop at the oriental fruit market. My room for rent is perfect for one person or a couple, you can also use my living room with me. The balcony on the room allows you to see beautiful sunsets.
space: My apartment is spacious and full of light and the room you gonna sleep is recently renovated. Under two layers of wallpaper I found that amazing sailboat painted on the wall... and I just left it there  the room is equipped with a comfortable sofa/bed for one or two people and there is a table to work and also a shelf to store your stuff. From you room you have access to my beautiful balcony with a view over Urbanstraße. I also have a TV with DVD player that you can use. There is a (Hidden by Airbnb) Chrom Cast for streaming your movies from your Computer. And of course there is a fast Wifi here. You can use the living room with me and also my kitchen and bathroom is for sharing.

host_about: As a person who likes to travel a lot airbnb seems to me perfect to combine both - traveling and staying at other people's places and also offering a place to sleep at my flat. I am a Berliner and I love my city but I also love to be away for a while to see different places in the world. But when I am home you are always welcome to stay at my place.

name: Bohemian unique studio in the heart of Neukölln
summary: The flat is a little studio of an artist and bohemian collector, excitingly decorated with rare objects and love to art. It is located in an house project building in the centre of the cool Neukölln, with lots of bars and boutiques on the same street. The bed is a high bed with a good mattress for 2. The Studio has a large dinig table and a well equipped kitchen. With free wifi hotspot. The neighborhood is a bit wild but hip at the same time. The metroline U7 + bus M41 near by

name: PARK2 - Studio
summary: My place is close to Hackesche Höfe, Café Oliv, The Barn, KW. You’ll love my place because of the location, super quiet, walking distance to shops and restaurants. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: The PARK1 Studio is located in a modernised historic business complex. The complex was once filled with small businesses like a woodworking shop, along with the famous Mudd Club in the early 2000's. It was converted in 2010 into what it is today. The apartment overlooks the Krausnick Park. With the studio key, one can access the park grounds.

name: Best Top Central Location: Hackescher Markt!
summary: Dear guests, welcome to my apartment in Berlin Mitte (centre). The location of my flat couldn’t be better: it is situated in one of the most favourite places of Berlin – on Hackescher Markt. The most beautiful and interesting sightseeing places like Berliner Dom, Museumsinsel, Alexanderplatz, Fernsehturm, Nikolaiviertel etc. could be reached by walk. Also you find many restaurants, cafés and bars near my apartment to make your stay perfect. Nevertheless it is not loud in the apartment.
space: I am sure you will enjoy your stay in my apartment. The room ist well equipped and comfortable and the location and the neighborhood is fantastic! If you are 2 people, I can put the additional mattress, but it would be very tight in the room. Please note that the room is available already from 24th March (i cannot change it here - don’t know why). Please contact me of you need it already from 24th.

Bitte beachtet dass unsere Check-In Zeit bis 20h geht. Solltet Ihr später ankommen müssen wir das vorher wissen u
host_about:
With my family I lived for many years in this wonderful place and I fall in love with the fabioulous landscape, the clean sea, the warmhearted people and the good and healthy food. Here you are treated as a guest not as a tourist! Together with my partner and friend Signora Anna we run a little coutryhouse. Anna will be yourcaring host and can cook for you delicious food.
Mit meiner Familie habe ich lange in Castellabate gewohnt und mich die dieses wunderbare Stückchen Land verliebt. Hier ist jeder Gast und nicht Tourist, viel ländliches, ursprüngliches Italien ist zu entdecken und wunderbare Leute zu treffen.
Und natürlich liebe ich das blitzsaubere Meer, das bergige Hinterland und das gute Essen hier!
Meine kleine private Hofanlage betreibe ich mit meiner Partnerin und Freundin Signora Anna, die unsere Gäste liebevoll umsorgt.
CILENTISSIMO!

name: Simples und gemütliches Gästezimmer in Kreuzberg
summary: Das Zimmer ist zentral gelegen in Kreuzberg 36. Direkt vor der Tür gibt es viele Restaurants, Cafe's und der Landwehrkanal ist 5 Minuten fußläufig entfernt. Der Kiez hat einen belebten und authentischen Charme.
space: Ich wohne mit in der Wohnung und gebe gerne Tipps und Ratschläge so gut ich kann.  Die Gäste- Zimmertür ist abschließbar.  Zur Ausstattung: Das Bett im Gästezimmer ist ein Futonbett für eine Person. Es gibt eine Kommode, ein Regal und eine Kleiderstange mit Bügeln. Ausserdem einen gemütlichen Sessel zum Lesen und entspannen. Die Küche grenzt an das Gästezimmer und steht euch für euren Aufenthalt alleine zur Verfügung.  Ich bin bei meiner Vollzeitarbeit gut versorgt und esse gerne ausserhalb. :)

Ich versuche so gut zu helfen, wie ich kann. Nach 8 Jahren, die ich hier lebe, kenne ich viel in Berlin. Es ist sehr belebt und bunt vor der Tür! In wenigen Minuten erreicht ihr den Kanal,

name: Bright-cosy-quite 2-room Apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: While traveling I rent my 2 - room apartment in Kreuzberg:  side wing, 2nd floor, furnished, light and quite, close to U-Südstern. name: Neukölln, Room with a bow window , near the canal
summary: My place is 1 minute away from the beautiful canal, on the edge of kreuzberg and treptow. this area has lots of green areas for walks,  görlitzer park and treptowerpark are easily reachable on foot. yet it’s well connected to transportation. it is situated on a street rife with cafés and restaurants for all tastes.  You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, the ambiance, and the people. My place is good for singles, couples or small families.
space: Whilst your room is spacious, you may want to seat in the kitchen, which boasts a superb communist time red armchair, 70' designer sweedish sofa, morning sunlight,  is equipped for cooking-  and there is coffee waiting to be drunk! If it is evening light you need, your room is the best place to catch it, sitting in the bay window. There is even a communal garden downstairs which you are welcome to use.

space: The space is modern, ambient and clean.

The apartment is fully furnished and has a new kitchen, washing machine, bathroom ( with a bathtub and a shower in the bathtub), balcony, WiFi internet. The space is modern, ambient and clean. name: Cozy room in the hippest area of Berlin Mitte
summary: Cozy private room in the hippest area of Berlin Mitte. Cozy private room in the heart of Berlin-Mitte with its own separate toilet. Only an 8-minute walk from the Hackesche Höfe, in the quiet Gipstrasse. In addition to numerous cafes and restaurants, such as Clara's Ballhaus, Monsieur Vuong, Kuchi, Pauly Hall, Girls' Cuisine, Barcomis etc, the area offers plenty of art and culture. There are galleries and theaters in the immediate vicinity.

name: Studio (1) in the middle of Berlin
summary: Gorgeous studio apartment on the first floor of an old Berlin house in perfect location. Suited to couples wanting a quiet flat in the midst of Berlin. There is a 180x200cm bed with a great quality mattress and we have hotel style fresh white linen + towels. The bathroom has a shower, glass shower door, modern tiles etc. The kitchen has a ceramic hob, microwave, fridge + all the other bits and pieces you need. Close buy you'll find many cafes + restaurants if you don't feel like cooking :)
space: If you plan to rent a bike during your stay then you are welcome to lock it up in the grassed courtyard just outside the apartment. The area is full of Berlin life! Lots of markets, sites, cafes, restaurants, beer gardens within walking distance. The Berlin Wall once stood along the street + remnants, a landscaped memorial + a museum are a few minutes from the door. The house is perfectly situated in a quiet street with the underground station Bernauer Strasse at the end of the street. There are bakeries, cafes, restaurants, flea markets, super markets, galleries, museums + within 100 meters. The apartment is in the side wing of an old Berlin house.

host_about:
I am an Australian Berliner! I have been living in Berlin for almost 20 years + having studied Architecture in Perth W.A took to the great apartments Berlin has to offer.

I have great people working for me, I have a 'thing' about good beds so if you want a good comfy bed on your travels I have only great ones!

I have a complete house full of apartments and hence have people to help me have everything run smoothly. I don't live in the apartments myself. I have renovated them all thou and they are my personal property. 
My apartments are of a hotel style with empty wardrobes etc. and no cosmetic collections filling the bathrooms. We have white hotel linen and towels freshly delivered and professional cleaning :)
I design my places all with you in mind. Travellers away from home wanting clean, comfortable, private bedrooms together with gorgeous big spaces to be together, eat, cook, chill on the couch.

space: Look at our other Room for Reviews and an idea of what to expect :)

host_about:
A half Brazilian, half Italian born and raised in Berlin.  Because of my roots i always had a feeling for different cultures and languages. ( Grew up Trilingual and added English to that list pretty fast) I was lucky to be able to travel a lot , so i know how it feels to be in a completely different environment or country. 

I live with my 2 roommates, Lennard and Andrea. They both study and Lennard is going towards the IT realm and Andrea is becoming a professional singer/songwriter.

As for myself i like to experience new stuff but i always come back to my love for Movies and TV shows, playing a lot of poker, my technological affinity, triathlon and avoiding having a normal job :p 

if you have any further question just hit me up and i`ll answer you hopefully everything you want to know :)

name: Beautiful 27qm room own balcony and great view.
summary: We offer a beautiful room in an old apartement with your own balkony and the perfect view. (please be aware -NO ELEVATOR!!!!!) The nearest station is only about 3 minutes away from our door. Of course I would say Kreuzberg is the best district in Berlin but see for yourself and experience our wonderful "Kiez". You will have your own big room and you can always use our kitchen and living room. Some of the pics are a bit older but I try to keep everything updated. (I change decoration often)
space: If you're a fan of vintage furniture you will be in love with the apartment and your room. The room is 27 qm big and has an extra couch. We are in the heart of Kreuzberg and some of the best restaurants are really close by. Since our daughter is 2,5 years old we are always happy to have some company for her. So if you want to bring your baby, we have a bed as well and the apartement is safe for babies and children. If you need anything or you don't feel comfortable with us please just tell us ASAP - we would love to make your stay as great as possible and a lot of problems don't exist if communication is good. Don't be shy and feel at home...we want you to feel not like a tourist when you're with us. By the way: The room is bigger than it appears on the pictures.

name: Room in Large, Bright Flat in Neukolln, Berlin
summary: There is a room available in a large, sunny, second floor 2-bedroom flat with living room. The room comes furnished, and with a double bed with linen and duvet, and is 12 sq.m.
space: The flat has a courtyard on either side, and a living room/kitchen that faces south and is very bright. It has a fully stocked kitchen, large dining table, and leather sofas. There is wireless internet (WLAN) also.
description: There is a room available in a large, sunny, second floor 2-bedroom flat with living room. The room comes furnished, and with a double bed with linen and duvet, and is 12 sq.m. The flat has a courtyard on either side, and a living room/kitchen that faces south and is very bright. It has a fully stocked kitchen, large dining table, and leather sofas. There is wireless internet (WLAN) also. I am a 40 year old Canadian artist and I usually spend most my time at my studio. I keep the flat clean and am relatively quiet. The apartment is located in Neukolln, very near Templehof airport, now opened as a park to the public, and beautiful Hasenheide Park. U-Bahn Boddinstrasse is a couple minutes away, and the U-8 line takes you to Alexanderplatz in 15 minutes. There are good shops, Turkish grocery stores, and restaurants all around.
host_about: I live in Berlin, eight years now, all in Neukolln. I've been renting my second bedroom for that entire time on (Hidden by Airbnb) , with only happy results. I'm new to airbnb but enthusiastically looking forward to it.

name: Cozy room in Kreuzberg Bergmannkiez
summary: The room is very light, has over 4 meter high ceilings, an original wooden floorboard and is located in the backyard of an typical Berlin old building.  The kitchen is well equipped: Dishes, pots, pans, spices, herbs and oils etc. can be used for cooking too. Otherwise, you can eat excellent at the famous "Mareineke Market Hall" (4 min) and a lot of restaurants in the neighborhood. It‘s a perfect place for working!
space: Stylish furnished rooms in a typical old building of Berlin
description: The room is very light, has over 4 meter high ceilings, an original wooden floorboard and is located in the backyard of an typical Berlin old building.  The kitchen is well equipped: Dishes, pots, pans, spices, herbs and oils etc. can be used for cooking too. Otherwise, you can eat excellent at the famous "Mareineke Market Hall" (4 min) and a lot of restaurants in the neighborhood. It‘s a perfect place for working! Stylish furnished rooms in a typical old building of Berlin Kitchen & bathroom For me it is important that my guests feel comfortable and they can experience the city. So, if you have any questions or requests, please do not hesitate to contact me. The neighborhood is called *Bergmannstraßenkiez*. It's a famous area of Kreuzberg with about 4 blocks where Thai, Italian, Spanish, Japanes, Indian, Vietnamese, Turkish, Greek and last not least the Arabians meet with their native kitchen. U7 Gneisenaustraße All rooms are filled with contemporary art works, especially from Berlin.
host_about:
Hello! 

My passion is contemporary art, I love to organize exhibitions and like to find new works at studio visits. 
I also like to travel. My last stops were New York, Zanzibar, Dubai, Paris, Barcelona...

It would be glad to welcome you soon in the midst of Berlin Kreuzberg, one of the most exciting and authentic area of the German capital. 

I live almost 10 years in Berlin and I feel very comfortable!

Best, Sofia

name: Cosy room in Schillerkiez/Neukölln
summary: We moved into our cosy flat two years ago and fell in love with the neighbourhood right away! There are plenty of bars and cafés as well as the Tempelhoferfeld. The people around are mostly nice and welcoming. The apartment is located at U Boddinstraße (U8) witch takes you to all the right spots you need to reach in Berlin. We welcome you in our home!
description: We moved into our cosy flat two years ago and fell in love with the neighbourhood right away! There are plenty of bars and cafés as well as the Tempelhoferfeld. The people around are mostly nice and welcoming. The apartment is located at U Boddinstraße (U8) witch takes you to all the right spots you need to reach in Berlin. We welcome you in our home! Our flatmate will be out of town for a few weeks. During that time her room is free for you. We will share the flat, everyone has its one room, but the kitchen and the bathroom will be used together. I'm always reachable if you have any problems, questions or if you just need some recommendations for our neighbourhood. If you like nice little cafés and bars, you will love Schillerkiez in Neukölln. We have a various number of them in our neighbourhood. Sit down and relax or take your coffe to go and have a stroll over the Tempelhofer Feld. U Boddinstraße (U8) is around the corner, just a 2 minute walk, as well at the busstation 104,166.

name: Inside Berlin direkt am Checkpoint Charlie
summary: Unsere Unterkunft befindet sich genau am Checkpoint Charlie.  Du wirst unsere Unterkunft lieben wegen der zentralen Lage, dem Ausblick, der guten Anbindung, der Gemütlichkeit.  Die Unterkunft eignet sich perfekt für alleinreisende Abenteurer und Geschäftsreisende. Die U-Bahnhaltestelle Kochstraße (U6), befindet sich direkt vor der Haustür. Mit der M29, bekommst du eine perfekte und günstige Sightseeingtour durch ganz Berlin ;-) Pauschal gesagt erreichst du jedes Ziel in Berlin in 15 Minuten.
space: Willkommen in Berlin. Diese Stadt bietet so ziemlich alles was dein Herz begehrt und für weitere interessante Insider Tipps stehen wir dir gerne zur Verfügung. Vergiss nicht, dank der zentralen Lage befindest dich im Herzen dieser tollen Hauptstadt, somit hast die Vielseitigkeit quasi vor der Haustür.

name: Trendy room in the heart of Neukölln
summary: This simple, delightful room is perfect for two - with a double bed, armchair, working desk, closet and dresser.  It is the brightest and the most quiet room in the house.  The kitchen/living room is a fun, spacious community area where we sometimes host friendly dinners or movie nights.  We always have good vibes and great tips to share about the neighborhood and city events.  We want to welcome you to our beautiful, openminded and relaxed piece of Neukölln!
description: This simple, delightful room is perfect for two - with a double bed, armchair, working desk, closet and dresser.  It is the brightest and the most quiet room in the house.  The kitchen/living room is a fun, spacious community area where we sometimes host friendly dinners or movie nights.  We always have good vibes and great tips to share about the neighborhood and city events.  We want to welcome you to our beautiful, openminded and relaxed piece of Neukölln! The flat is located in a major artery of the city being only three minutes away by foot to the U8 UBahn (Station Leinestraße). Alexanderplatz is a few minutes away and the rest of Berlin is easily accessible via public transportation.  There are many bakeries, cafes, restaurants and trendy bars all within a 5 minute walk of the house. The Tempelhof Airport Park is practically our backyard being only two blocks away. Live the Neuköllner experience in this culturally vibrant, new and exciting area of Berlin! 3 Minute Walk U-Bahn Lei

name: maybach studio - location. design. comfort.
summary: The 1st floor studio has been renovated in April 2017.  It consists of a kitchenette with a breakfast/coffee area, a  rain shower/wash/wc room  and a seating/work/sleeping room. The bed is queen size 1.60m x 2.00m  (63”x79”).  There is also a comfortable working space for two with WiFi.  Clean bedsheets, covers and towels are provided.  The option of storing your luggage before check in or after check-out with self pick up also exists. Parking is usually available on the same street and is free.

Although one of, if not the most, lively areas of Berlin, the apartment itself is situated in a quiet garden of a peaceful street in front of the water and enjoys the sun in all rooms, all afternoon.  Light blocking blinds do exist. Get on a boat just in front of the building to see Berlin from its many canals, walk 400m to Kottbusser Tor

name: Berlin Neukölln nice & central
summary: Situated in vibrant Neukölln but still calm, close to Kreuzberg and central. The next metro station is located just 3 min by feet from the apartment. The neighbourhood is full of little nice cafés, restaurants, bars and (organic) shops. We have been focusing on an ecological renovation using healthy and best organic materials as lime plaster, silicate paint, oiled floorboards and doors. You are sleeping on a luxurious natural latex matress and we believe your karma will appreciate it!
space: There is no better place to stay, if you are looking for an unique accomodation in a historical Berlin neighbourhood. Situated in a 100-year-old building, the apartment has a lot of original details as stucco, doors and beautiful wooden floorboards. You are sleeping on a  big bed with an organic latex matress (1.60 x 2.00m) and you use your brand-new kitchen, shower and toilet. Start your day in your cosy kitchen living room or have your first espresso of the day on the balcony! If you prefer to go for breakfast outside you will find a lot of nice places directly down in our street or in the very close neigbourhood.  We can help out with our washing machine, if you are in need of a laundry!

name: Cozy apartment in Kreuzberg / Görlitzer Park
summary: Dear Traveller's, The apartment is located between Görlitzer Park and Paul-Lincke-Ufer which are both really great places. Paul-Lincke-Ufer is a street in Berlin running along the Landwehr Canal in Kreuzberg. Opposite is the Maybach Ufer where the Turkish Market takes place on Tuesday, Friday and some Saturdays. Görlitzer Park is an 800-by-200 metre park in Kreuzberg with lots of great restaurants and cafes around. You’ll have everything you need in the flat. Very good internet as well.
description: Dear Traveller's, The apartment is located between Görlitzer Park and Paul-Lincke-Ufer which are both really great places. Paul-Lincke-Ufer is a street in Berlin running along the Landwehr Canal in Kreuzberg. Opposite is the Maybach Ufer where the Turkish Market takes place on Tuesday, Friday and some Saturdays. Görlitzer Park is an 800-by-200 metre park in Kreuzberg with lots of great restaurants and cafes around. You’ll have everything you need in the flat. Very good internet as well.

name: ruhiges & gemütliches Zimmer im Zentrum von Berlin
summary: Meine Wohnung befindet sich im Zentrum Berlins, keine 10 Min vom Alexander Platz entfernt und ein Idealer Ausgangpunkt um die Stadt zu erkunden.  Für Ausgehbegeisterte liegen die Kieze Friedrichshain und Kreuzberg in direkter Nachbarschaft. Und für Shoppingbegeisterte befindet sich das Alexa (Center) gleich um die Ecke. Wer es mal etwas entspannter mag, kann sich auch auf den Süd-Balkon sonnen, oder in den 15 min entfernten Volkspark Freidrichshain gehen.
space: Die besondere Lage an einem Buddhistischen Meditationszentrum (Lotos Vihara e.V.) und umgeben vom Grün, machen dieses Zimmer trotz seiner zentralen Lage in Berlin-Mitte zu einem perfekten Startpunkt um die Stadt zu entdecken. Es bietet aber ebenso einen ruhigen Rückzugsort um seine Erlebnisse Revue passieren zulassen.

Es bietet aber ebenso einen ruhigen Rückzugsort um seine Erlebnisse Revue passieren zulassen. Alles in der Wohnung - außer den Privatsachen in meinen Schränken und in meinem Zimmer - steht den Gästen zur Verfügung.  Im Kühlschrank ist etwas Platz für einkäufe Ich wohne auch in der Wohnung und bin daher für die Üb
host_about: Ich bin ein geborener Berlin und liebe diese Stadt mit ihrem herb kuscheligem Charme. Ich studiere Kartographie und engagiere mich in meiner Freizeit für Adoptiv- und Pflegekinder.

name: Lovely apartment in Berlin Neukölln
summary: Gemütliche, geräumige und moderne 2-Zimmerwohung mit Balkon mitten im Trendviertel Neukölln - Parks, Supermärtke, Bars, Cafés, Bus und Bahn alles in der Nähe. Cozy and spacious, modern apartment with balcony right in trendy Neukölln - everything is closeby: parks, supermarkets, bars, cafés, public transport
space: Very comfortable, spacious apartment: Bedroom with kingsize bed, small desk, TV, stereo, very quiet - you'll sleep like a baby ! Spacious kitchen with everything you need - stove, water boiler, espresso cooker, toaster and so forth  Freshly refurbished bathroom, with shower/bathtub Nice big living room with stereo, TV, couches, dinner table, big balcony : )

name: Wohnen und wohlfühlen mitten in Kreuzberg
summary: Die Unterkunft befindet sich im "authentischen" Kreuzberg.  In direkter Nähe ist die legendäre Oranienstraße mit vielen Shops, Restaurants, Bars und Cafés. Dennoch biete ich einen angenehmen Ruheort an. Wichtig ist mir, dass meine Gäste sich wohlfühlen.  Für Sauberkeit wird jederzeit gesorgt. Bei Anfragen rund um die Umgebung, Tipps etc stehe ich gern zur Verfügung.  English speaking people are always welcome.-)  Für Familien besonders geeignet. Nur Party People sind nicht gewünscht.
space: Hier kannst du Kreuzberg wirklich direkt vom Fenster aus genießen und erleben.
description: Die Unterkunft befindet sich im "authentischen" Kreuzberg.  In direkter Nähe ist die legendäre Oranienstraße mit vielen Shops, Restaurants, Bars und Cafés. Bei Anfragen rund um die Umgebung, Tipps etc stehe ich gern zur Verfügung.  English speaking people are always welcome.-)  Für Familien besonders geeignet. Nur Party People sind nicht gewünscht. Hier kannst du Kreuzberg wirklich direkt vom Fenster aus genießen und erleben. Flur, Gäste Toilette, Badezimmer, Küche (diese Räume werden gemeinsam geteilt). Für Fragen jeder Art zur Unterkunft oder Berlin stehe ich jederzeit zur Verfügung auch wenn ich nicht anwesend bin. Hier kannst du überall in der Nähe (fast) alles Essen finden. Günstig und aus den verschiedensten Kulturen und 24/7 bekommt man hier Getränke, etc. Das macht den Bezirk einzigartig kann aber auch für Menschen die nicht in der Großstadt
host_about:
Seit nun über 18 Jahren wohne ich  in Berlin Kreuzberg. 

In dieser Wohnung wohne ich mit meinen zwei Kindern (5 und 10 Jahre). 

Da mir unser zuhause am Herzen liegt und ich mir viel Mühe mache, dass sich alle wohlfühlen, freue mich über persönliche Nachrichten vor dem Besuch.

Ich freu mich euch/ dich kennenzulernen!

name: My friends always say: Oh wow!
summary: Hey you, welcome to our place. You will like this area of Kreuzberg. We are located close to the East Side Gallery, the Oberbaumbrücke, the areas Friedrichshein and Neukölln are just around the corner. You can walk there. The U1 is very close which brings you to Charlottenburg (western part) and all other areas with just one change of train. Within 30 minutes you can reach nearly all important places in Berlin. Many Clubs, Restaurants and Bars are in the neighborhood. Please check our profile!

host_about:
Hello you,

welcome to our place. We are Thomas and Karo. We believe in the original idea of Airbnb. We are against loosing space for living but we believe in the idea of traveling a town in a social way. We are happy to share our place and coffee with you, to eat together and compare ideas. So don't lock yourself in your room only. We have many friends from the world staying at ours and we are always ready to make new. We are 420 friendly, speak German, English, Spanish and Polish. 
We can tell you where to go either for sightseeing or clubbing. 

We’ll see you here.

space: Die Wohnung befindet sich zwischen dem Viktoria Park und dem Park am Gleisdreieck. Durch diesen können sie bequem zu Fuß zum Potsdamer Platz gelangen.
description: The studio is on the ground floor in the backyard of a 5 storied house which was built in 1890. The kitchen is equipped with a kettle and two induction cooker for basic cooking. (U7) There is S-Bahn (S1, S2, S25, S26) Station Yorckstr. also in walking distance Public parking is possible in the neighborhood without paying.

name: cosy room, excellently located in Kreuzberg
summary: You will reach all places you might be intertested in like Potsdamer Platz, Checkpoint Charlie or the romantic Viktoriapark with its waterfall in a 15 min walk.  Public transport (underground and busses) are around the corner (5 mins walk). Or hire a bike at the hostel around the corner. Cosy pubs, cafès and supermarkets are also nearby. Flexible check in times. Check out at 11:00. But the main thing is... I'm looking forward to meet you ;-)
space: My home is a cosy and colourful place at the first floor (not ground floor). No lift. It's a big, old building apartment in a typical Berlin style.
description: You will reach all places you might be intertested in like Potsdamer Platz, Checkpoint Charlie or the romantic Viktoriapark with its waterfall in a 15 min walk.  Public transport (underground and busses) are around the corner (5 mins walk). Or hire a bike at the hostel around the corner. Cosy pubs, cafès and supermarkets are also nearby. Flexible check in times. Check out at 11:00. But the main thing is... I'm looking forward to meet you ;-) My home is a cosy and colourful place at the first floor (not ground floor). No lift. It's a big, old building apartment in a typical Berlin style. You will share the bathroom and kitchen with me. Fridge, dishwasher, washing machine can be used. You have access to the living room. I love to sit and chat with you if you like, but most likely you will be here to discover Berlin, so I'll give you the keys and leave you in peace. I wish you a happy holiday! Directly in front of my door there is a nice shop with organic food as there are cafès, restaura
host_about:
I am a professional singer, singing teacher and voice coach. I love to sing old stuff from the 16th century but also Pop, Folksongs from Britain and Bulgaria and sometimes I try to yodel. Anyway...
I am an open minded person and I would love to welcome you to my home.

summary: Sunny comfy nice room with balcony in the center of Berlin connected to basically everything!! Big smart TV nice kitchen and courtyard to Grill. Sound system and all amenities included. Feel like is your own place since the other 2 super nice roommates are out most of the time.
space: Hallo!! I am renting my room located in the BEST area of Berlin Berlin Kreuzberg! Full of bars, restaurants, cafes, schools, supermarkets, flea markets etc etc.. you name it. name: Large Room in cosy apartment in hip area of Berlin
summary: Very large room with high ceilings, double bed, table and chairs, clothes rail with plenty of hangers. Great location. Good central heating, 3 minutes from U-Bahn, 2 minutes from park. Very hip area. Bathroom with bath and shower. kitchen with new washing machine, dishwasher and fridge.
space: Period building, right next to Hasenheide park, close to the old Tempelhof airport field. Lots of shops and places to eat.
description: Very large room with high ceilings, double bed, table and chairs, clothes rail with plenty of hangers. Great location. Good central heating, 3 minutes from U-Bahn, 2 minutes from park. Very hip area. Bathroom with bath and shower. kitchen with new washing machine, dishwasher and fridge. Period building, right next to Hasenheide park, close to the old Tempelhof airport field. Lots of shops and places to eat. Bathroom, kitchen, bicycle room. Usually busy when guests there and sometimes staying elsewhere. Both me and my partner are available on email or (Hidden by Airbnb) before and during stay. Having lived in berlin 24 years I can give lots of tips. The area is very multicultural and has an urban vibe despite all the parks. Excellent public transport. A couple of minutes from underground U8 which runs through hermannplatz, kottbusser Tor, Alexanderplatz, weinmeisterstrasse for hackescher Markt and Rosenthaler Platz for Tor Straße with it's independent fashion Boutiques, Bars, Restaurant

name: Cozy transit space in Kreuzberg
summary: I have a cozy calm transit room with a mattress, table and a bookshelf inside. The room is connected with the kitchen and the corridor. That's why it is listed as a Share room. In Daytime we need to pass. In the night you will have the room for yourself. I have WIFI, a shower. You can use the kitchen when ever you want and I offer you a tea or coffee. I live in a really cool neighborhood with a lot of cafés, bars and stores. The metro is only 2 min away.
space: Is really cozy and calm
description: I have a cozy calm transit room with a mattress, table and a bookshelf inside. The room is connected with the kitchen and the corridor. That's why it is listed as a Share room. Is really cozy and calm Shower  Kitchen  Waschmaschine after 5 days  Tea and coffee I always interact with guest. You need to know that I am a student and that I work from time to time. But if I'm home and you have questions or you want to have a coffee together you are completely welcome There are all quiet calm and don't make any problems Don't be shocked when you see a dog that's Maya my Labrador. She is really calm and happy to see guests
host_about:
Mein Name ist Susanne. Ich lebe in Kreuzberg mit meinem Hund Maya. Ich bin Studentin an der HTW, nebenbei arbeite ich. Ich mag Reisen, Leute kennenlernen und lesen, zeichnen. Bars und Cafés finde ich ebenfalls gut. 

My Name is Susanne. I am German, I live in Kreuzberg with my dog Maya. I am studying and working in Berlin. I love to travel, meeting people and friends, going to the cinema and reading. Bars and Coffee places I like as well.

name: Beautiful home in Mitte
summary: Location: berlin mitte (very close to main sights) subway/u-bahn: oranienburger tor (U6) total size: 42 sq meters Facilities:  bedroom-living room perfect for a couple (queen size bed)  fully equipped kitchen (fridge, dishwasher, stove and oven) with electric kettle, blender, Nespresso and bodum coffee maker, toaster and microwave oven iron and ironing board bathroom with shower hairdryer and basic amenities towels and bed sheets radio, wifi access and smart-tv
space: The apartment is on the 4th floor and therefore very bright. We are big fans of mid-century design and we tried to reflect that in the design of the apartment.  Please note that there is no elevator.
description: Location: berlin mitte (very close to main sights) subway/u-bahn: oranienburger tor (U6) total size: 42 sq meters Facilities:  bedroom-living room perfect for a couple (queen size bed)  fully equipped kitchen (fridge, dishwasher, stove and oven) with electric kettle, blender, Nespresso and bodum coffee maker, toaster and microwave oven iron and ironing board bathroom with shower hairdryer and basic amenities towels and bed sheets radio, wifi access and smart-tv The apartment is on the 4th floor and therefore very bright. We are big fans of mid-century design and we tried to reflect that in the design of the apartment.  Please note that there is no elevator. We welcome our guests personally and we are always happy to provide tips on what to do. The apartment is adjacent to the Jewish quarter, very close to the New Synagogue. There are many cafés and restaurants in the area. Tiergarten, Friedrichstraße, Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag are not far. There is a direct bus line to Prenzlauer

name: cozy bed in sunny room in Kreuzberg
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer eher ruhigen Seitenstrasse im beliebten Bergmannkiez in Kreuzberg. In unmittelbarer Nähe befinden sich zahlreiche Cafés und Restaurants. Zwei U-Bahn-Stationen sind nur wenige Minuten entfernt und zum Tempelhofer Feld oder zum Viktoriapark ist es ebenfalls nicht weit.  My flat is situated in a relatively quiet street but right around the corner you´ll find many cafés and restaurants. 2 metro stations (U7 and U6) and a bus station (#248) are just 4 minutes away!
space: Das Gästebett befindet sich in einem hellen, 10qm großen Durchgangszimmer zwischen Flur und Küche, hat aber eine abschließbare Tür zum Flur, so dass man ausreichend Privatsphäre herstellen kann! Das Zimmer ist eigentlich ein Esszimmer und zur Küche hin offen (siehe Foto). In der Zeit in der das Zimmer als Gästezimmer vermietet ist, wird die Küche von mir nur sporadisch benutzt und nur wenn mein Gast nicht zuhause ist. Die Küche hat nämlich keinen separaten Eingang... Als Gast hast Du aber immer den Zugang zur Küche und kannst sie natürlich benutzen! Dein Raum ist zwar abschließbar (wenn Du zuhause bist), sollte aber tagsüber - wenn Du unterwegs bist - offen sein, damit ich bei Bedarf die Küche erreichen kann. :) The room is not very big (around 10 sqm) but bright and very cosy. It has no door to the kitchen (as you can see in the photos). Passing the room is the only way to reach the kitchen. That's why I ask my guests to leave the door (to the corridor) open, when they go out. But don

host_about: I´m a film producer based in Berlin, who loves to travel and to get to know new people. Besides traveling, I love watching movies (of course), visiting museums or just discovering a new town. I speak german, english and spanish and a little french. name: Room in an apartment in Oranienstrasse  in Berlin
summary: My apartment is situated in Oranienstrasse , next to Senate , 300 meters  from Jewish Museum, Berlin Gallery , Gendarmen Market and Potsdamer Platz . 1.3 km from Brandenburger Gate and Reichstag. We have 2 toilets, one bathroom , kitchen,  dinning room, balcony ( loggia) , a huge garden for all residents and 4 bedrooms. I live alone in my apartment and every second Sunday my little son spends his weekend with me

The street has great bars, restaurants and cafes all just outside our front door, and the cultural sights of the Museum Island, Alexander Platz and  Hackescher Markt with great shopping possibilities are within a few minutes walking distance. name: Cosy Roof Top Flat in Berlin-Mitte (82 qm)
summary: Die Dachgeschosswohnung ist der ideale Hideaway für einen entspannten Aufenthalt in Berlin. Hell und zentral gelegen, ist sie die perfekte Base für alle möglichen  Unternehmungen und zugleich ein gemütlicher Rückzugsort nach einem Arbeits- oder Urlaubstag voller Eindrücke und Erlebnisse. Die Terrasse bietet einen schönen Blick zum Fernsehturm und zur nahe gelegenen  Zionskirche, deren Turmbesteigung an einem schönen Tag einen tollen Ausblick als Belohnung bietet!  2 Fahrräder sind inklusive.
space: Die Wohnung besitzt einen Fahrstuhl in den 4 1/2 Stock, ist also bedingt barrierefrei. 8 Stufen müssen zu Fuß genommen werden. Das Schlafzimmer ist ruhig und hell und bietet einen weiteren Balkon. Die Küche ist amerikanisch offen, aber nicht sehr groß. Ein Restaurantbetrieb ist also eher nicht möglich. ;-)

space: Be Guest at our "gemüliches" Flat in the Heart of Berlin. The View over the City is fantastic. The Kitchen is full equipt with Oven, Microwave, Fridge, Freezer, Dishwasher, 3 diffrent Coffeemaker, Smothiemaker and the Diningplace with the cosy Bank and Chairs to have a good Meal, Coffee or Drink and enjoy the Sunset over Berlin. Even we´re living in the Center of the Center you wouldn´t be really disturbed by the Outside, we even sleep with open Windows, but when you close the Windows there is No Noise comeing in.

host_about:
We´re a married, french/german Gaycouple who love to travel around the World, not just to see the beauty of this Planet, we ´re also interessted in the People.

And when not traveling ourself we love to wellcome Humans from all around the Globe.

We love Music ( Classic, Opera, Rock/Pop), Sport ( we prefere Couchsports ;-) )
As we are both Chef´s we love to cook and eat, mostly french-german fussion, but we are open to taste evrything once, at least....

We work a lot and after a hard Day we often just Couchpotatoes, but allways interessting in a good Talk with our Guests.

Twice a Year we go for Cruise for 2 - 3 Weeks and as we not just start our Cruises in Germany we allways stay a Couple of Days before and after the Cruise in the Cities and than we book an Airbnb-Guestroom ourself.

name: Gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in Berlin-Kreuzberg
summary: Die Wohnung hat ein ruhiges Schlafzimmer, ein Wohnzimmer, ein kleines Bad, Flur und eine gemütliche Küche mit grünem Blick aus allen Zimmern.
space: Die Wohnung ist im Stil des typischen Berliner Altbaus: Hohe Decken, Stuck und Holzfußböden, also sehr gemütlich. Für Musikliebhaber gibt es einen Flügel, den man (ausserhalb der Ruhezeiten) spielen darf. Die Wohnung hat natürlich eine Zentralheizung und ein modernes Bad. Es gibt eine zusätzliche, eher schmale Gästeliege für den 2. Gast.
description: Die Wohnung hat ein ruhiges Schlafzimmer, ein Wohnzimmer, ein kleines Bad, Flur und eine gemütliche Küche mit grünem Blick aus allen Zimmern. Die Wohnung ist im Stil des typischen Berliner Altbaus: Hohe Decken, Stuck und Holzfußböden, also sehr gemütlich. Für Musikliebhaber gibt es einen Flügel, den man (ausserhalb der Ruhezeiten) spielen darf. Die Wohnung hat natürlich eine Zentralheizung und ein modernes Bad. Es gibt eine zusätzliche, eher schmale Gästeliege für den 2. Gast. Die ganze Wohnung steht euch zur Verfügung. Ich bin fast immer über Mail oder SMS erreichbar. Meist gibt es auch einen netten Hausnachbarn, der ansprechbar ist. Das Kiez rund um den Südstern ist belebt aber auch nicht zu unruhig. Um die Ecke gibt es die wichtigen kleinen Läden wie Bäckerei, Gemüsehändler, Apotheke, Imbisse und mehrere günstige und gute Restaurants. Zum nächsten Edeka braucht man ca. 6-7 Minuten. name: Little oasis in central Berlin in idyllic location
summary: Directly in Kreuzberg the center of Berlin you will find my lovely little flat. What I like the most is that you have your quite space and still can enter the busy central city live within minutes. At night you will sleep quietly and during the day you can stroll along the most beautiful scenery of Berlin. That's why I love my flat. I am 30 years old, work as a Sales Consultant and I am always happy to host people for more than just a few days. So, be invited and come over! (Bicycle included)
space: You will find your room, my room, a shared living room, a spacious balcony, kitchen, bathroom and hall in the flat. I love to have breakfast on the balcony in the morning sun, the view into the green, how relaxed the neighborhood is and to hang out in the chilly living room. The bathroom and kitchen are small and functional with everything you need. Your room has a TV to stream Netflix and the like, a wardrobe, a little desk, a chair and a Lonely Planet tourist guide to Berlin included ;)
description: Directly in Kreuzberg the center of Berlin you will find my lovely little flat. What I like the most is that you have your quite space and still can enter the busy central city live within minutes. I am 30 years old, work as a Sales Consultant and I am always happy to host people for more than just a few days. So, be invited and come over! (Bicycle included) You will find your room, my room, a shared living room, a spacious balcony, kitchen, bathroom and hall in the flat. I love to have breakfast on the balcony in the morning sun, the view into the green, how relaxed the neighborhood is and to hang out in the chilly living room. The bathroom and kitchen are small and functional with everything you need. name: ein kleines schönes Zimmer...
summary: Unsere Wohnung befindet sich im Stadtteil Kreuzberg. Sie ist hell, ruhig, sowie sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Tom, Antje und Tochter Flora leben   hier. Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung.
description: Unsere Wohnung befindet sich im Stadtteil Kreuzberg. Sie ist hell, ruhig, sowie sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Tom, Antje und Tochter Flora leben   hier. Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucherwohnung. In der 80m² großen Wohnung vermieten wir ein kleines Zimmer mit Doppelbett für zwei Personen. Das Bad, eine große Wohnküche mit Waschmaschine und WLAN stehen zur Mitnutzung zur Verfügung. Der Gleisdreieck- Park liegt direkt vor der Tür. Durch den Park gelangt man fußläufig in 15 min zum Potsdamer Platz sowie nach Schöneberg. Der beliebte Bergmannkiez mit seinen vielen Bars, Restaurants, Clubs, Markhallen, Märkten, Geschäften, Programmkinos ist 7 min fußläufig entfernt. Die verkehrsgünstig gelegenen Bahnstationen Möckernbrücke U1/ U7, Gleisdreieck U2/U1, Anhalter Bahnhof S1/S2/S25, Mehringdamm U6/U7 und Yorkstraße S2/S25/U7 sind alle fußläufig in 8 min erreichbar.
amenities: {Wifi,Kitchen,Heating,Washer,Essentials,Hangers,"Hair dryer","Laptop friendly workspace"}

name: new, clean, sunny & great hospitality in x berg
summary: Kleines 60er Jahre modernes Apartment mit einem schönen Schlafzimmer zur Strasse, neuem Süd-West Balkon, Neuer Küche & Neuem hellem Bad in den Innenhof mit viel Licht mitten im Wrangel-Kiez mitten in Berlin Zentrum. Der Wrangel-Kiez liegt zentral und ist beliebtes Wohnquartier in Berlin und bildet den östlichen Abschluss des Ortsteils Kreuzberg.  Die Markthalle9 befindet sich um die Ecke und bietet Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für regionale Produkte und etliche verschiendene Delikatessen.
space: Hier gibt es ein ca. 50 qm grosses, Apartment für maximal ein Paar.  Sauber und modern reduziert eingerichtet, mit einem kleinen Balkon zum Innenhof mit Blick auf Bäume und eine schöne Berliner Brandwand aus Ziegelsteinen. Das Apartment ist hell und für maximal zwei Personen (nur auf Anfrage!) Das Apartment verfügt über eine Vollküche mit Herd und Backofen sowie Spülmaschine.

name: Cute and bright apt. in the heart of Kreuzberg.
summary: Charming and bright studio apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg. 35 sq mt, with kitchen and bathroom, located in Graefeskeiz, one of the most picturesque and bohemian area’s of Berlin. Big green tree’s, an abundance of cafe’s, bars and restaurants, boutique clothing stores, and ice-cream and burgers. On one of the street is the canal, perfect for summer afternoon beers, and the other is Hasenheide Park.
space: Bed is for 2 people, the apartment is is very clean, has a fully furnished kitchen and bathroom (shower). There is a clothes rack with hangers and some drawers for your things. I also have a work space with desk chair and fast WLAN internet The kitchen has everything you need, Included:  Moka Pot for coffee,  Water boiler,  Washing machine,  Towels and Linen, Vacuum cleaner,  Cleaning Supplies. Location couldn’t be more perfect, it is in riding distance to Tempelhoff, and walking distance to Hermanplatz, and Kottbusser Tor (U1, U7, U8 trainlines), which gives you easy access to any part of the city.

summary: A light and sunny furnished room in trendy Kreuzberg, with spacious high ceilings in traditional Berlin style. The bedroom with a bed (140x200) kitchen with all things that are necessary for cooking and eating, fridge, gas stove with plates and oven.  bathroom washbasin with mirror, full-length bathtub with shower, hairdryer. toilet is a extra room. name: Mon Bijou at Fuggerstraße  in Schoeneberg
summary: In the heart of Schöneberg, in West Berlin. Just a few steps away from KaDeWe (biggest departemtent store on the European Continent) Bars and restaurants nearby. Metro 2 min. away. Lift available. Im Herzen von Schöneberg ist das Zimmer in einem Gründerzeitaltbau von 1899 im ausgebauten DG zu finden. Aus dem Fenster schaut man auf den nutzbaren Balkon und in den Innenhof. KaDeWe Restaurants und Bars direkt in der Nähe.  Fahrstuhl vorhanden.
description: In the heart of Schöneberg, in West Berlin. Just a few steps away from KaDeWe (biggest departemtent store on the European Continent) Bars and restaurants nearby. Metro 2 min. away. Lift available. Im Herzen von Schöneberg ist das Zimmer in einem Gründerzeitaltbau von 1899 im ausgebauten DG zu finden. Aus dem Fenster schaut man auf den nutzbaren Balkon und in den Innenhof. KaDeWe Restaurants und Bars direkt in der Nähe.  Fahrstuhl vorhanden. Kitchen, if we are not at home living room and balcony of course. In der Nähe vom KaDeWe im Herzen vom bunten Schöneberg (gay area). Zwischen Wittenbergplatz und Viktoria-Luise-Platz zur U-bahn jeweils 2 Minuten. Bis zum Zoologischen Garten sind es zu Fuß 15 Minuten. Up until 2000, Berlin comprised 23 different Bezirke or official districts, each with its own distinctive history and character. Then, in 2001, these 23 were consolidated into twelve. We live in Tempelhof-Schöneberg. It belongs to the old west city center (KaDeWe, Zoo, Kurfürstendamm).

name: Lichtdurchflutete, neu renovierte Wohnung
summary: Die Wohnung liegt direkt zwischen Neuköln und Kreuzberg (5 min Fußweg zum Hermannplatz). Sie ist komplett neu renoviert, mit hohen Decken und modernem Schliff. Vom Wohnzimmer aus sieht man in die zwei anliegenden, grünen Hinterhöfe. Die Wohnung verfügt über ein großes Schlafzimmer (Doppelbett) und ein kleines mit Hochbett (Einzelbett). Trotz ihrer zentraler Lage ist sie ruhig. Auch im Sommer ist sie schön kühl und wahrlich eine Oase auf 89 m2 im Herzen des lauten Kreuzkölns.
space: Ihr habt eine Küche die ins Wohnzimmer übergeht, einen langen Flur der quer durch die Wohnung führt, zwei Schlafzimmer und zwei Badezimmer. Im Wohnzimmer gibt es einen Pariser Balkon.  You’ll enjoy 89m2 that have recently been renovated completely. New kitchen, new wooden floors, new bathrooms and a new arrangement of the space give room to a comfortable stay.  I’ve put much thought into the arrangement of the furniture to make it look unique and practical. Here a description of the floor plan:  You enter the apartment on to a long hallway that leads almost all the way through the entire space.  Right next to the entrance is a small storage space with laundry machine.  Next to it is the kitchen that is also connected to the living room.  There are two bedrooms. A small one with an elevated single bed and a master bedroom with a beautiful king size bed. The bigger bathroom is accessible only from the master bedroom and has a shower and a bathtub. The smaller nonetheless very comfortable

name: your cosy room in Kreuzberg
summary: The flat is located in a very popular area of Kreuzberg. Its close to the so called Graefekiez and the Admiralbrücke. Also Neukölln or the 'border' to it, the Hermannplatz is very close, but also the Bergmann-Kiez is not far, so you'll be in the middel of all good places in Kreuzberg! The old stucco room is about 25sqm in size, has a wooden floor, a big, comfortable bed (160x200) with a new mattress, a nice small couch,  a lot of light and plenty of space.
space: The apartment is a shared flat, we are 2, my flatmate is mostly present on weekends, besides it’s just me.

Also Neukölln or the 'border' to it, the Hermannplatz is very close, but also the Bergmann-Kiez is not far, so you'll be in the middel of all good places in Kreuzberg! The old stucco room is about 25sqm in size, has a wooden floor, a big, comfortable bed (160x200) with a new mattress, a nice small couch,  a lot of light and plenty of space. The apartment is a shared flat, we are 2, my flatmate is mostly present on weekends, besides it’s just me. Guests have access to the kitchen and, of course, to the shower room. Ich verbringe spontan Zeit mit den Gästen, z.B. in der Küche, allgemein am besten erreichbar bin ich per Handy, Gäste können mich gerne anschreiben wenn Fragen bestehen. I spontaneously spend time with the guests, e.g. in the kitchen, generally best accessible by mobile phone, guests can contact me if there are any questions. Lots of cafe's, ice cream, the bes
host_about: Ich bin Apothekerin und lebe in Berlin, ich liebe Musik, besonders auf Vinyl. Meine 2. Heimat ist Paris.

name: Zimmer in Kreuzberg, zentral für 2 Personen
summary: Wir, Christian und Kiki, leben in einer 130 qm großen und hellen Wohnung in Berlin-Kreuzberg. Wir sind offen, tolerant und respektvoll und freuen uns über Gäste jeden Alters. Das Gästezimmer vermieten wir an Paare,  Einzelpersonen oder Eltern mit einem Kleinkind die für ein paar Tage/Wochen in Berlin sind. Die große Küche und das Bad werden gemeinsam genutzt. In der Küche kann aber nur Cafe für ein Frühstück gekocht werden.
space: Die Wohnung ist sehr hell und ruhig, hat einen Balkon mit Blick in den begrünten Hinterhof und liegt direkt an einem großen Platz mit vielen Bäumen und einer großen Parkanlage. Wir sind hier mitten in Kreuzberg in einem multikulturellen Bezirk. Hier leben Studenten, kleine und große Familien, viele Kinder, Künstler und Menschen aus unterschiedlichen Kulturkreisen. Das macht den Bezirk sehr lebendig und vielfältig.

host_about:
I am totally into doing spontaneous things, such as waking up at 3am to drive to some other country. 
In September 2012 me and my my future wife arrived in Barcelona without money and it turned out to be one of the best trip experiences I've ever had. It would never happen without Airbnb and Couchsurfing. 

Nowadays I live in Berlin and do Digital Marketing and Data Analysis; I also co-own digital marketing agency. 
I live together with my charming wife and we gladly welcome guests from all over the world to show the city, share life experiences drinking tea, exploring local markets and unknown corners of Berlin.

Top 5 favourite TV shows:
1. Stranger Things
2. The Man in the High Castle
3. Black Mirror
4. Rick & Morty
5. Fringe

Favourite sport activities I've been doing: 
- Bouldering
- Capoeira
- Crossfit
- Running

name: Berlin-Kreuzberg: schönes Zimmer für eine Person
summary: Schönes Zimmer für eine Person (11 qm) mit Altbaucharme (Dielenfußboden, hohe Decken) mit geschmackvoller und zweckmäßiger Ausstattung. Zentral in Kreuzberg (10 Fußminuten zur Bergmannstraße und Marheinekeplatz, 15 Minuten zum Kottbusser Tor), der Landwehrkanal ist 100 m entfernt und lädt zum Spazierengehen und Joggen ein. Gute U-Bahn und Busanbindung in alle weiteren Stadtteile. Das Zimmer ist ausgestattet mit einem Bett (120x200), einem Kleiderschrank, einem Schreibtisch sowie einem Regal.
space: In der Wohnung wohne ich. 2 Zimmer stehen Gästen zur Verfügung.

name: Something else, central Neukölln!
summary: A super nice old building in the middle of the center. With a balconyview to the Rathaus Neukolln (City hall) and the famous shopping street Karl Marx. The room is cosy and full with plants as well as the balcony. The kitchen is fully equipped and the bathroom has a bathtub as well. Wooow.. best think to do after a long day strolling arround amazing Berlin! It's a non smoking house but feel free to smoke on the balcony. I have a doggy called Angel. she's from Peru. Super cute and easy going.
space: I up-cycled the apartment with stuff what I found on the street. The building I ripped down and left it Neukölln style half finished half styled. So you see the amazing old walls and feel the old energy they carry. One room has a balcony and a high bed. In that room there is a chill out and a desk to work on. The big room doesn't have a balcony but it super colorful and has the cinema included. Let me know which room you like to use with the booking.

name: Auf dem Dach von Berlin
summary: Helles, großes Zimmer mit Blick auf den Fernsehturm über die Dächer Berlins. Rund um Zionskirchplatz, Weinbergspark, Kastanienallee, Rosentaler Platz ist es inspirierend, entspannt und international. Mauerpark u. Bernauer Straße sind 10min entfernt. Du kannst in der Nähe gut essen, im Café sitzen oder in kleinen Geschäften stöbern. Galerien, Museen, Clubs, Theater, Alexanderplatz und Friedrichstr kannst du zu Fuß erreichen. Das Zimmer lädt auch zu Entspannung, Rückzug oder zum Arbeiten ein.
space: Das Zimmer ist Teil unserer großen Wohnung in einem typischen Berliner Wohnhaus von 1875. In dieser Wohnung leben und arbeiten wir, wenn wir nicht unterwegs sind. Im Gästezimmer befinden sich ein französisches Bett von 1,40m Breite, zwei bequeme Sessel, ein Schreibtisch und ein historischer Schrank. Der Blick über Berlin ist einzigartig. —————————— The guest room is part of our large apartment situated in a typical Berlin house built in 1875. We live and work in this apartment but we are often on the road. In the room there is a bed with the width of 1.40 meter. You'll also find two comfortable armchairs, a desk, and an antique closet. The view over the city of Berlin is unique and breath-taking.

Wir können dir gern Tipps geben, wo Berlin am schönsten und interessantesten ist.

name: Urban roof of Berlin-Kreuzberg
summary: The roof of Berlin Kreuzberg. The room under the roof, located in the heart of Berlin/Kreuzberg, with a balcony is in a modern flat with full urban feeling.  Bars, restaurants and underground system, you can reach out in short walking distance.  We are located in the middle of Berlin just some meters away from the line U1 of the metro.  Although we are very centered you can find your tranquility in a modern room.  Perfect place for moving around the city or for night life appreciators. No lift.

name: cozy attic room in Neukölln

space: Himmel über Berlin - Zugang zum Dach ruhige Oase mitten im Großstadtdschungel.   sehr sonniges Zimmer
description: Ein gemütliches Zimmer über den Dächern von Berlin. In dem ihr auch als Paar genug Platz habt, um ein paar Tage zu verweilen und das bunte Treiben der Stadt zu geniessen. Himmel über Berlin - Zugang zum Dach ruhige Oase mitten im Großstadtdschungel.   sehr sonniges Zimmer Das Zimmer hat einen eigen separaten Eingang. Das Bad ist direkt neben dem Zimmer und hat eine Badewanne. Die Küche liegt im unteren Teil der Maisonettwohnung und ist gleichzeitig der Gemeinschaftsraum. Ich oder mein Freund wohnen im Zimmer nebenan und beantworten dir gerne alle Fragen und geben dir Tipps für Ausflüge. Die Wohnung ist eine ruhige Oase über den Dächern Berlins. Im südlichen Epizentrum der Stadt liegt sie mitten im lebendigen und multikulturellen Neukölln. Hier findest du ein exklusives kulinarisches Angebot und Essen aus aller Welt direkt vor der Haustür. Sowie die besten und günstigsten Falafel der Stadt ;-)  Zu Fuss bist du in 10 min. am Maybachufer Türkenmarkt, in der Hasenheide oder auf dem Tempelh
host_about: I love cooking, dancing flamenco, doing yoga, singing and playing guitar

summary: 22 m2 room with artistic charm located in the Bergmannkiez, one of Berlin’s most charismatic neighbourhoods in Kreuzberg, windows to the yard of a quiet building, wooden floor which makes it very cozy specially for the German cold, big room with double bed and big hammock, espresso machine. 5th floor without elevator, please keep this in mind before requesting. You have to share the bathroom with me. There is no kitchen avaliable.
space: The flat is quiet, sunny & warm (nery important in Berlin). The location is fantastic, the atmosphere is quiet hippie chic :)

name: Schnuckeliges Zimmer Graefekiez
summary: Das Zimmer befindet sich mitten im Graefekiez, mit vielen kleinen Cafés und Läden. Es hat tagsüber Sonne pur und ist urgemütlich. Küche und Bad (mit 2 Waschbecken) können mitbenutzt werden und sind über die Wohnung zu erreichen. Die Wohnung ist insg. sehr groß (127qm) und befindet sich in der 4. Etage.  Ich wohne hier mit meinem Sohn, und wir freuen uns sowohl über Gäste, die allein kommen als auch über Gäste mit Kindern. :)
space: Meine Gäste sind immer gern hier. Sie lieben die Mischung aus Ruhe und Gemütlichkeit in der Wohnung und die Triebsamkeit und Lebendigkeit der umliegenden Straßen. Die Vielfältigkeit der Cafés und Restaurants und die mit sehr viel Liebe und Ästhetik gestalteten kleinen Läden laden ein, den Kiez zu erkunden und zu genießen. Auch ohne Auto kommt man hier sehr gut und schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln nach Mitte, Prenzlauerberg, Schöneberg etc. Fahrräder können hier fast an jeder Ecke ausgeliehen werden - wie ich finde, die beste Variante, die Stadt zu erkunden...

Ich lebe mit meinem Sohn zusammen. Bin Erzieherin in einem Kreuzberger Kinderladen und habe viele Jahre als Gesangslehrerin gearbeitet. Ich liebe gute Filme, gutes (vegetarisches) Essen und gute Bücher. Ich mache Yoga, gehe gern wandern und ab und zu backe ich gern Kuchen. :-)
Ich reise selbst gern und habe über Airbnb schon so einige schöne Unterkünfte bewohnt.

name: quite room perfectly located
summary: I offer a cosy room in my apartment. The location is perfect and the room quite. I'm living in a wonderful apartment in a house from 1902: Enjoy the typical timber floor boards on the floor, the stucco at the ceiling and the large windows leaving a lot of light into all rooms. The flat has a perfect connection to public transporation and in the neigbourhood you can find everything you need (from the supermarket to the bar/Späti or shopping mall).
space: The room itself is situated in the back part of the flat towards the backyard. You reach it via a second corridor also leading to the bathroom (so room and bathroom are next to each other) The apartment is quite huge and very bright. You use together with me the large bathroom (tub, window), the very well equipped kitchen and the cosy living room (sofa, airmchair, TV, dining table, piano).

host_about:
I am totally into doing spontaneous things, such as waking up at 3am to drive to some other country. 
In September 2012 me and my my future wife arrived in Barcelona without money and it turned out to be one of the best trip experiences I've ever had. It would never happen without Airbnb and Couchsurfing. 

Nowadays I live in Berlin and do Digital Marketing and Data Analysis; I also co-own digital marketing agency. 
I live together with my charming wife and we gladly welcome guests from all over the world to show the city, share life experiences drinking tea, exploring local markets and unknown corners of Berlin.

Top 5 favourite TV shows:
1. Stranger Things
2. The Man in the High Castle
3. Black Mirror
4. Rick & Morty
5. Fringe

Favourite sport activities I've been doing: 
- Bouldering
- Capoeira
- Crossfit
- Running

It is located in Kollwitzkiez, one of the best areas in city.  Shared spaces are: living area, kitchen, bathroom, 2nd WC, laundry room, 20 m2 terrace. Feel free to ask any questions. I will be glad to make your stay comfortable. PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION & RULES BEFORE BOOKING. Nearby: Soho House, Alexanderplatz, Museum Island, Gendarmenmarkt, Mauerpark. Place fits great for couples / friends  / business travelers. 140 m2 Penthouse with a view on TV Tower, located between Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte.  You will have access to everything that you may need for your comfortable stay: spacious living room with HD projector and fireplace, open kitchen for making breakfast, huge 20 m2 terrace with a view on Alexanderplatz TV Tower, bathroom with tub and rain shower. PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION & HOUSE RULES BEFORE BOOKING. THE BEDROOM (PRIVATE): - Very
host_about:
I am totally into doing spontaneous things, such as waking up at 3am to drive to some other country. 
In September 2012 me and my my future wife arrived in Barcelona without money and it turned out to be one of the best trip experiences I've ever had. It would never happen without Airbnb and Couchsurfing. 

Nowadays I live in Berlin and do Digital Marketing and Data Analysis; I also co-own digital marketing agency. 
I live together with my charming wife and we gladly welcome guests from all over the world to show the city, share life experiences drinking tea, exploring local markets and unknown corners of Berlin.

Top 5 favourite TV shows:
1. Stranger Things
2. The Man in the High Castle
3. Black Mirror
4. Rick & Morty
5. Fringe

Favourite sport activities I've been doing: 
- Bouldering
- Capoeira
- Crossfit
- Running

name: Central, cosy and airy apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Cosy, airy basement apartment in Kreuzberg with hardwood floor throughout, stylish furniture and excellent heating. It contains a separate bathroom with powerful shower and own kitchen with coffee machine, cooking facilities, kettle and dining area. The spacious bedroom features a comfortable double bed, a large wardrobe, leather sofa and writing desk.
description: Cosy, airy basement apartment in Kreuzberg with hardwood floor throughout, stylish furniture and excellent heating. It contains a separate bathroom with powerful shower and own kitchen with coffee machine, cooking facilities, kettle and dining area. The spacious bedroom features a comfortable double bed, a large wardrobe, leather sofa and writing desk. The hosts live in the neighbouring apartment and are always available for key handover, general information and any queries you may have. They do however have a separate entrance and you will be free to enjoy your stay in peace. The apartment is situated in a desirable and convenient location between Gleisdreieck Park, Viktoriapark, Potsdamer Platz, Checkpoint Charlie, Tempelhofer Feld and the many cafes, restaurants, bars and shops of Bergmannstraße. The apartment boasts excellent transport links, with the U1, U6, U7, U2, and S-Bahn lines all within easy access. Closest stations are Mehringdamm (U6, U7), Möckernbrücke (U7, U1), Gleisdre

space: "If the room is no more availabe for the days you need, pls check my 2nd room." Comfortable Double bed 140x200cm, bed linen suitable for allergic people, wardrobe with mirror. Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher, Tassen, Kaffee und Tee sowie Flaschenöffner, kleine Messe (für Obst) stehen kostenlos im Flur zur Verfügung. Bitte beachten, dass es KEINE KÜCHE, keine Gabel, keine Teller gibt, also Kochen ist nicht möglich.

name: BIG room/Balcony/View of river, museums, cathedral
summary: This is a huge room with one of the best views in Berlin. You get your own 30m2 room with a private bathroom while sharing a space with two awesome guys (my husband and me). We look forward to your visit and will make sure you have the best time in Berlin.
space: The room is huge! It has access to a balcony with outdoor furniture and there is a fireplace inside the bedroom. The space is very well lit by 4 floor-to-ceiling windows. One window has a direct view to the Spree River, Cathedral, and beautiful Monbijoubrücke. The other windows have a great view of Bode Museum (and wonderful dome), Monbijou park (former residence of the Queen of Prussia) and the famous Synagogue. From the balcony you can witness incredible, breathtaking sunsets.

The bathroom is your own and for your exclusive use. This neighborhood has all of the most famous landmarks in Berlin. Dom (Cathedral), Museum Island, Brandenburg
host_about: I currently live with my husband in Berlin, where I work as a freelance teacher/translator. Anyone who has ever met me can say I have a true passion for languages. I also love to meet people from all over the world, learn as much as I can about their life experience, and all-in-all, widen my horizons every day.

name: Cosy maisonette  in quiet backyard in Berlin Mitte
summary: I’m renting out my 60sqm maisonette. I would be happy to host you while your stay in this exciting city.  The apartment is perfect for singles or a couple!  I look forward to hearing from you for any further information. Nadine
space: The flat is on the mezzanine floor in the second backyard of an old industrial Berlin building. Located in the backyard, you can hardly hear the streets and enjoy and relax after a busy day, exploring berlin days or nights.  When you enter the flat, there is a little hallway from where you get to the bathroom with a shower and toilet or to the rest of the flat.  The ca. 37sqm living room and kitchen has wooden floor panels and a very high ceiling which makes it look even bigger. The stairs in the living room lead to the ca. 13sqm cosy bedroom, with a comfy 160 x 200 cm bed. There is a rack with hangers for your clothes. This is a private apartment, means I leave my personal belongings in the flat.

I fell in love with Berlin from the very first moment on and decided to stay. This was in 2004 and the city still surprises me every day. When I’m at home I love to go to concerts, exhibitions or enjoy having a drink in the neighbourhood with my friends. 
When I‘m not Berlin, I‘m probably traveling to learn more about other cultures, meet new people, and spend time to see some art and listen to music. I like to go hiking in the mountains and love to spend time at the seaside, who wouldn’t?

name: Newly Renovated Apartment next to Maybachufer
summary: Beautiful open apartment in a quiet yet vibrant part of the Reuterkiez/Kreuzkölln area of Berlin. It is right next to Maybachufer; in walking distance to bars, restaurants, cafes, and some beautiful green spaces. The space has one large living space; consisting of a living room, dining area and kitchen, a bed room and a bathroom. In your bedroom there are two single beds that can be used separately or as a double bed.
space: The apartment is a designers dream.  It is an Alt-Bau building - a traditional Berlin apartment, built around the 1890s. The interior was redesigned, with the refurbishment having finished only in June 2017. All appliances and finishes are new, or were refurbished at that time. The ceilings are 3.6m high, which gives it a real sense of tranquility. The apartment itself is 75sqm, and has a large and open living area, made up of the living room, dining room and kitchen.  It's a lovely space to cook, relax or host. The guest bedroom is located in the back half of the apartment, and is dead silent at night. It's a lovely home away from home.
