Direkte Anbindung an U2 und 147er Bus Ich bin immer ein persönlicher Ansprechpartner Schön ruhig in den Höfen gelegen. Die U-Bahn U2 Märkischs Museum ist 50m entfernt, Der 147er Bus ist 100m entfernt. Er verbindet im 20 Minutentakt Hauptbahnhof und Ostbahnhof.  Ein Biosupermarkt & Netto befinden sich nur 50m entfernt. Die Wohnung wird nur mit einem Code beim Fahrstuhl erreicht.
host_about: Ich bin mit meinen 3 Kindern in vielen Ländern fast immer in Ferienwohnungen gewesen. Ich liebe die Freiheit gegenüber einem Hotel noch heute. Auch weiß ich aus Erfahrung, worauf es ankommt. Sauberkeit und zentrale Lage, Check in auch mal nach 22 Uhr, Gewürze, Alufolie & Zewarolle, auf Wunsch gerne auch ein gefüllter Kühlschrank. Spielzeug für Kinder und Erwachsene, Infomaterial & Maps. Ich liebe Blumen. So sind Balkon oder Garten für Sie schön bepflanzt (ab Mai). Treten Sie ein und fühlen sie sich Zuhause. Gerne auch auf ein Gläschen in unserem gemütlichen Weinrestaurant NÖ! in Berlin Mitte.

name: Whole Apt 43 sqm, quiet, cosy and central
summary: Gästewohnung mit separatem Eingang und mit eigener Küche und Bad. Nahe Nollendorfplatz, Potsdamer Platz und Kudamm. Friendly host looking forward to welcome you! Je parle francais - a bientot! Hablo espanol tambien! Nos veremos!
space: Über einen separaten Eingang betritt man die Wohnung. Von einem langen Flur gehen die gemütliche Wohnküche mit Waschmaschine, Gasherd und Mikrowelle und das Wannenbad ab. Am Ende liegt das Schlafzimmer mit Blick in einen großen Garten. Das Bett ist 1,60×2,00m mit durchgehender Matratze.

Hallo!

name: Stylish studio next to canal
summary: Recently renovated flat in Neukölln in tasteful high-end interior, a block away from the beautiful canal and lively Weichselpark, endless options of bars and restaurants on parallel Weserstraße. The place you want to be in when visiting Berlin.
description: Recently renovated flat in Neukölln in tasteful high-end interior, a block away from the beautiful canal and lively Weichselpark, endless options of bars and restaurants on parallel Weserstraße. The place you want to be in when visiting Berlin. Our neighbourhood is surrounded by cafés, restaurants and shops, and only a block away from the canal. There's a supermarket and a 24hour convenience store on the same block. The metro station Rathaus Neukölln is no more than 500m away, a M41 bus station less than 300m away and usually plenty of parking possibilities on our street.

name: Ruhige,  gemütliche Wohnung im Herzen Kreuzbergs
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer ruhigen Strasse im Herzen von Kreuzberg. Einkaufen kann man um die Ecke. Es gibt 2 Supermärkte und mehrere Bäckereien, auch mit Frühstücksmöglichkeiten. Ausserdem gibt es Bars, Clubs, Cafes, billige und teure Restaurants fussläufig zu erreichen. U- und S- Bahn  5 Min., 2 Buslinien 2 Min. weit weg. Die Wohnung hat ausser dem geräumigen Zimmer, ein Bad, Holzfussböden und hohe Decken- eben eine typische und gepflegte Berliner Altbauwohnung. 2 Parks in der Nähe.
space: Das Zimmer mit dem Doppelbett 1,40 x 2,00 m befindet sich im hinteren Teil der Wohnung und hat ein Fenster zum  Hinterhof raus, so dass es sehr ruhig ist. Es ist grosszügig geschnitten, ca 16 m2. Es hat noch einen grossen Tisch, zum Essen und für Computerarbeiten bestens geeignet. Wir haben Wlan. Ausserdem gibts einen Spiegel, eine Ablage für die Kaffeemaschine und Teekochen, Teller und Tassen. Und natürlich einen leeren Schrank für die Kleidung.

host_about: Ich bin Lehrerin und arbeite in einer Schule für geistig Behinderte. Ich habe zwei Kinder, die in Leipzig und Flensburg studieren und in ihren Semesterferien gerne zu Besuch kommen. Airbnb habe ich selbst einige Male ausprobiert und es hat mir gut gefallen, sodass ich mich entschied ebenfalls ein Zimmer anzubieten, welches frei geworden ist, da die Kinder ausgezogen sind.

name: Apartment with a gorgeous view
summary: Apartment with a gorgeous view on the 14th floor. The room has a double bed and a single bed. Private bathroom with a washing machine. Private kitchen.  24-hour security.  Free internet access
space: The bright bedroom contains a single bed as well as a double bed.  Guests can relax and watch the flat-screen TV and can enjoy home-cooked meals at the dining table.  The kitchen is fitted with a stove, oven, fridge, coffee maker, and tea kettle.   There is a washing machine in the bathroom.
description: Apartment with a gorgeous view on the 14th floor. The room has a double bed and a single bed. Private bathroom with a washing machine. Private kitchen.  24-hour security.  Free internet access The bright bedroom contains a single bed as well as a double bed.  Guests can relax and watch the flat-screen TV and can enjoy home-cooked meals at the dining table.  The kitchen is fitted with a stove, oven, fridge, coffee maker, and tea kettle.   There is a washing machine in the bathroom. You have the apartment absolutely to yourself. I usually meet you at check in, to say hello and explain everything but sometimes I  leave the key with a neighbor if I can't make it due to late arrival or other reasons. Check-in is from 4pm - but if the apartment is not booked then you can check in earlier. Just around the corner from the apartment is an S-Bahn (city rail) and U-Bahn (metro) station (Jannowitzbrücke), making getting around Berlin quick and easy.  Alexanderplatz Square (TV Tower) is one stop aw
host_about: I'm a born Berliner, lived in Berlin most of my live and I love to share my city and some of my inside knowledge with guests from all over the world. I've been renting apartments for almost 30 years, long before airbnb, but airbnb help me to connect with my guest on a new level.

name: Neat n’ quiet room in hip Neukölln
summary: The apartment is bright and comfortable. The bedroom has view to courtyard with trees.
space: The apartment has a convenient layout. The bedroom has a comfortable bed, a wardrobe for your clothes and a desk for your laptop.
description: The apartment is bright and comfortable. The bedroom has view to courtyard with trees. The apartment has a convenient layout. The bedroom has a comfortable bed, a wardrobe for your clothes and a desk for your laptop. Besides your bedroom, you’ll have a shared bathroom with a tub. Also you can make use of the fully-equipped kitchen. I'm looking forward to personally welcome you and answer your questions about the apartment and your stay in Berlin. The apartment is located in the hip & edgy district of Neukölln with several bars and restaurants nearby, however it's quiet because it's located in a second yard, far from the main street.   What I enjoy about this apartment is that it's located between the quiet side and the lively side of Neukölln. Both around the corner.  On one side is the Neuköllner ship canal where one can go for long walks, jogging or biking by the water and green spaces. On the other side there are shopping facilities and cool bars, cafés and restaurants.  The metro s
host_about:
Hi! I'm from Athens, Greece, where I spent most of my life. I live in Berlin, Germany, which I consider second home.  

I believe that traveling is one of the best things in life. I'm mostly into round trips, but I can definitely enjoy relaxed holidays from time to time. I'm always looking forward to the next trip, concert, performance or art exhibition.  

Positive thinking and smile are important to me. I'm interested in human feelings and psychology. 

I'm a respectful and quiet guest. They say I'm a good host. I'll respond to all of your queries, give you detailed instructions how to reach the property and will do my best for you to feel at home.

Looking forward to be your guest or host!

summary: Cosy beautiful 1 bedroom flat with a big living room, nice kitchen an sunny balcony. It is located very central in Mitte, yet in a very quiet street and in an area with a lot of history. Thanks to the nearby subway (U8) and different tram lines, this flat is a great starting point for various Berlin adventures.

summary: This luxurious flat is in a new Art-Deco-Style building (built 2018) on a quite street, yet very central. If you want to live in Kreuzberg but don't want to miss all the luxuries of modern living, this apartment is ideal for you. Two major subway stations (S-Bahn & U-Bahn) are only a few minutes walking. Lots of restaurants are in walking distance, as well as a famous spa (Liquidrom) and many parks. One park is only 3 min walking distance, ideal if you want to go jogging.
space: The apartment has a living room, bed room, balcony, kitchen, storage room and bath room. It is fully equipped and ready to move in. All you need is your tooth brush. description: Das Apartment ist für mehrere Monate zu mieten.  Es ist ein gemütliches, pflegeleichtes und helles Zuhause für alle die Ruhe und Entspannung nach einem langen Tag suchen. Es gibt einen Balkon samt Liegestuhl zum relaxen. Für Allergiker ist die Unterkunft sehr gut geeignet. Es ist zentral, U-Bahn und Busnah. Sehr wohl würde sich eine einzelne Person fühlen oder ein Paar. Dem Gast/Gäste stehen alle Räumlichkeiten alleine zur Verfügung. Ein Waschraum mit Miele Waschmaschinen und Trockner befindet sich im Keller der Anlage. Ein Wäscheständer befindet sich im Apartment Wenn Hilfe benötigt wird bin ich in der Nähe. International, jung, dynamisch, kreativ U2-Station "Märkisches Museum" ist 3 Minuten zu Fuß vom Apartment entfernt. Im größerem Umfeld gibt es kostenpflichtige Parkplätze.  Einen Parkplatz unter der Woche zu finden ist teils recht schwer, aber nicht unmöglich. Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucher Wohnung. Rauchern steht der Balkon zur Verfügung.

host_about:
I am totally into doing spontaneous things, such as waking up at 3am to drive to some other country. 
In September 2012 me and my my future wife arrived in Barcelona without money and it turned out to be one of the best trip experiences I've ever had. It would never happen without Airbnb and Couchsurfing. 

Nowadays I live in Berlin and do Digital Marketing and Data Analysis; I also co-own digital marketing agency. 
I live together with my charming wife and we gladly welcome guests from all over the world to show the city, share life experiences drinking tea, exploring local markets and unknown corners of Berlin.

Top 5 favourite TV shows:
1. Stranger Things
2. The Man in the High Castle
3. Black Mirror
4. Rick & Morty
5. Fringe

Favourite sport activities I've been doing: 
- Bouldering
- Capoeira
- Crossfit
- Running

name: Cozy Nest in Berlin-Kreuzberg

You get one Bedroom with one compartment of the wardrobe for hanging clothes etc. and the living room to relax. I have Internet, kitchen with washing machine, bathroom with shower.  so everything you need to enjoy your stay in Berlin.
space: The apartment is located in the backyard. It’s really silent as there is no street facing the windows.  You have one bedroom with a queen sized bed (160x200cm). Towels included.  There‘s a kitchen for cooking, though there are lots of restaurants close by at Mehringdamm and Bergmannstraße (10min).  Private bathroom with shower. Additionally the living room with a comfortable couch and dining table.

host_about:
I m a 36-year old laid back guy, working and living in Berlin. 
I studied Biology in Munich where I grew up. But after a while I thought it would be nice for a change. So I decided to move to the capital of Germany, Berlin, 8 years ago, which I now can call my home. I just fell in love with this multicultural city.

I used to do a lot of capoeira when I was younger and now still do lots of sports. I play the guitar from time to time. Additionally I love the outdoors, mountains but as well as meeting people for a decent self made dinner with a wine and tasty food. I m a ambitious amateur chef though I can never learn enough.

I also love to travel and meet other local people around the world. I enjoyed to go off the beaten treck the last years and stayed in cozy apartments more then in expensive, boring hotels.
I used to do couch surfing for a while and I collected a lot experience as a host.

I would describe myself as an easy going person, happy and curious to learn new stuff about this world. Always up for a good talk.

space: Please remember this is not a hotel, this is my and my boyfriends home and we continue to use it whilst you are staying here. We are busy working and studying during the week, however on the weekends, we like to be social. From time to time this may be a dinner or some drinks with friends here, or going out to enjoy the vibrant Berlin nightlife and coming home late. We are always 100% respectful with this BUT if you don't want any disturbances at all, please do not book with us.

name: Spacious room + balcony in the heart of Neukölln
summary: Welcome to Neukölln! The most spacious and lovely room in our apartment is waiting for you :) The room has a lot of plants, a nice sofa to chill out, a desk and most important direct access to our big and beautiful balcony.  Our apartment is located in the heart of Neukölln right next to the historic "Körnerpark" and close to the former airfield and now beautiful park "Tempelhofer Feld".  Easy to reach from metro station "Hermanstrasse" or "Leinestrasse". Hope to welcome all of you soon :)

host_about:

Over the last years I lived in Berlin, Chile, Nepal and Medellín. Right know I´m back in Berlin and will be more than happy to welcome all of you to my home and  this wonderful and exciting city!

name: Cozy ground floor studio apartment
summary: You'll be renting a cozy ground floor studio apartment close to Nollendorfplatz in central Berlin. The area is known for its colorful and LGBT-friendly scene. Potsdamer Platz, the huge park Tiergarten and Berlin's major shopping street Kurfürstendamm are close. Thus, you'll live just a jump away from four underground and various bus lines that take you to places all over Berlin.
space: Though it's only one step away to many public transport options, the atmosphere inside of the apartment is super relaxed and quiet because it is situated towards the inner courtyard.
description: You'll be renting a cozy ground floor studio apartment close to Nollendorfplatz in central Berlin. The area is known for its colorful and LGBT-friendly scene. Potsdamer Platz, the huge park Tiergarten and Berlin's major shopping street Kurfürstendamm are close. Thus, you'll live just a jump away from four underground and various bus lines that take you to places all over Berlin. Though it's only one step away to many public transport options, the atmosphere inside of the apartment is super relaxed and quiet because it is situated towards the inner courtyard. You'll have access to the whole apartment. My personal stuff will be out of your way because I hide it in the storage. If you have any problems or questions, just call me. My phone number will be provided after your booking. I also use Whats App. The station Nollendorfplatz is only one step away from my apartment. Your key will be given to you via a key box which I put 25 meters away from the main entrance.

name: Authentic apartment in the middle of Kreuzberg
summary: Welcome to Berlin! Since I’m traveling myself, I’m renting out my authentic apartment between Bergmannkiez and Gräfekiez which are famous for having countless street cafes, bars, and restaurants. The bright apartment is located near the Admiralsbrücke and the Maybachufer, where you can take relaxing walks. Moreover, there is a bike rental just around the corner where you can easily rent a bike. Thus, my home is perfect for business travelers and tourists!
space: My wonderful apartment is located in the middle of Kreuzberg. The light-flooded apartment is fully-equipped and offers all the comforts of a cozy home. Due to a central location, my home is perfect for both tourists and business travelers. In the living room, you will find 2 comfortable armchairs where you can spend pleasant time watching TV (cable TV). Next room is a bright bedroom with a large box spring bed (180x200cm). The bed will be freshly made and prepared for your arrival. Here you will find enough space in the wardrobe for your belongings. A fully-equipped kitchen is an ideal place for cooking a self-prepared meal which is also nicely set up. At the dining table, you can also take a seat to work. The modern bathroom has a shower, where you can refresh yourself after a long day in Berlin. During your stay, you will be provided high-quality linen, towels and toiletries. Enjoy your stay in my home while exploring Berlin!

name: Minimal private room in hip Schillerkiez
summary: Our flat is very central located in Berlin, Neukölln. We, Charlotte + Max, usually live in this 97 m2 flat, but if we're out of town we sublet one or both rooms. This is the bigger room, which has a bed for two, a desk and some space for your clothes. Furthermore you can of course use our bathroom and our superspacious living room/kitchen.  If you need any further information, just ask! Also, we're both gay so the flat is highly LGBT-friendly ;)
space: The flat has everything you need for your stay, including bath tub, washing machine, a TV with Netflix, Wifi etc. It's in the first floor and in a very quiet area.
description: Our flat is very central located in Berlin, Neukölln. We, Charlotte + Max, usually live in this 97 m2 flat, but if we're out of town we sublet one or both rooms. This is the bigger room, which has a bed for two, a desk and some space for your clothes. Furthermore you can of course use our bathroom and our superspacious living room/kitchen.  If you need any further information, just ask! Also, we're both gay so the flat is highly LGBT-friendly ;) The flat has everything you need for your stay, including bath tub, washing machine, a TV with Netflix, Wifi etc. It's in the first floor and in a very quiet area. We're happy to give you some tips or recommendations for your trip to Berlin and know the nice places here quite well :) The flat is close to Tempelhofer Feld, which is a lovely place to spend a sunny day at! Additionally there are a lot of nice small shops, restaurants etc. in Schillerkiez and the next metro stations are just 5 min by foot.

name: A Room in Kreuzberg
summary: The flat is in 13th floor with 2 elevators. You will have a awesome view from the living room and  balcony. Cosy room in a shared flat in the center of Berlin. 3 minutes walking distance to (Bus, S-bahn, U-bahn).
space: The space Its a 72 square meters Flat with lots of lights and air. It has 2 bed room, 1 living room/dinning, 1 bathroom with bathtub, kitchen and a Balcony. Newly renovated and fully equipped with wifi, coffee machine, refrigerator..Everything you need to live in a flat.  At the moment me and my husband living at the appartment and the guest room is being used as an Airbnb. You'll have the guestroom all to yourself and you'll share the kitchen, living/dinning, bathroom and balcony with us. It's a medium room with a of light (a big Window). The room comes with 1 sofa bed and a desk for work.

We've got you covered: coffee machine, water kettle, refrigerator, cooker/stove, oven, pots and pans, everything. There's
host_about:
Dear Guest,
I am Bushra khanam Flora, your host. Flora is my Nick name so I prefer to called by Flora. I am originally from Bangladesh but Berlin is my 2nd home. By profession I work as an HR and I love my work. I also love to travel and meet new people from different countries. Because of my travel mania I got an experience to meet the guest expectation. I think also for guest, it's an advantage to see how local people live and of course the culture. I didn't tell you the 2nd advantage to visiting our apartment.  As I have a German husband, you will get to know both German and Bangladeshi culture at a time. There are lots of things to share. Come , visit us we will tell you the story about mystery of Berlin. 
Can't wait to see you.
Tschüß.

name: Room in a shared flat in Neukölln
summary: Hi everybody! If you want to enjoy the original Berlin flair, our flat is the place to be. It is well located in the heart of Berlin-Neukölln, a young and hip district full of people from all over the world. You'll find cool Bars, a nice park, fancy restaurants and have an optimal connection to all the interesting places in Berlin. The room you can rent here is part of a shared flat of 4 people. The bathroom will be used by everybody and we would be happy to hang out with us in our living room.
space: We are very interested in meeting new people from all over the world and would be happy to show you the niest places in out neighborhood. In the evening we sometime cook, laugh and chat together.

summary: Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral. Nur 5 Minuten vom Alexanderplatz entfernt!  Folgende Ausstattung ist vorhanden: Flur Garderobe Kleiderschrank  Badezimmer mit Badewanne  1,60 großes Bett Flatscreen  Sofa, dieses kann man zum Schlafsofa ausfahren  Einbauküche mit Ceranfeld, Backofen, Kühlschrank und Waschmaschine  Kleiner Balkon mit mit Blick auf den Fernsehturm :)

name: Light and cozy room in Schöneberg/Tiergarten
summary: Our guest room is very light and cozy.  The flat is located close to Nollendorfplatz and Wittenbergplatz and from there you have easy access to all the important stations in Berlin. Direct connection to: Alexanderplatz, Zoo, Potsdamer Platz, Warschauer Straße, ZOB. Nearby are many cafés, bars, restaurants and supermarkets. Kurfürstendamm is just a few minutes away if you feel like shopping. We are excited to welcome you! P.S.: Home-rules: No cooking with meat/fish (we don’t like the smell).

host_about:
Hey :) 
We are three Students from Berlin. My name is Julian and I live in a shared apartment with two awesome people, Philipp and Yoli. 

We love doing sports, watching movies and having fun in the beautiful city of Berlin!

When it's summer you can find us in parks, cafés and hanging out with friends.

Come and join us for some positive vibes and Vegan food as well :)

name: Cozy Berlin Mitte Studio
summary: Gemütliches 1-Zimmer-Apartment in Berlin Mitte mit Aufzug, Küche, Badezimmer und Balkon mit Morgensonne im Gartenhaus. Fenster und Balkon zeigen zum ruhigen begrünten Innenhof. Der Mauerpark ist zu Fuß gut zu erreichen (10 min), ebenfalls in der Nähe befinden sich die Gedenkstätte Berliner Mauer, der Arkonaplatz mit Wochenmarkt,Flohmarkt (Sonntags), Hackescher Markt, Alexanderplatz. U-Bahn und Tram sind in der Nähe. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Bars, Cafés und Restaurants sind fußläufig zu erreichen.
space: Zur Küche gehören Herd, Backofen, Geschirrspüler, Kühl- und Gefrierschrank, Wasserkocher, Toaster, Kaffeemaschine. Geschirr, Besteck, Kochutensilien, Kaffee und Tee sowie eine Grundausstattung von Gewürzen und Öl sind vorhanden.  In der Küche stehen Kaffee, Tee und Gewürze zur Verfügung.  Das Badezimmer bietet Badewanne, Waschbecken und WC.  Das Bett ist 200x180cm groß. Decken, Kissen und Bezüge werden bereitgestellt. Ebenso Handtücher.  Der Schlafbereich lässt sich durch Rollos verdunkeln.

name: Tranquil Room in Kreuzberg by Viktoriapark, Berlin
summary: A tranquil and well connected spot with a short walking distance to bustling Bergmannkiez, three Berlin parks - Viktoria Park with its waterfall and a view over Berlin, Gleisdreieck and Tempelhofer Feld. Potsdamer Platz is 30 min walk via lovely Gleisdreieck, which has also a great biking path.
space: The flat is simple, bright and tranquil. The bedroom is plain and has an atmosphere of calm.  The guest bedroom, kitchen and and bathroom face courtyard towards north.
description: A tranquil and well connected spot with a short walking distance to bustling Bergmannkiez, three Berlin parks - Viktoria Park with its waterfall and a view over Berlin, Gleisdreieck and Tempelhofer Feld. Potsdamer Platz is 30 min walk via lovely Gleisdreieck, which has also a great biking path. The flat is simple, bright and tranquil. The bedroom is plain and has an atmosphere of calm.  The guest bedroom, kitchen and and bathroom face courtyard towards north. The guest room, kitchen, bathroom. I often write/work from home so I am available if/when needed. Plenty of cafes, bars, green areas. The apartment is located between Viktoriapark where you can see a view of Belin, Gleisdreieck Park that takes you by walk to Potsdamer Platz and famous Tempelhofer Feld. There is a Lidl supermarket 2 min walk. There is also Aldi, REwe and Biomark nearby. Bus 104 and 140 is 2 min. walk;  Metro  and Overground (Yorckstrasse /Mehringdamm) are 13 min walk (U6,U7,S1,2,25,26).

name: Spacious Cosy Room in the Heart of Hip Neukölln
summary: Spacious Cosy Room in 2 bedroom apartment in the Heart of Hip Neukölln, close to underground, 10 min from Alexanderplatz
space: English:  The room: Is about 26 sqm and Is equipped with a sofa that can easily be changed into a large bed - cosy for day and night :) Furthermore there is an armchair, a book shelf (with many books and sight infos about Berlin) and a table. Best feature: The balcony! Fitting easily two people to chill out after the day.  The apartment: is located on the first floor of an old typical building on a street with little traffic. Therefore, ceilings are high and there is a wooden floor. Other rooms: You have full access to the kitchen and I am happy to share the equipment as long as you make sure to handle it carefully. Bathroom is also shared and equipped with a shower, towels and a hair dryer.  Location: Right in the heart of Neukölln (the hippest part of Berlin) - home to heaps of bars, cafes, restaurants, independent and second hand shops, markets and Turkish food culture. There is an organic store across the street and a supermarket 50m away.  Get around: U8 at Hermannplatz is right a
description: Spacious Cosy Room in 2 bedroom apartment in the Heart of Hip Neukölln, close to underground, 10 min from Alexanderplatz English:  The room: Is about 26 sqm and Is equipped with a sofa that can easily be changed into a large bed - cosy for day and night :) Furthermore there is an armchair, a book shelf (with many books and sight infos about Berlin) and a table. Best feature: The balcony! Fitting easily two people to chill out after the day.  The apartment: is located on the first floor of an old typical building on a street with little traffic. Therefore, ceilings are high and there is a wooden floor. Other rooms: You have full access to the kitchen and I am happy to share the equipment as long as you make sure to handle it carefully. Bathroom is also shared and equipped with a shower, towels and a hair dryer.  Location: Right in the heart of Neukölln (the hippest part of Berlin) - home to heaps of bars, cafes, restaurants, independent and second hand shops, markets and Turkish food cu
host_about:
I am living and working in Berlin since 7 years, explored the city day and night and enjoying especially the music and cultural events the city has to offer :) 

I love biking the city which I would totally recommend since it is the easiest way to get around. Furthermore, I love movies, going out for food and learning new things. 

I lived a third of my life in flat sharing and found it always enriching - so I am pretty tolerant and flexible and enjoy conversations in the kitchen ;)

name: Nice & Cozy openspace in Schillerkiez
summary: Nice and cozy apartment in Schillerkiez! This lovely studio is located in one of the most popular areas of Berlin, close to bars and restaurants of all kinds, shops and supermarkets for all budgets. Despite being very close to Hermannstr and U8 Boddinstr metro station, the place is very quiet and bright, cool in summer and warm in winter. It is ideal for a visiting couple or for those who are looking for a quite place in Berlin. Homesharing, no smoking apartment.
space: That´s Homesharing, contains love, dedication and memories :-)  This is not a holiday home, it's the studio I've lived in for the last 5 years, I rent it only when I'm not in town. So I´m very happy that you come and stay, respect it and feel it like your home.  There is one comfortable bed for two people with new matress and one couch (also made with matress on top) where a third person can sleep.  Non-smoking apartment! No movie and music downloads (strictly prohibited and punished in Germany). You will find a sound system with 2 speakers and woofer on the big cristal table. That will allow you to listen to your music/playlist from phone, tablet, computer, etc. Jack-cable is furnished.

name: Spacious and bright room in front of the canal
summary: [Update: I am traveling a lot these days, so you probably are gonna be by yourself at the flat, if that's ok for you] Hey, there! I live alone in Berlin, so I make my bedroom available for you. It's a big and bright space, with a comfy bed, a good table for working and everything you need to feel at home. I live between Neukölln and Kreuzberg and I REALLY love my region, so I can recommend many places around for you feel totally like a local.  I bet you will love staying at my place.

I usually use the bedroom for myself, but when I have people on my place, I go to the living room – where I have my home office – and you will have your own private room. The rest of the flat is shared if I am not traveling – what can also be the case –, but you are really free to use it! I will be sleeping in the living room during the night, but during the day it's also a shared space if you just wanna hangout. I'm a very easy going and open-minded person. I make friends very easily but I also understand
host_about: Hello! I'm Felipe, a Brazilian traveler working remotely with digital advertising. Most of my year I'm living in Airbnb's houses so I will treat your home as if it was mine (or better!). I am always up for meeting new people all over the world, so feel free to invite me for a cup of tea. :)

name: Luxusappartment Schöneberg
summary: Helles Luxusappartment in KaDeWe-Nähe (3 min zu Fuß), vollverglaster Balkon/Wintergarten, Vollausstattung mit Waschmaschine/Trockner, Aufzug, behindertengerecht und barrierefrei, Privatparkplatz im direkten Sichtbereich der Wohnung, WLAN. Klimaanlage kostet 7 € extra pro Nacht.
space: Das Appartment liegt fußläufig zum Zentrum der City West von Berlin. Der U-Bahnhof Wittenbergplatz ist in 3 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen. Das Appartment ist vollständig behindertengerecht und barrierefrei ausgebaut und auch zu erreichen. Der Balkon ist vollverglast und kann bei Bedarf komplett geöffnet werden. Die Innenausstattung ist sehr modern und incl. Vollausstattung in Küche und Bad.

host_about:
Ich bin ein ruhiger gelassener  Wahlberliner der großen Wert auf Höflichkeit und gepflegte Umgangsformen legt. Zusagen werden von mir eingehalten!

Ansonsten bin ich viel auf Reisen in der Welt unterwegs und im Urlaub immer mal mit dem Fahrrad an ungewöhnlichen Orten wie China anzutreffen.

name: Double room in spacious flat in Kreuzberg
summary: The room (13 m²) is for singles or couples, provides a huge bed and is located between Maybachufer and Görlitzer Park in Berlin's  n°1 alternative culture district Kreuzberg.  There are plenty of bars, supermarkets, shopping facilities and restaurants closeby.  Walk 8 minutes to the nearby metro stations and reach the city center in about 20 minutes. You'll share the apartment with my flat mates Flipo (32) and Sascha (33). Both are busy working during the week and will respect your privacy.
space: The apartment is on the top floor of a picturesque building from the Jugenstil era, so it's very quiet and sunny all day long. During the week, my (Hidden by Airbnb) Sascha (33) and Flipo (32) are pretty busy with work so you'll have the place for yourself between 9am and 7pm.  The room for rent is aproximately 13 m². Our shared living room is nearly 30 m² big and shows our passion for decent furniture. Please also feel free to use our fully equiped kitchen (15 m²)  and the bathroom (8m²).

name: Spacious renovated apartment in Mitte!
summary: This modern  ground floor apartment is very spacious, bright and open-plan. This 60 m² property is fully equipped with an open-plan kitchen, living and dining area, spacious bedroom, and bathroom. Located in the Mitte neighbourhood, it is just outside the heart of Berlin, with easy connection to the city. There is plenty to explore in the area, with a wide range of museums and galleries nearby, as well as a piece of the Berlin Wall, just 5-minutes from this apartment. Ideal for small groups
space: The apartment is very spacious and bright. There is an open space with fully equipped kitchen with coffee machine, dishwasher and everything you might need. The toilet is very bright has a bath and washing machine.  There is more place for you stuff in the storage room. The apartment is located on the ground floor of a back building

name: Bright modern apartment with balcony.
summary: Bright, modern apartment in the heart of Neukölln's Weserstraße with access to your own private balcony overlooking a peaceful garden. Also included is super fast wifi!  I've also created a local guide to help you make the most of your stay in Berlin. This has been made into a website and will be shared with you upon booking the space.
space: Surrounded by cafes, bars, parks and transport links on your doorstep - you really can't go wrong with this vibrant neukolln area.
description: Bright, modern apartment in the heart of Neukölln's Weserstraße with access to your own private balcony overlooking a peaceful garden. Also included is super fast wifi!  I've also created a local guide to help you make the most of your stay in Berlin. This has been made into a website and will be shared with you upon booking the space. Surrounded by cafes, bars, parks and transport links on your doorstep - you really can't go wrong with this vibrant neukolln area. A large garden area is available to relax in if you get bored of your large balcony ;-) You have the whole flat to yourself with private access. Within a 1 minute walk from your front door, you can find 5 cafes, a cinema, 5 restaurants and 2 bars.....within a 1 minute walk! Public Transport The cheapest way to get to around is to take the bus or use the U7 from Rathaus Neukölln, both of which are on your door step. Did I mention the super fast wifi?
host_about:
Friendly, clean and organised! 
A people person you might say.

Some things:

Designer,  illustrator, curator.
I run a gallery space in Neukölln called Weserhalle.
Cheers!

name: Comfortable and clean bedroom in Kreuzberg
summary: Spacious and tidy clean rooms in a very beautiful and recently renovated apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg.   The room has a 1.4 (Website hidden by Airbnb) bed and a chaise longue.  The bathroom is kept clean and disinfected. You get fresh, clean and fluffy towels.
space: It's a very nice renovated flat with beautiful walls and floor.
description: Spacious and tidy clean rooms in a very beautiful and recently renovated apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg.   The room has a 1.4 (Website hidden by Airbnb) bed and a chaise longue.  The bathroom is kept clean and disinfected. You get fresh, clean and fluffy towels. It's a very nice renovated flat with beautiful walls and floor. High speed +50MBPS wireless internet. Im am available 24/7 by phone or (Hidden by Airbnb)  It is one of the trendiest neighbourhoods in Berlin, full of bars, coffee shops, markets, and green areas. It is safe and vibrant. Up to 2 more people will be sharing common areas.
host_about:
This is Christian de Jesús, 

Hospitality Manager, globetrotter and yogui entrepreneur born in Mexico but resident of the world.

I am currently working on a project that aims to expand current hospitality boundaries in terms of service, quality and human touch by squeezing the power and amazing tools that services like Airbnb provide and mixing it with the knowledge and experiences I gather from all around the world.

Let's be realistic and... Demand the impossible!!!

name: Schönes, helles Zimmer in der Reichenberger Straße
summary: Ich biete ein helles, freundliches, schön möbliertes Zimmer im angesagtesten Kiez Berlins an. Im Zimmer befindet sich ein Doppelbett, ein Sofa (kein Schlafsofa), ein Couchtisch, ein Kleiderschrank, eine Kommode ein Fernseher. WLAN ist vorhanden.  Küche und Badezimmer sind mit einer anderen Mitbewohnerin zu teilen. Zimmer ist nur für eine Person! Check in ab 17 Uhr.
space: Die Wohnung befindet sich in der Reichenberger Straße. Diese liegt in Kreuzberg zwischen, für Touristen begehrte Orte, dem Landwehrkanal und dem Görlitzer Park. Es gibt viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten ( einschließlich Biomarkt, türkischer Basar) in unmittelbarer Nähe. Bushaltestelle vor der Tür. Viele Restaurants, Bars und Szeneclubs sind in der Nachbarschaft vorhanden. Das Zimmer ist lediglich für eine Person.

name: Super central & sunny room at Zionskirchplatz!
summary: In the Heart of Berlin, stay in an german style apartment. Welcome to my home in the heart of vibrant Berlin center -the perfect home base for your Berlin adventure!  I love to share my home with travelers as I'm used to when on travels around the world. I'm happy to help and give you some local tips.  You'll have a comfortable and bright room for yourself; kitchen, bathroom and living room will be shared.
space: In the heart of Berlin, right on the border between Mitte and Prenzlauerberg, the location could not be better! I'm not just proud of the apartment, it is objectively in the most happening, most convenient part of Berlin. Mauerpark, Kastanien Allee, Hackescher Markt, Rosenthaler Platz, Torstraße... it`s all next door. The neighbourhood offers cool restaurants, cafés & bars.  The apartment is located on the first floor of the house. There is also an elevator. The place is very quiet, bright and peaceful. The whole apartment is freshly renovated and everything is brand new. Your room has a comfortable french double bed, 2 People can sleep here. The room has a closet, a mirror, a cozy armchair and a little table and chair.  For sure towels and sheets are provided. Kitchen and bathroom are complete with dishwasher, big fridge, wash machine, big shower.  Feel free to use the kitchen, but clean up the mess after you're done as a good flatmate might do ;-)  Of course you can use the WLAN, but

name: Cozy room in the heart of Kreuzberg!
summary: Get the real Berlin experience! Our beautiful apartment lies right in the heart of the bustling Kreuzberg district, overlooking the famous Görlitzer Park. Clubs, restaurants, markets, museums, the Spree River, Wrangelkiez, the Berlin Wall and much, much more are only meters away.
space: The flat has a large bathroom and kitchen, both fully stocked. You are welcome to use any appliances or cook.
description: Get the real Berlin experience! Our beautiful apartment lies right in the heart of the bustling Kreuzberg district, overlooking the famous Görlitzer Park. Clubs, restaurants, markets, museums, the Spree River, Wrangelkiez, the Berlin Wall and much, much more are only meters away. The flat has a large bathroom and kitchen, both fully stocked. You are welcome to use any appliances or cook. Either I or my wife will be home to welcome you. If you need something, don't hesitate to ask us. :) Görlitzer Park, Schlesisches Tor, Spree River, Berlin Wall, Warschauer Strasse, Club der Visionäre, etc.... Welcome to the heart of Berlin!!! :) The apartment is 5 walking minutes from the metro station Schlesisches Tor, as well as numerous bus stations and is easily reached via public transport. We kindly ask our guests to refrain from activities such as illegal online downloads and filesharing.
host_about:
French / Belgian mix. In Berlin since 2010 and loving it.
I look forward to meeting you.

name: Bright Spacious Room in central Berlin Mitte
summary: Our apartment (74qm) is located in a quiet, yet very central neighbourhood in Berlin-Mitte. Arriving at the Berlin Main Station (Hauptbahnhof) it takes you about 10 minutes to get to our place. Friedrichstraße, Torstraße, Alexanderplatz, Rosenthaler Platz, Gedenkstätte Berliner Mauer... everything is in walking distance. 3 minutes walk to the Underground (U6 Oranienburger Tor) and S-Bahn (Nordbahnhof) you get around very easily around. Green parks, nice bars and restaurants in walking distance.

name: Private bedroom in gorgeous Kreuzberg apartment
summary: I would like to offer you a neat (17sqm) and clean room in a unique design apartment in Kreuzberg. You will be sleeping on a completely new and super comfy (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) cm  spring-core mattress  and new bed. You have access to the bathroom, kitchen and dining room. My home is close to Station Berlin (Conference Location for Berlin), Park am Gleisdreieck, Viktoriapark, Bergmannstraße, Technikmuseum, HAU, Möckernbrücke, Hallesches Haus, Hallesches Tor and really good connected to puplic transport.
space: I am living in a spacious 100 square meters apartment in the quiet part of Kreuzberg. I (28) work as a projectmanager/conceptor for video design agency. I would like to give you the possibility to enjoy the Berlin life in a beautiful atmosphere.  The building with it's condominiums is from the Wilhelminian time with typical old building characteristics such as 3,70 m high ceilings, stucco, double wing doors and floorboard.   Our home has 3 big rooms, one of them will be all yours during your stay. It's the farest away from my room so you will have enough privacy.  We have a fully equipped kitchen, where we love to cook. We keep the place very clean and expect the same from you. Please tell me beforehand a little about you: Why you are in Berlin, your hobbies etc. etc.

name: Design apartment in Berlin Mitte
summary: Quiet apartment in a beautiful old building in central Berlin. Perfect location for various transport connections. Metro station (Ubahn) is right in front of the building. Main train station, Hauptbahnhof is 10 mins away and Tegel airport is 25 mins away. Also, you will be a walking distance away from some of Mitte’s best bars and restaurants. And all the main tourist sites are also walking distance (Reichtag, Branderburg Gate, etc). The apartment is newly renovated and very comfortable.

I will be available on whats up or email throughout your stay to answer any questions but I wont be there in person. In case you are coming by car, there is parking available around the building.
host_about:
I am originally from Belgrade, Serbia but I have spent almost half of my life living abroad, mostly in London. I travel a lot for work and pleasure. 
When I travel I like to feel at home wherever I am and go to places where locals go, so when it comes to knowing clubs, restaurants, bars, culture, I am the person to ask. :-) I find joy in discovering little pockets and gems in cities I live in or travel to. Belgrade has a special place in my heart and I am very proud to be from there. I used work in the online advertising industry in London, and I tend to live a very busy life but whenever I can I love spending time with family back home or friends all around the world. Now I live in Berlin for almost a year.

name: Private room, cosy apartment, beloved neighborhood
summary: My cosy but modern apartment is located in one of Berlin’s most beloved “Kiez” (neighborhood) - full of expats and locals alike. Great restaurants, a slew of bars, and the enchanting canal are but steps away. Reach three subway lines - U1 (for a tour of Potsdamer Platz and world famous art galleries), U3 (for a relaxing sojourn at a lake), & U8 (for sightseeing at Alexanderplatz) - and two subway stations within a 3-4 minute walk along a beautiful, cobblestoned, tree-lined street.
space: A modern kitchen and sleek bathroom round off a pleasant stay in my apartment.
description: My cosy but modern apartment is located in one of Berlin’s most beloved “Kiez” (neighborhood) - full of expats and locals alike. Great restaurants, a slew of bars, and the enchanting canal are but steps away. Reach three subway lines - U1 (for a tour of Potsdamer Platz and world famous art galleries), U3 (for a relaxing sojourn at a lake), & U8 (for sightseeing at Alexanderplatz) - and two subway stations within a 3-4 minute walk along a beautiful, cobblestoned, tree-lined street. A modern kitchen and sleek bathroom round off a pleasant stay in my apartment. The kitchen can be used for having a takeout meal. I’m here to answer any questions you have. The neighborhood is hands-down one of the coolest in Europe — and not because the New York Times says so. Get ready for hip bars and divey kraft beer joints, amazing food from cheap falafel to whiskey & BBQ, and relaxing beer nights alongside the canal. Bike-sharing and other ride-sharing options abound in Berlin. The best way to get aroun

name: Cozy Room in Kreuzberg - 2 Min. to Landwehrkanal
summary: Feel like home in my super cozy flat in the heart of legendary Kreuzberg. The Room is in my 2-bedroom apartment and just a 5 min walk away from U-Bahn Station Görlitzer Bahnhof and only 2 min to the lovely Landwehrkanal. The 18m² Room comes with a double bed, work desk, WiFi, wardrobe and many interesting books. Of course you can use the fully equipped kitchen and bathroom where you'll find a washing machine, hairdryer, big refrigerator, blender, italian coffee maker, stove and so on.
space: Normally the whole apartment is my personal space and that's what's making it so much more homely than most apartments on AriBnB. You'll find real plants, plenty of books and love to detail all over the flat.  You can use everything you'll find in your room, the bathroom and the kitchen as long as you treat it with respect. Just like being in your own flat, I guess. Please don't take books or other belongings home with you. The shared apartment is in the 4th floor and can only be reached by staircase.

Hallo,
my name is Ernst. I have studied to be a teacher but I am mainly working as an entrepreneur and coach with various projects and my own crowdfunding consulting company. 

I love to go surfing and to learn new things. When I'm not traveling around I'm living in the best part of Berlin: Kreuzberg 36.

I read a lot and meditate almost every day. I enjoy cooking, especially low-carb foods and do a lot of sports, like running, going to the gym, beach volleyball in Berlin if the weather is nice and surfing if I'm at the sea. 

Basically I'm enjoying  every day of my life to the fullest.

name: Lichtenberger Straße (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Berlin.
summary: Welcome to the beautiful capital Berlin and in my bright, humble and quiet apartment. It offers business travelers and tourists the perfect retreat, as well as a comfortable and temporary home. As it is in a central location, you will have easy access to all the corners of Berlin.   The apartment consists of a bright living room, a bedroom, a bathroom and a kitchen. Thus, it offers you enough space to fully enjoy your trip.
description: Welcome to the beautiful capital Berlin and in my bright, humble and quiet apartment. It offers business travelers and tourists the perfect retreat, as well as a comfortable and temporary home. As it is in a central location, you will have easy access to all the corners of Berlin.   The apartment consists of a bright living room, a bedroom, a bathroom and a kitchen. Thus, it offers you enough space to fully enjoy your trip. The apartment is situated close to the most favourite places of Berlin – on Jannowitzbrücke. 10 minutes walk and you are in Alexanderplatz, on a lazyday a bus rides 2 minutes from the apartment on Holzmarktstrase, otherwise the undergroud train as well as the S-bahn ( S5, 7 and 9) are 5 minutes away that will take you to Alexanderplatz and to west-berlin Zoologicher Garten for sight seeing and shopping at KADEWE. A walk down Lichtenberger straße will lead you to Karl-Marx allee the most architecturally impressive street that used to be the Highlight of the GDR. For
host_about:
Hi there.I am Naliaka. I am 35 Years old  originally from Kenya but currently living in Berlin.  I moved to Berlin in 2012 to reunite with my husband who was born and raised in Berlin. Although i am homesick from time to time, Berlin's multicultural and hipness has made me feel at home. Experiencing seasonal changes was the most amazing encounter when i moved to Berlin. My best seasons are summer and spring. Nothing beats the spring flowery smell in the Air, i call it coming to life, summer is not only about the sun but also about the joys it brings along, grills, soaking in the lake and the sun, open air events, chilling by the spree, Music, open air movies. Always wish summer would never end .
I enjoy travelling the world, so far my favorite countries are Kenya, Belgium, France, Spain - Canary Islands, Tanzania . During my travels, i always slept in Hotels until i visited Paris where i had my first AIrbnb encounter. We had a great host, who made our stay quite enjoyable. Since then, i have always wanted to be a host, to give back the experience i had to someone else. The time has come and here i am. I would like to provide a guest the opportunity to have a homely place away from home, experience the best of Berlin, and hopefully walk away with unforgettable experiences.

name: Admire Historic Buildings from a Cozy Studio in Kreuzberg
summary: Sit on the rocking chair on the balcony that overlooks the peaceful, green interior courtyard. This studio makes efficient use of the space with a queen-sized bed on a mezzanine level and brand new marble tiles in the kitchen and bathroom.
space: Looking for a cosy and quiet, yet central apartment in a buzzing, creative and beautiful Berlin neighbourhood? You're in the right place. The studio apartment is located in the heart of leafy Graefekiez in Kreuzberg, one of Berlin’s most popular & beautiful neighbourhoods with its many preserved historic buildings. The flat itself has a big balcony and views into the quiet and green courtyard. The apartment is fully furnished and offers full access to fresh bed sheets & lines, towels, wifi, and basic cleaning and washing materials. There is a washing machine and dryer in the building that can be requested to use at a small surcharge. The bed is a queen sized double bed (160cm width) and the apartment has a storage space for your clothing and suitcases. Kitchen and bathroom are newly refurbished with beautiful marble tiles. The kitchen is equipped with a mini hob, microwave, fridge and a dishwasher as well as a nice working/ eating space looking out onto the balcony. The wide sofa exten

name: Spacious room in apartment in Bergmannkiez
summary: The room has around 25m*2 and with a window facing the patio to the south so the room got sunlight during daytime. The whole flat has around 90m*2, a kitchen, bathroom with bathtub and two more rooms with balcony to the patio. Your room is furnished with a double bed, a wardrobe, a shelve and a desk. *Update* We refurnished the room to make it more comfortable so the pictures are not up to date. I will upload some new ones within the next days.

name: Großes Zimmer in Berlin-Kreuzberg
summary: Schönes Zimmer für eine Person (24 qm) mit Altbaucharme (Dielenfußboden, hohe Decken) mit geschmackvoller und zweckmäßiger Ausstattung. Zentral in Kreuzberg (10 Fußminuten zur Bergmannstraße und Marheinekeplatz, 15 Minuten zum Kottbusser Tor), der Landwehrkanal ist 100 m entfernt und lädt zum Spazierengehen und Joggen ein. Gute U-Bahn und Busanbindung in alle weiteren Stadtteile. Das Zimmer ist ausgestattet mit einem Bett (140x200), Kleiderschrank,  Schreibtisch, einem kleinen Sofa und Regalen.
space: In der Wohnung wohne ich, zwei Zimmer werden an Gäste vermietet.

name: Charming flat in the heart of Neukölln
summary: This newly renovated 2-room apartment in the heart of Neukölln offers an retro-styled and feel-good atmosphere on 60 square meters and was furnished with attention to detail. You can run the whole apartment in a circle, which gives it a small loft character. If you love timber floorboards, stucco and flea market furniture with a modern touch, this is the right place for you. I hope, that you feel very comfortable here and treat the flat nicely. Please no Party-People :) THANK YOU
space: Renovated in 2018, you'll find newly stripped plank floors, finely carved stucco ceilings, an open, modern kitchen with knocked out brickwork and a small seating area, a chic bathroom with a tub, all equipped with heirlooms and wooden furniture from the flea market. In summer you can end the day on the small balcony overlooking the park. In winter, the high-definition television with Internet access and Netflix adds extra convenience after you took a relaxed bath in the brand new bathtub :)

name: Sunny loft room with a view
summary: I'm subletting my room in our penthouse/maisonette located at one of the hotspots of Kreuzberg.
space: Welcome to our modern and bright apartment on the 5th and 6th floor in Kreuzberg. The flat is furnished minimally but everything you'll need is there.
description: I'm subletting my room in our penthouse/maisonette located at one of the hotspots of Kreuzberg. Welcome to our modern and bright apartment on the 5th and 6th floor in Kreuzberg. The flat is furnished minimally but everything you'll need is there. You'll have a private room, a private bathroom plus you can use the kitchen/dining room and living room/roof terrace with an nice view over xberg upstairs which are shared. The flat is located near legendary food spot Markhalle 9, Wrangelkiez and Görlitzer Park. You have a lot of cafés, bars and restaurants around. The buses 165, 265 and 140 are very close, the U1 and U3 train stations Görlitzer Bahnhof and Schlesisches Tor are 10 walking minutes away. The bus station for the 165 and 265 trains are the closest. U Görlitzer Bahnhof and Schlesisches Tor are 10 min by foot. There's another private room upstairs where another guest will be accommodated.

In the area you will find lot's of nice restaurants and bars (if you need adresses, do not hesitate ^^) but also lots of green areas where it feels good to chill.

name: Library in Kreuzberg with own entry, bath& kitchen
summary: IMPORTANT: ***The Building is since a while under construction, which MAY cause loudness or dust.*** Hello, I rent my library room in central Kreuzberg occasionally. Everything is a bit old, but it has a very charming atmosphere. The good thing is it has its own entry, a kitchen and a small bathroom too. So you can see it as a whole flat, you wont see me or anyone else. it is located very central, just a minute to the Metro station, supermarket, nightlife and a bus station as well. No Tv&Radio
space: It is a minimal facility. Nothing is special and you have everything. So simple.

host_about:
Hi ! I am Virgil 

I am a completely driven and passionate musician (composer, singer-songwriter and producer). I am  in the process of setting up my own little label specialising in the fields of Jazz and songwriters,

So this is a relax and creative atmosphere.
There is a nice upright in the kids room.

A father of two young stormtroopers - but divorced a year ago.
I find myself in a empty flat all too often. 

I have been in Berlin for 9 years, so I know all the ins and outs, particularly in Kreuzberg, Neu-Kölln etc. And particularly in the field of live music, nice cafés, restaurants, pretty parcs and areas to visit...

I will be pleased to host you, and tip you on where to go

name: Peaceful Room. Large maisonette. Private WC.
summary: I am renting a room in my 125qm maisonette two-floor apartment, where I have been living for the past six years.  My two rooms and the larger bathroom with shower and bathtub are situated upstairs, the room I am renting is next to the common area downstairs. The apartment is equipped with everything needed to have a comfortable stay. Since it is my home, I would consider you my guests with mutual respect. If you are looking for a hotel-like experience, maybe this is not the right place for you.
space: The room is bright and quiet, with an own access to the larger balcony and a private small bathroom on the same floor.  Fresh duvets and towels are provided. The room has no private stuff of mine therefore you can use it as your own. For the common areas you can use the kitchen equipment but I would appreciate, if you could be discrete and not open any of the closed closets in other parts of the apartment, since they contain my own private stuff. I will try to be as helpful as possible to provide you with Berlin-related tips and make your stay comfortable and easy-going. Just ask :)

name: Zimmer im Schillerkiez Neukölln
summary: Ich vermiete mein Schlafzimmer in einer komplett sanierten Wohnung. Das Badezimmer mit Dusche kann natürlich mitbenutzt werden. Ebenso kann in der Küche Kaffee oder Tee zubereitet werden. Die Wohnung liegt im 1.OG mit Blick in den Innenhof. Das Tempelhofer Feld ist nur zwei Straßen entfernt und leicht zu erreichen.  • Bett: 160 cm x 200 cm, Federkernmatratze • WLAN (WiFi)  • Küche und Essbereich • Handtücher,Hausschuhe und Bettzeug
description: Ich vermiete mein Schlafzimmer in einer komplett sanierten Wohnung. Das Badezimmer mit Dusche kann natürlich mitbenutzt werden. Ebenso kann in der Küche Kaffee oder Tee zubereitet werden. Die Wohnung liegt im 1.OG mit Blick in den Innenhof. Das Tempelhofer Feld ist nur zwei Straßen entfernt und leicht zu erreichen.  • Bett: 160 cm x 200 cm, Federkernmatratze • WLAN (WiFi)  • Küche und Essbereich • Handtücher,Hausschuhe und Bettzeug Das großartige und weit über Berlin's Grenzen hinaus bekannte Tempelhofer Feld ist nur zwei Straßen entfernt und direkt zu erreichen. Die Schillerpromenade und ihre Seitenstraßen laden zum Schlendern und verweilen ein. Der Schillerkiez und der Herrfurthplatz ist für viele gute Bars und Restaurants bekannt. Einige Supermärkte (Edeka, LIDL, ALDI, BioCompany) sind fußläufig erreichbar. Ubahn Linie U8 (Ubhf Boddinstraße oder Ubhf Leinestraße) sind beide in ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen. Busse fahren dort ebenfalls.
host_about:
As a born Berliner I still live, study and work in Berlin. Like so many others I love to travel around, explore new things and meet new people. My favorite hobby is to take pictures with one of my old analog cameras. Yes, I shoot film. What I really love too is to eat in damn good restaurants and drink some special mineral and dry white wines.

I would love to meet you too!

name: Bright room with own balcony in Neukölln
summary: If you want to discover the urban and exiting neighbourhood of Neukölln – this flat is the place to stay! You are living with me (Fabienne) or my flat mate David and we love to help you to find the best spots for eating, drinking or going out! Our flat is very sunny, bright and has two balconies. We are sharing a kitchen and a toilette.
space: Your room is newly renovated, with a comfortable boxspring bed, a big wardrobe and a table + chairs. You have access to your own balcony – with sun during the hole day. It's perfect to enjoy a nice glass of wine or a book and to rest a little bit after exploring the city.
description: If you want to discover the urban and exiting neighbourhood of Neukölln – this flat is the place to stay! You are living with me (Fabienne) or my flat mate David and we love to help you to find the best spots for eating, drinking or going out! Our flat is very sunny, bright and has two balconies. We are sharing a kitchen and a toilette. Your room is newly renovated, with a comfortable boxspring bed, a big wardrobe and a table + chairs. You have access to your own balcony – with sun during the hole day. It's perfect to enjoy a nice glass of wine or a book and to rest a little bit after exploring the city. The flat is perfectly located between Hermannstraße and Karl-Marx Allee with access to U-Bahn U7 and U8 (ca. 3-5 min. of walking). There is a nice bar inside the next building and many restaurants, supermarkets, Spätis & Co. just around the corner. We are very happy to help to discover the area and to get the best out of your stay.
host_about: My name is Fabienne and I am living in a nice apartment in Neukölln, Berlin.

name: Fabulous space in Kreuzberg
summary: +++ Fabulous space in Kreuzberg +++
space: Hey there, I'm offering a room in a super exciting and central area of Berlin. The room is located in fabulous Kreuzberg, which has amazing cafes with great food (many vegan options) and fabulous coffee as well as vintage shops and a flea market, all within easy walking distance.  The nearest cafe, which is my favorite, is literally next door. The nearest bar is conveniently situated across the road (opposite the cafe!).  There is so much amazing food close by, you will be spoilt for choice. Also nearby are all the conveniences you need  such as supermarkets, pharmacies, drug stores and restaurants etc.   Also within walking distance is the amazing old "Tempelhof Airport" which is maybe a 10min walk, 15 if you amble along. This is a fabulous open space that used to be an airfield and is now a community space used by Berliners and visitors alike to walk, cycle, or skate in.  It‘s a huge green oasis in the middle of bustling Berlin.  The apartment itself is locate on the first floor of a

name: "Berlin-style", sunlit apartment for 4 in Neukölln
summary: This amazing, spacious apartment in the area of Neukölln, speaks for itself through its amazing decoration and the strategic spot that it occupies in the heat of the one of the coolest and most central reborn areas of Berlin.  Located next to the well known Hermannplatz, one can enjoy local Sunday markets with essences from all over the world, hidden bars and bands of all kinds and for all tastes in places one would never imagine, this area is... BERLIN! R U ready to become a trueBerliner?
space: This apartment is designed to host people who love good life, tasteful things and are citizens of the world. It is our pleasure to offer it to travellers and become a part of their stories and experiences!

name: Bright Kreuzberg Rooftop Room
summary: Stay in a beautiful, bright room with a huge king size bed in a rooftop apartment and enjoy the view across the rooftops of Berlin’s vibrant districts Kreuzberg and Neukölln.  Berlin is a multicultural, colourful, tolerant and fun-loving city. As the city itself we believe in a free and tolerant environment. We believe in togetherness, kindness and we hope that during your stay you will be relaxed, comfortable and happy and most importantly that you feel at home.
space: My comfortable room invites you with a huge king-size (2x1,80m) bed. It is located on the 5th floor quite centrally in Berlin. All major sightseeing and nightlife spots are easily reachable.  Located in the famous Graefekiez in Kreuzberg, numerous quality food options and central location to all major sightseeing and nightlife spots of the city. The room itself is equipped with a big window in the roof, which lets the famous German sun in, alighting the place in warmest colours. Please pay attention to close the window when you leave te room as it has no rain sensor.

name: Home away from Home
summary: Comfy one bedroom apartment with massive balcony in the heart of X-berg. Close to some of the most iconic spots in Berlin and perfect if you wanna experience the real Berlin. Only 2 min walk to the subway stations Moritzplatz, Prinzenstr and Kottbusser Tor. 10 min walk to the Spree or Oranienstr with plenty restaurants, bars & cafes. 15 min subway ride to Eastside Gallery. You'll be in a lively, multicultural area with everything at your fingertips. People from all backgrounds are welcome!

name: Gemütliche Wohnung mit Balkon im Galerienviertel
summary: Vermiete unsere sonnige  Wohnung in Berlin - Mitte.  Im ehemaligen ältesten Bezirk machen heute Galerien, kleine Shops und Cafés , sowie tolle Restaurants den Spirit aus. Unser Apartment  besteht  aus einem Schlafzimmer mit einem Doppelbett, einem  Balkonzimmer mit Küche und  einem Bad. Es gibt noch ein kleines Zimmer, in dem wir  einen Teil  unserer Sachen aufbewahren. Unweit vom Monbijoupark und der Sophienkirche, befindet sie sich in einer ruhigen Strasse. Zur Museumsinsel sind es nur  5 min.
space: Die Wohnung ist sehr individuell in einem Mix aus Altem und Neuem eingerichtet.  Alle Dinge sind mit Liebe ausgesucht und haben ihre eigene kleine Geschichte.

name: Great room in the heart of Kreuzberg
summary: Great, large room in the trendy and vibrant Kreuzberg Bergmannkiez! It couldn't be better! Our apartment is located just 200 meters to the famous Bergmannstraße. We are a nice couple and still have a 30 sqm large guest room, which we would like to rent to interesting and nice people from all over the world... The room has an extraordinary flair with high ceiling, stucco, huge windows and wooden floor. Kreuzberg can't be more stylish!
space: Unser Gästezimmer ist groß und außergewöhnlich charmant. Wir haben es bewusst nicht überladen eingerichtet, um die Wirkung des großen Raumes nicht zu zerstören. Drei große Berliner Altbaufenster lassen viel Licht herein und die Bäume auf der Straße sind ein bisschen Natur mitten in Kreuzberg... Das Bett misst 2 m mal 1,40m. Zusätzlich gibt es eine 1,40m Matratze die ausgelegt werden kann.
description: Great, large room in the trendy and vibrant Kreuzberg Bergmannkiez! It couldn't be better! Our apartment is located just 200 meters to the famous Bergmannstraße. We are a nice couple and still have a 30 sqm large guest room, which we would like to rent to interesting and nice people from all over the world... The room has an extraordinary flair with high ceiling, stucco, huge windows and wooden floor. Kreuzberg can't be more stylish! It doesn't get much better than that. The underground station is exactly on the other side of the street, the bus stop right in front of the door and the taxi stand at the house. In good weather, there is also always the option of exploring Berlin by rental bike, of which there are always enough models from different suppliers on our doorstep.
host_about: Wir sind eine kleine Familien-Wg und haben ein schönes großes Gästezimmer in unsere Wohnung mitten in Kreuzberg. Die Lage ist absolut perfekt, gegenüber der U-Bahn und keine 200 Meter bis auf die Bergmannstr. Wir freuen uns auf interessante Gäste aus aller Welt, die wir gerne und persönlich bei uns willkommen heißen möchten :)

name: Zentrales Zimmer an der Heinrich-Heine-Straße
summary: Ruhiges und freundliches Zimmer an der Heinrich-Heine-Straße im Herzen Berlins. Die U-Bahnhöfe Moritzplatz und Heinrich-Heine-Straße sind gleich um die Ecke. Mit U-Bahn oder Bus ist man innerhalb von 10 Minuten an der Friedrichstraße und am Alexanderplatz.  Wir sind eine arbeitende und studierende dreier WG und freuen uns dich bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen.
space: Das Zimmer ist hell und zum Innenhof gelegen. Dieser ist nach hinten offen und ermöglicht einen tollen Blick auf Fernsehturm, Rathaus und Berliner Dom. Es hat ein 140cm breites Doppelbett, das für 2 Personen geeignet ist. Kleiderschrank und Schreibtisch können gerne genutzt werden. Der Blick auf den Fernsehturm ist auch deshalb so prominent, da die Zimmerseite zum Innehof aus einer großen verglasten Doppeltür besteht und deshalb viel Licht ins Zimmer strömt.  Wer es gerne dunkel mag, kann das Zimmer über eine elektrische Jalousie abdunkeln.
description: Ruhiges und freundliches Zimmer an der Heinrich-Heine-Straße im Herzen Berlins. Die U-Bahnhöfe Moritzplatz und Heinrich-Heine-Straße sind gleich um die Ecke. Mit U-Bahn oder Bus ist man innerhalb von 10 Minuten an der Friedrichstraße und am Alexanderplatz.  Wir sind eine arbeitende und studierende dreier WG und freuen uns dich bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen. Das Zimmer ist hell und zum Innenhof gelegen. Dieser ist nach hinten offen und ermöglicht einen tollen Blick auf Fernsehturm, Rathaus und Berliner Dom. Es hat ein 140cm breites Doppelbett, das für 2 Personen geeignet ist. Kleiderschrank und Schreibtisch können gerne genutzt werden. Der Blick auf den Fernsehturm ist auch deshalb so prominent, da die Zimmerseite zum Innehof aus einer großen verglasten Doppeltür besteht und deshalb viel Licht ins Zimmer strömt.  Wer es gerne dunkel mag, kann das Zimmer über eine elektrische Jalousie abdunkeln. Unser Wohnzimmer und die Balkone können gerne mitgenutzt werden. So kann man sich zum Entspannen

name: Sunny, Cosy, Quiet & Central Room Mitte Prenzlauer
summary: Live like a local in this sunny and spacious room in the tree tops. Located on the vibrant and leafy border of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg it's the perfect location for your Berlin getaway.
space: Located in a quiet side street just one minute walk from the vibrant Kastanienallee and its many independent bars, cafes, restaurants and shops. Sunshines into the room through the large floor to ceiling windows, which can be opened like doors. Enjoy your morning coffee on the balcony.  Enjoy your meals or work from your laptop at the dining table or at the wooden bar in the kitchen.  Sleep in the quiet room in the large cosy bed. Curtains keep out the light if you want to sleep in. The furniture is a mixture of contemporary minimalist with a splashes of colour.  The kitchen includes a fridge and dishwasher.

name: Designer-Flat In Green Kreuzberg
summary: If you are looking for a cozy and quiet apartment in the center of Berlin - 400 meters from the geographic middle point  of Germany 's  capital - this one might  be  your first choice! The style of the apartment (80 square meters) alternates between loft and cozy farm house: Open living area with steal kitchen, tasteful bathroom, large bedroom with extra space for Yoga and meditation. The flat is situated in a beautiful planted courtyard of a typical building in the booming part of Kreuzberg.
space: We purchased this flat long ago due to its location in the center while still being surrounded by greenery, peace and quiet. I personally love the garden in the courtyard where one can take a deep breath and escape from the busy streets of Germany's capital. Kreuzberg is the spot to be in Berlin. It is the booming part of the city, alternative and lively. Even though it is situated in the center it encompasses a lot of green areas as well. we as a family have put a lot of thought and effort into the design of our flat. Everything is new including the bathroom, kitchen and restored wooden floor. there is a Queen size bed (160 x 200), two pillows for each guest to sleep - a soft and a hard one - so your dreams are definitely sweet. We provide towels and bed sheets as well as all kitchen and bathroom essentials. Two bicycles are available to get you around the fashionable neighborhood. Free parking possibilities are at the doorstep.  We are looking for responsible and mindful tenants.

host_about: I studied German and History and worked nearly 20 years as a journalist. The best decision of my life was an overland journey to India in our self developed truck. Today I m an  book author and a Yoga teacher with a passion for traveling. Favorite country: India. I love dogs and elephants and like to dance for life to trance music. Actually, I would have liked to become a hippie, and once in a while my family and I are able to live a hippie-life. Our daughter has grown up both in India as well as in Germany. My life motto is: „ ... to built a life I don’t need a vacation from.“

name: Berlin gemütliches Zimmer mit Balkon
summary: Schönes Zimmer mit Balkon in ruhiger Wohnung im pulsierenden Zentrum Berlins.
space: Dein Zimmer ist das kleinere (18qm) von zwei Zimmern unserer 75qm Wohung, in dem anderen wohnen wir, mein Freund Jan und ich. Dein Zimmer hat einen direkten Zugang zu einem kleinen Balkon, wo Du im Sommer schön in der Sonne frühstücken kannst. Im Zimmer gibt es ein 140cm-Bett.
description: Schönes Zimmer mit Balkon in ruhiger Wohnung im pulsierenden Zentrum Berlins. Dein Zimmer ist das kleinere (18qm) von zwei Zimmern unserer 75qm Wohung, in dem anderen wohnen wir, mein Freund Jan und ich. Dein Zimmer hat einen direkten Zugang zu einem kleinen Balkon, wo Du im Sommer schön in der Sonne frühstücken kannst. Im Zimmer gibt es ein 140cm-Bett. Neben Deinem Zimmer und dem angrenzenden Balkon hast Du Zugang zu der mit uns gemeinsam genutzten Küche und Bad. Wir freuen uns über Gäste und geben gerne Tipps zur Nachbarschaft und Stadt. Es gibt nicht viel, was es in der Nachbarschaft nicht gibt. An der Grenze von Kreuzberg und Neukölln bist Du mitten drin in Berlins spannenden Leben: kaum aus der Haustür laden unzählige ausgefallene Cafés,  szenige Vintage-Läden und Restaurants aus aller Herren Länder zu kleinen und großen Entdeckungstouren ein. Die Anbindung ist sehr gut: 4 Minuten bis zur U-Bahn Haltestelle "Hermannplatz" (U7 und U8) und zu diversen Bussen.

name: HIPSTER HEAVEN - bright, quite, clean, Kreuzberg
summary: Willkommen in meinem kleinen Zuhause, einer liebevoll eingerichteten sowie hellen Einzimmerwohnung, ideal gelegen zwischen Kreuzberg und Neukölln. Mit optimaler Anbindung über den U-Bahn-Knotenpunkt Hermannplatz (U7 und U8) sodass ihr eure Berlinerkundungen gleich starten könnt. Ob mit festem Ziel oder einfach treiben lassen durch Wochenmärkte, Kneipenstraßen, vorbei an tollen Restaurants oder zum nächsten Späti.
space: Ich habe sehr lange nach einer Wohnung mit bester Verkehrsanbindung und abendlicher Ruhe gesucht und bin nun fündig geworden. Morgens schaut man auf sonnige Baumwipfel und nach Feierabend strahlt die Abendsonne gegen 18 Uhr durch die drei Fenster. Man kann sagen, dass ich Neukölln einfach liebe. Hier ist mein Coworking Space, es tummeln sich Kreative in stylischen Cafes und abends öffnen sich die Bars. Schaut doch einfach in meinen kleinen Reiseführer für Anregungen und Ideen.

name: Lovely flat in Berlin Mitte with balcony!
summary: Lovely flat in Berlin Mitte! Close to Alexanderplatz and many other Places!  Ich wünsche euch herzlich Willkommen in meiner geliebten lichtdurchfluteten Altbauwohnung direkt im Herzen von Berlin! Von hier aus erreicht in wenigen Minuten alles was man braucht!
space: Meine 4-Zimmer Wohnung hat definitiv einen ganz besonderen Charme. In jeder Ecke lassen sich kleine Details finden.  Es gibt einen Wohnraum mit Küche, Esstisch und allem was ihr in einer Küche so braucht. Außerdem steht hier eine Schlafcouch, die ausgeklappt werden kann und ein Fernseher mit Anschlussmöglichkeit an einen Laptop. Von der Wohnküche aus geht ein schmaler Balkon zur Vorderseite ab. Außerdem gibt es ein Gästezimmer mit einem Bett groß genung für zwei Personen (140x200), eine leere Kleiderstange und eine leere Kommode.  Dann gibt es noch mein Zimmer und das Schlafzimmer meines Freundes, welche wir nicht vermieten ;) Hier geht auch der schöne Südbalkon nach hinten ab. Auf dem habt ihr fast den ganzen Tag Sonne, die ihr genießen könnt. Auch hier gibt es nochmals Tisch und Stühle mit Platz für maximal 4 Personen.  Fenster und Türen sind zudem alle sehr gut schallisoliert, sodass ihr bei Bedarf den Großstadtlärm einfach auschließen könnt! Wenn ihr mal richtig entspannen wollt, d

name: Lovely bright room in Kreuzberg, high ceiling
summary: The princess room offers a two persons matress, a shelf you can use, high ceiling, large windows, a table to work on, a lot of space to move and live and a stereo for good music :)  You are welcome to use our kitchen and bathroom with bathtub and washing machine. The flat is located in the heart of Berlin with perfect connection to public transport. My sister and me are happy to welcome you in our home and get to know you! Don't hesitate to ask any question about the place
space: Our flat has very high ceiling and many large windows to North and west, is on the third floor of an old building of Berlin with a beautiful spiral staircases, therefore it is light-flooded the wohle day until sunset. There are two big rooms, a spacious foyer with a small storeroom, a kitchen with counter, electronic stove and oven, dishwasher, refrigerator and freezer. You will find everything you need for cooking: pots, crockery, cutlery, as well as a toaster, coffee grinder and espresso machine, milk frother and kettle. You are welcome to use our large wooden table to dine, have a coffee and tea, to read/ paint/play/work with view to the canal and above the typical Berlin subway on Möckerbrücke. We furnished our home with love, but minimalist, so there is plenty of free space inviting you to make yourself comfortable or move, for example, practicing yoga on our big carpet or using my barre to exercise...

name: Berlin Neukölln
summary: Nice sunny flat with balcony. The apartment is located in the trendy and multicultural district - Neukölln. My 2 room flat is really basic but a good start point to explore the city. Good connection to all sightseeing. There are some big supermarkets around the corner and the metro is just 5 min walkway, so you have everything around what you need. You can have tasty food bars, cafes, small shops and beautiful parks around.
space: This apartment is an old style Berlin house build in 1913 and being renovated in 1993. There is a high ceiling 3,2 Meters so the place look big. The house has nice decor.  There is a bed in the room - 2 persons can easily sleep on it. Bathroom is equipped with shower cabin. Compact kitchen has everything you will need: small dishwasher, fridge, kitchen stove, coffee machine, and so on.

name: Neukölln Studio Apartment with Balcony
summary: Our functional and modern studio apartment is located in the heart of Berlin's hippest neighbourhood, Neukölln. Surrounded by cafés, restaurants and shops, and only a block away from the canal, this is the perfect location for a visit to Berlin. There's a supermarket on the same block, and the metro station Rathaus Neukölln is no more than 500m away. The apartment is filled with natural light as it's on the top floor and has as a charming balcony to enjoy an occasional breakfast outside.

space: Cozy and full of light, the apartment has all the furniture in great conditions (common areas have 2-3 years and the room just 1 month) The room has 1 double bed (really comfortable double sleeping bed) and place for storage. description: A cozy and warm flat with wooden floors and flooded with natural light and sun it will be your perfect home away from home.  Large double room in a big 2 bedroom apartment with use of kitchen, study & living area. Situated right in the heart of the trendy, bohemian neighbourhood of Kreuzberg you have everything on your doorstep - Public transport both trains and buses within 3 mins walking, multiple supermarkets, endless bars, cafes, restaurants of all cuisines, night clubs, parks and the canal. Sprawling Kreuzberg is home to students, artists and a large Turkish population, with many restaurants around Kottbusser Tor. The quirky Bergmannkiez area is known for thrift shops, laid-back cafes and the landscaped Viktoriapark. The gritty area near Görlitzer Park offers street art, casual bars and food stalls at Markthalle Neun. Shaded pathways along the Landwehr Canal attract walkers, cyclists and loungers. Right on our street Oranienstraße you can go to a roller disco party at one of David
host_about: I am an Australian living in Berlin. I have lived all over the world for the last 9 years. I am a performing artist and a cafe owner. I love to travel whenever possible to experience exciting new places and meet interesting new people.
