name: Bedroom in Large Stylish Schoeneberg Apartment
summary: Small bedroom available in a large stylish apartment up to one week.
description: Small bedroom available in a large stylish apartment up to one week. Centrally located in warm friendly Schoeneberg a popular neighborhood of small shops s affordable eateries and a cafe on every corner, between Nollendorfplatz and the Eisenacherstrasse train station. Jones has the best ice cream, the Visit great coffee (between 8-10 am half-price), Mamsel excellent chocolate, Mr Hu, fabulous cocktails and Berlin Burrito, Ymm - all this within a few minutes of the front door. Overnight street parking is available  and I am between Eisenacherstrasse and Nollendorfplatz on Goltzstrasse, also walking distance to the buses on Potsdamerst.

name: Large room in modern apartment, heart of Kreuzberg
summary: Located in the heart of vibrant Kreuzberg, the apartment is bright, modern, spacious and newly renovated to a high level. It comprises a large kitchen and living room, 2 bedrooms and a modern bathroom. The apartment lies right between the trendy 'Kreuzkölln' area and the leafy 'Graefekiez' neighbourhood, and is surrounded by cool cafes, restaurants and bars, with multiple supermarkets and grocery stores on the doorstep. PLEASE NOTE: this is a shared apartment, and the other room is occupied.
space: The apartment is on the 4th floor of a quiet residential building (there is no lift). The street below (Kottbusser Damm) is busy and bustling with cafes and grocery shops, but the apartment itself is quiet, with the bedrooms backing on to a peaceful courtyard.

host_about:
Originally from London, I settled in Berlin three years ago and love this city. I work freelance in the music industry, travelling often and spending a lot of time back in London. 

I've been living in this apartment for nearly a year and it's gradually becoming my dream home. I love to cook and host dinner parties, explore Berlin's incredible nightlife and ever-growing foodie scene.

name: Schöne ruhige Unterkunft im Herzen von Berlin
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich in sehr zentraler Lage. In der Nähe gibt es mehrere Restaurants, Cafés und Supermärkte. Wenn du gerne Sport machst oder spazieren gehen möchtest gibt es den Glasdreieck Park gegenüber. Der Potsdamer Platz, Bergmann Kiez und Checkpoint Charlie befinden sich in der Nähe. Durch die gute Anbindung der U-Bahn kommst du überall gut hin. 02/Z/AZ/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Die Wohnung besteht aus zwei Zimmern. Das zweite Zimmer ist mein privater Bereich und wird nicht zugänglich sein. Küche und Bad wird gemeinsam genutzt.

name: In the ❤ of Berlin - Mitte at Check Point Charlie
summary: This beautiful bedroom is located in the new building in the center of Berlin. Check Point Charlie is just around the corner and most of the famous landmarks (Brandenburg gate, TV tower, Reichstag building, Potsdamer square, Museum Island...) are in 20 minutes walk. A bus that in only 20 minutes brings you to the center of the West Berlin, Ku'damm, stops in front of the building.  This is for sure one of the best places you can pick for exploring Berlin and still getting a good nights sleep.
space: My apartment is perfectly located for exploring Berlin. Most of landmarks are easily reachable on foot. Apartment has 53m2. The room that you will be staying in is a private bedroom with a really nice bed. During your stay I will be staying in the living room. Most of the time I'm out, I only come home to sleep.

name: Berlin ArtLoft
summary: Live the Berlin Art Dream! Stylish and calm bedroom in a Historical 1879 building in the Center of Berlin Mitte with view of the Berlin TV Tower close to Alexanderplatz. This large and bright apartment offers a permanent art gallery and you can visit an authentic berlin artist studio one floor above.  Located in one of Berlins most classy and hip neighbourhood, featuring a gorgeous park, restaurants, cafes, shops, clubs, museums, and super close to all major transport hubs.
space: THE 84 sqm SPACE  is a 2 room appartment ( 1 private bedroom, 1 living room ) and  has an accent on art and design, a big kitchen, bathroom and common space. There is a gorgeous view of the TV Tower downtown on one side, and a quaint street extending uphill to the other. The apartment is on the 4th Floor.  The living room has a room-sized curtain which then separates my room at night. You do not have to go through my sleeping space to access your closed bedroom. YOUR ROOM - 24 sqm - Desk  - 4 Drawers and a Wardrobe Hanger for closet space - Should you need anything particular to customize your wish, simply write me or we figure it out on arrival. - Fresh Linens and Towels, Soap and Shampoo provided. Feel free to use the Kitchen, make yourself a coffee, tea or food.

name: Small but cosy room in the heart of Neukölln
summary: You sleep in a small but cosy room in my student flat, perfect for a weekend (or more) in Berlin. Located in the heart of Neukölln, 1 min walk to the tube (Rathaus Neukölln) or bus station, 30sec walk to a supermarket, cafés and bar around the corner, 500m to (in-)famous Sonnenallee. I help you where i can and consider myself a caring host. Please be aware that its a student flat and not a renovated fancy loft. You have a TV, on which you can put on your laptop over HDMI, no television.
space: Smoking at the window is allowed, be aware that i do too. Every room exept mine, can also be smoking free of course. If theres any other request, just ask. Sometimes i sit a dog of a friend. If you have issues with that please let me know in advance.

summary: Schöne Einzimmerwohnung im lebendigen Bezirk Berlin-Kreuzberg Beautiful One-Room Apartment in vivid Berlin-Kreuzberg
space: Etwas versteckt in einem kleinem Hinterhaus bietet die Wohnung für maximal zwei Personen einen gemütlichen Ruheort mitten in der Stadt! Willst du aber lieber den Trubel Berlins erleben, sind belebte Straßen wie der Mehringdamm, Bergmannkiez oder die Gneisenstraße mit vielen Restaurants und Bars nicht weit entfernt. Auch für diejenigen, die gerne im Grünen sind, ist der Park am Gleisdreieck gleich um die Ecke, vom Viktoriapark und seinem tollen Wasserfall trennt dich nur ein Fußweg von etwa 10 Minuten.  Mit den U-Bahnlinien U7, U1 und U6 sowie den Buslinien M19 und M29 bist du zudem perfekt angebunden. //english version// Tucked away in a small back house, the flat offers a cozy retreat in the middle of the city for a maximum of two people!   But if you prefer to experience the hustle and bustle of Berlin, busy streets like the Mehringdamm, Bergmannkiez or Gneisenaustraße with lots of restaurants and bars are not far away. summary: Enjoy Berlin like a local! Beautiful and spacious Berlin-style flat in one of the most hip street of the famous Berlin borough: Weserstrasse, Neukölln. Close to supermarket, small cozy cafes, typical Neukölln middle east restaurant and endless Berlin style bars; you will find any comfort to enjoy your stay. Very close is also the canal which reveal the beauty of this city with its small bridges.
space: Big spacious room with double bed (which can be also be use as single one) Bathroom is big enough with comfy bath. name: Spacious room in the heart of Berlin
summary: Renovated flat in Mitte. Close to U8-U1 (10 minutes walk to Heinrich- Heine- Strasse/ 10 minutes Kottbusser Tor). space: Vegan flat. No dairy and no meat allowed inside You can use the kitchen as much as you want, just wash your dishes, thank you :)

name: Cozy room in the heart of Kreuzkölln
summary: The room is located in the heart of the city between the two most vibrant districts in the city Kreuzberg and Neukölln The room is small and cozy with modern minimalistic decoration and lots of storage. Perfect for a single person or a couple.  The room is individually heated and has a black-out roller blind for those who like to sleep until late.
space: The apartment is on a 4th floor in a modern building with elevator, rare in Berlin! It has a modern fully equiped kitchen with microwave, kettle and dishwasher. There's also a big living room with three sofas to chill and a great balcony with views to a park.

host_about: I was born in Barcelona in 1991 and since I was a child I wanted to become an architect. When I turned 18 I started my bachelor which completely change my vision of the architecture and I began to travel abroad. Then I understood that I must have an international exchange to combine my passions: architecture, learning and traveling. My exchange in Paris and in Brasil opened my mind so I knew I had to travel and learn even more.

name: Berlin Neukölln. Central Studio in historic house
summary: You are welcome to stay in our newly renovated apartment as part of a historic Berliner building with lots of original details as doors and high ceilings. You are sleeping on a luxurious organic latex matress and we believe your karma will appreciate it!  Originaly I was planning to open my photo studio in these nice spaces of a former local shop. But as other projects are waiting for me, you will have first the pleasure to stay here in a unique place..
space: Oak parquet and high ceilings! You will have the comfort of a brand new bathroom with floor even shower and floor heating. The kitchen and master bedroom furniture is handcrafted by a friend of mine, a local designer and carpenter.  The studio apartment is located in a sideroad in our up and coming neighbourhood with many nice bars, coffee houses and young restaurants around.  When building it up we were focusing to preserve the old substance of the apartment while paying attention to all needs of the modern traveller.

name: A Bright and Central Home in Berlin-Mitte
summary: We (an English-Dutch couple with 2 young kids) offer a clean and comfortable private room in a very bright 4th-floor apartment situated in a characteristic ''Altbau'' building at the Spree river. Even though we're located smack in the center of Berlin on the border between Mitte and Kreuzberg (1 stop from Alexander Platz, a 1-minute walk from a couple of Berlin's most famous Clubs), our cul-de-sac street is pretty quiet so suitable for partygoers, professionals and families alike.
space: • Quiet room, window facing the backyard  • Situated at the entrance to the apartment • Berlin guides available • Clean Towels and bed linen

name: Lovely little apt (with ac) near Alexanderplatz
summary: Please, read the description attentively! 99% of your questions are answered in the text. For 1% left, I´m at your disposal :) A little 1 room flat (46 m2) in the center of East Berlin with the level of comfort 4*. Advantages: location near Alexanderplatz + high level of comfort + airconditioning + easy to get to everything + absolutely amazing neighbourhood + unique design   Disadvantages: windows face pretty loud street with not the best view - only 1 room, which is both living and bedroom
space: § (1) ABOUT THE FLAT (1) Berlin has a fame of "cool city", "city of freedom", "exceptional city, which deserves undivided attention". It´s not that sophisticated as Paris and not so posh as London, but the city also has its "golden miles". And as the flat is located in the heart of the most prestigious and magnificent district of East Berlin, where the best hotels accept politicians and Hollywood stars and restaurants are full of delicate dishes, I decided to create a flat, which would correspond to the high level of surrounding.   This flat would be ideal for those travellers, who are looking for the comfortable stay! Business travellers, romantic couples, families with kids are welcome here!   It´s a place for those of you who is ready to pay for:  + best location in the heart of East Berlin near Alexanderplatz and historical center + high quality satin bedlinen, which are ironed manually  + cleanliness  + unique design & unrepeatable ambiente    + well equipped kitchen + airconditio

space: Gemütlicher Berliner Altbau-Charme
description: Die 40m² helle altbau Wohnung mit Holzdielenboden und wunderschönem Stuck besteht aus einem großen Wohn-und Schlafzimmer, einem Flur der zur geräumigen Küche führt und einem Badezimmer mit Dusche sowie einem getrennten WC.  In Fußnähe gibt es zahlreiche Bars, Restaurants und Clubs. Auch der Görlitzer Park sowie das Heckmannufer sind in 5 Minuten zu erreichen. Sehr gute Anbindung durch U1 und zahlreiche Buslinien in Fußnähe Gemütlicher Berliner Altbau-Charme Ihr habt Zugang zu allen Räumen, W-Lan und alle elektronischen Geräte (Kühlschrank, Toaster, Wasserkocher, Mixer) Versuche so oft wie möglich den Check In&Out persönlich zu machen. Bei Fragen gerne anrufen, sms schreiben oder über die App:) Das Wrangelkiez ist ein belebter Kiez in Berlin. Es gibt ruhige Ecken (wie bei mir) aber auch jede Menge Bars, Restaurants und Boutiquen. Es gibt Parkmöglichkeiten direkt vor der Tür, allerdings kann die Parkplatzsuche zu gewissen Uhrzeiten etwas länger dauern.  Die U1 liegt  7 Minuten Fußweg ent

name: Pvt room, king-size bed, super central West Berlin
summary: Hi guys, There's a lovely, spare room at my place and I'm happy to have guests and future friends stay over. It's a private, quiet room with superking-size bed and with adjoining terrace right in the middle of über-exciting Berlin. Check out the photos, and picture yourself on the comfy bed after your share of Berlin fun! :-)
description: Hi guys, There's a lovely, spare room at my place and I'm happy to have guests and future friends stay over. It's a private, quiet room with superking-size bed and with adjoining terrace right in the middle of über-exciting Berlin. Check out the photos, and picture yourself on the comfy bed after your share of Berlin fun! :-) The location is right in the middle of Berlin's gaybourhood, next to Nollendorf Platz. There's a myriad of shops and bars within 2 block radius. Wittenberg Platz, KaDeWe- centre of West Berlin for shopping! - also 2 block away There is direct transport connection to Berlin's beautiful sights: Zoo Tiergarten park Siegessäule (emblematic Victory Column) Potsdamer Platz, Branderburg Gate, Bundestag  Stadt Mitte (history and more shopping) Alexanderplatz Lots of restaurants - walking. Enjoy your unique and fun Berlin experience, and be my guest! Nearby Ubahn lines U1, U2, U3, U4, and buses M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) will connect you with the whole city.
host_about: International and well traveled guy.  IT industry.  Follow blogs, IT stuff, music, pop culture.

space: Feel at home in this neat, cozy and bright room. The 26m² room has got everything you need at your disposal: a sleeping couch, a desk, a chair, a lot of light, a cupboard, a clothes rail. Not too over-ornated, the room offers a lot of free space for you to make yourself feel at home.

name: Convenient, cosy apartment in Kreuzkölln
summary: Welcome to our conveniently located, cosy flat in Berlin's trendiest neighbourhood, Kreuzkölln. The two-bedroom apartment is on the first floor, a 4-minute walk to the nearest train station, and you can see the Landwehrkanal from the balcony. Tuesdays, Fridays, and Saturdays host the Neukölln market around the corner, where you'll also find several coffee shops and restaurants.

name: Schöne Zimmer mit eigene Bad
summary: Im Südwesten von der Hasenheide kommend verläuft sie nordöstlich bis zum Landwehrkanal.Dabei kreuzt sie die Urbanstraße, Dieffenbachstraße und die (Website hidden by Airbnb) Landwehrkanal mündet sie direkt in das Maybachufer. Außergewöhnliche Gaumenfreuden bieten die afrikanischen, portugiesischen, deutschen und arabischen Imbissstände. Gegenüber dem Maybachufer liegt das Paul-Lincke-Ufer, das mit zahlreichen Cafés und Restaurants lockt. Der U- Bahnhof Schönleinstraße ist nur wenige Hundert Meter entfernt.

name: Sun-drenched elegant room in heart of Neukölln.
summary: A large sun-drenched room with beautiful window area to relax, read or do your daily Yoga routine!  In the classic Alt-Bau style, this gorgeous space (25sqm) will allow you to simply enjoy and get the most out of your time in Berlin.  It is centrally located in Reuterkiez & only minutes  from Hermannplatz Ubahn.  The room comfortably fits two and there is a desk/working space.  It's a cosy apartment and the shared kitchen is wonderfully equipped for anything you'd want to make during your stay.
space: A private room in a shared, very friendly and cosy apartment.  Our place is very comfortable and accommodating to your needs.  The private room includes a desk, work-space, ample books to read (mostly english), WIFI, washing machine, dishwasher.  The bathroom has a great bath.  We invite you to share our coffee, tea, milk, fruit and bread and all the basics in the kitchen.   Living in the apartment is 2 lovely people.  We are both international artists who have been living in Berlin for over 8 years.  We are queer-identified and are welcoming of everybody in our home.  We love to chat and engage with our guests, and often we might invite you to share dinner with us.

host_about:
Hello,

I am a queer film-maker and arts producer originally from Australia who has lived in Berlin, Germany for over 7 years.  I love to cook, watch films, & ride my bike through the city.  I enjoy the changing and vibrant music and art-scenes in Berlin & am always happy to exchange stories and tips on travelling!  
I am a very relaxed host - I will always try to accomodate and help where I can, so if you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask!

I share the house together with Ivan, a queer dancer and performer from Sweden. 

Our house is open and welcoming to all genders, nationalities and sexualities.

name: Stylish apartment in the coolest part of Neukölln
summary: Welcome to the wonderful capital city Berlin. This is a modern and stylishly furnished apartment. The flat offers a city retreat and a comfortable, space to relax while exploring Berlin. In the flat, you’ll have a bright living area, a comfortable double bed, a fully equipped kitchen. Close to bars, cafes, restaurants and Tempelhofer Feld. The apartment is only a few minutes walk from the underground station „Boddinstrasse“ and many buses.
space: The book shelf full of plants and books gives a homely feel to the apartment.  With washing machine, dish washer and ironing equipment you'll have everything you need.  In the kitchen you'll find a kettle and french press with coffee available.  We have a guide in the apartment of our favourite spots in Berlin and around the flat.

name: Charming Room with excellent views by river Spree
summary: Quite private room with private bath and a private balcony in the centre of Berlin. Enjoy the splendid view of  the iconic Berlin TV tower and the river Spree from the north east facing balcony, or through the expansive floor to ceiling windows in winter.  Looking forward to welcoming you!
space: The apartment is centrally located in Berlin, right by the waterfront, close to Jannowitzbrucke. It is less than a five-minute walk to the nearest station and only one stop from the transportation hub, AlexanderPlatz.  The room you will be living is decorated with love and with amenities to make sure you have the most enjoyable and comfortable stay in Berlin. Three big windows give the room ample natural light, thick black out curtains and rolling shutters make sleeping very comfortable. Enjoy your own private room with private-use bathroom. Simple use of kitchen is ok. This is a vegetarian cooking kitchen so please, no cooking meat in the apartment. SMOKING : Please note that smoking is not allowed anywhere inside the apartment. There are many cafe's, bars and shops in the neighbourhood.

name: Berlin Neukölln Home
summary: 2 room apartment in an old style house with high ceilings. It is situated on the border of two districts (Kreuzberg-Neukölln). The flat with wooden floor, has a bathroom, balcony and kitchen.  The sleeping room has a bed for 2 persons (180x200) with Sultan mattress for comfortable sleeping and window to the silent backyard.
description: 2 room apartment in an old style house with high ceilings. It is situated on the border of two districts (Kreuzberg-Neukölln). The flat with wooden floor, has a bathroom, balcony and kitchen.  The sleeping room has a bed for 2 persons (180x200) with Sultan mattress for comfortable sleeping and window to the silent backyard. Don't hesitate to ask me if you need something and i will try to help you. The flat is situated in the center of students and artists area in north of Neukölln. Canals and parks are very close. Some of Sundays there is a flea market in the district. Several supermarkets ALDI, LiDL are 5 min walk. It is very nice area with lots of bars, art-spaces, cafes.  Short walk distance there are 2 big parks Hasenheide and Tempelhof, canals, sport grounds. 2 metro lines: U8 or U7. It takes 20 min. direct to the city center with museums and historical places. It takes 45 min. to any of 2 airports with metro. I would prefer not to have loud guests having parties at home.

name: Kreuzberg | In the heart of Berlin
summary: The apartment is located in the centre of Berlin in a 100 year old building with a nice little garden in a very quiet area. I rent out one of three big rooms. The direct neighbourhood of the famous Bergmann -Quartier provides you with shopping facilities and public transportation as well as parks and canals and a variety of bars and restaurants which are within walking distance. Registrierungsnummer: 02/Z/AZ/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: The room is very quiet and spacious. It has a wooden floor and white 3,8 m high walls. The room is equipped with a double bed and shelfs and a huge desk. Bathroom and kitchen we share as well as a spacious living room.

name: Gästezimmer in Kreuzberg
summary: Gerne möchte ich ein Privatzimmer anbieten. Mein zu Hause befindet sich zwischen Moritzplatz und Oranienplatz, im Herzen von Kreuzberg. In direkter Umgebung befindet sich der Kiez um die Oranienstraße mit vielen wunderbaren Läden, Restaurants und Bars. summary: My neighbourhood is extremely special with everything you need to enjoy the city and serves as a wonderful retreat after a day out exploring. Because the apartment is on the 5th floor (no elevator) you will have a beautiful and sunny view. The room is a lovely space and perfect for the woman and my goal is to make sure you have a great experience. That starts with a good location, a comfortable room and the information needed to make the most out of your stay.
space: it's a very bright room and the area is very quiet and there are plenty of bars and restaurants nearby. The next bus stop or subway station is less than 5 min away.

While it's true that Kreuzberg's lively, café-laden Bergmanstrasse is probably mentioned in just about every Berlin guidebook, it also lies at the centre of one of the city's loveliest neighbourhoods. Largely undamaged by WWII bombing raids, the so-called Bergmannkiez retains much of its splendid late 19th century architecture, complete with elaborately stuccoed facad

Vanessa

name: Miniloft Altbaucharme in Kreuzberg
summary: Superschöne Altbauwohnung in Kreuzberg, einem der spannendsten und aufregendsten Bezirke von Berlin. Eine Wohnung mit Schlaf- und Esszimmer sowie einem Flur und Bad .
space: Fussläufig findest du viele Bars, Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten
description: Superschöne Altbauwohnung in Kreuzberg, einem der spannendsten und aufregendsten Bezirke von Berlin. Eine Wohnung mit Schlaf- und Esszimmer sowie einem Flur und Bad . Fussläufig findest du viele Bars, Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten Bei Fragen stehe ich dir jederzeit zur Verfügung. Tauch ein ins bunte Kreuzberger Leben mit viel Kultur, Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe. Die U-Bahn bringt dich an sämtliche Ziele in der Stadt. Ebenfalls in der Nähe: ein Kanal mit zehn Kilometern Ufer zum Spazierengehen und Joggen. Die folgenden U-Bahn Stationen befinden sich in der Nähe: Görlitzer Bahnhof U1, U3 (500m)  Kottbusser Tor U1, U3, U8 (700m) Parken in der Umgebung ist kostenlos.

name: Wohnung im Herzen Berlin Mitte
summary: Unterkunft in einem Berliner Mietshaus, im 4. Stockwerk, kein Aufzug, im Herzen von Berlin Mitte, angrenzend Prenzlauer Berg und Wedding.

Ihr bewohnt das Zimmer in der Wohnung allein und könnt komplett ausgestattetes Bad und Küche benutzen. Wir empfangen unsere Gäste persönlich, sind für Fragen jederzeit telefonisch und per Mail erreichbar, vermieten aber  das Zimmer nur, wenn wir selbst nicht anwesend sind. Nicht weit vom Alexanderplatz, in der Nähe der Zionskirche und auch die bekannte Ausgehmeile Kastanienallee ist um die Ecke, mit vielen Bars und Restaurants. Die Straße ist eine ruhige Wohnstraße, gegenüber befindet sich eine Bar und ein Club, in dem manchmal Veranstaltungen stattfinden. Die Parkplätze vor dem Haus sind Montag bis Samstag gebührenpflichtig, nicht weit vom Haus entfernt im Stadtbezirk Wedding kann man gebührenfreie Parkplätze finden. host_about:
Wir wohnen nicht immer in der Schmiede, meist nur am Wochenende und nutzen die Schmiede als Hobby. Wir selber leben und arbeiten in Berlin.

name: Cozy Apartment in Neukölln Schillerkiez
summary: My Apartment is located in the Heart of Neukölln Schillerkiez one of Berlins most hyped districts with lots of cafes, bars, restaurants and supermarkets and 4 minutes walk to Tempelhofer Feld. name: Checkpoint Charlie Private room & bathroom
summary: This apartment is situated in a peaceful corner of Berlin’s lively Kreuzberg district, 500 metres from the Jewish Museum. The apartment offers a balcony and a flat-screen TV. The modern room feature bright interiors and parquet flooring. There is a bedroom, a living room with a sofa bed, and bathroom with a shower. Guests can use the apartment’s fully equipped kitchen, and enjoy their meals at the dining areas in the kitchen and the living room.

name: The Piano Room, Kreuzberg. Nice creative vibe.
summary: The Piano Room is a nice spacious room, with a big window and lots of light in the morning (and curtains:) and a view on the green little park across the street. And a piano.  And other instruments. This is for one person only.  The room has its own entrance. A door to the living room will typically be kept closed. The flat is in a great location. On a quiet spot, but in the middle of Kreuzberg. 5mn from the beautiful Dieffenbach Strasse and all its restaurants, and 10mn from the Bergmann Kiez.
space: This is the bigger bedroom available in my flat. That's the flat with a nice, laid back, creative atmosphere. My apartment is in a fantastic location: in the middle of Kreuzberg, exactly in the middle of different lovely parts of Kreuzberg, each with different flairs. It is also 10mn by subway from Charlottenburg and from Mitte. Kreuz-Kölln is a 5 mn walk, Neukölln is a 10mn walk or three stations with the M41.

host_about:
Hi ! I am Virgil 

I am a completely driven and passionate musician (composer, singer-songwriter and producer). I am  in the process of setting up my own little label specialising in the fields of Jazz and songwriters,

So this is a relax and creative atmosphere.
There is a nice upright in the kids room.

A father of two young stormtroopers - but divorced a year ago.
I find myself in a empty flat all too often. 

I have been in Berlin for 9 years, so I know all the ins and outs, particularly in Kreuzberg, Neu-Kölln etc. And particularly in the field of live music, nice cafés, restaurants, pretty parcs and areas to visit...

I will be pleased to host you, and tip you on where to go

name: Very central Souterrain, 24m2, own toilet/shower
summary: Hello, I'm living in this three room flat, also having my atelier in there and you can use the back room situated to the yard if the building with an integrated bathroom for yourself. The Souterrain flat is special, people think it's dark but it's actually ok. Lots of mostly indirect light is also supporting evening hours. Bikes could even fit in the place as well. I'm really calm, I'll have to work a lot on my art, so I don't want party groups or people that don't have a natural sense for this.

name: Rent a cozy room in Kreuzberg near the Spree River

The connection to the underground, buses and trams is excellent. Just 100 m from the characteristic Turkish market. In 10 minutes foot walk you can reach the Oranienstraße (street well known for the several pubs, bars and restaurants situated in it).
space: The flat has 45m² and is fully furnished with all the necessary utensils to make your stay in Berlin enjoyable, ideal for businessmen. host_about:
I’m an architect and a socio-cultural anthropologist. Born in Italy, I migrated to Germany when I was 19, where I received my higher education. I have been researching for many years self-help building practices in Cuba, Jordan and Senegal. During this time, I have been involved in several projects in the field of self-organization and integration of marginalized ethnic minorities. 
I love to travel and to meet new and inspiring people. I will be happy to welcome you in my home.

name: Spacious 21m2 room with king bed in trendy area
summary: It is a very spacious room, with a king size bed (2m x 2m) and a 2 seater sofa. The apartment is located in the Schillerkiez, one of the trendiest areas of the Neukölln district, with a mixture of traditional establishments and new business. Very well connected, within 200 m from one of the main Metro lines, and 5 min from Train. The flat is a typical Berliner construction (Altbau), with high ceilings, big rooms and thick brick walls.
space: The building is a so called "Altbau", typical old Berliner construction, with its characteristic high ceilings (4m tall), big bedrooms, very thick brick walls and long toilets  The room is very spacious, around 20m2, with a kingsize bed (2m x 2m), a 2 seater, a coffee table and a leather sofa. Has also plenty of storage space, with a big closet, chest of drawers and clothes rack. The apartment has a kitchen, toilet with shower, another bedroom and a living room with a small terrace.

name: Sunny balcony room close to canal in Kreuzkölln
summary: Sunny days with long  bay windows, a balcony & parquet floorboards right in the heart of Kreuzkoelln.  The apartment is situated 50m from Maybacher Ufer and the vivid bustle of the Turkish market.  Kreuzberg / Kreuzkölln, the rebellious soul of old West Berlin, is just south of the centre and well-connected to public transport. The historic Landwehr canal divides the city from west to east : great for bike rides, strolling or canoe trips. Supermarkets and public transportation are very close by.
space: I am renting the smaller room in a 95 sqm two bedroom apartment in Kreuzberg.  I sometimes live in the larger room depending on whether i am touring elsewhere or not . let me know if you are interested and can send you pictures and let you know the price for the whole apartment : there is space for more guests in theory so please let me know if that is something you want and we can talk about it.

summary: The studio apartment is situated on the third floor (2nd floor EU) of a recently built elevator building. It is designed with spacious and airy feeling in all of its units. Capri is outfitted with floor-to-ceiling windows that offer beautiful views of the adjacent park.
space: The studio apartment is situated on the third floor (2nd floor EU) of a recently built elevator building. It is designed with spacious and airy feeling in all of its units. Capri is outfitted with floor-to-ceiling windows that offer beautiful views of the adjacent park. It possesses a balcony, from which you can enjoy your morning coffee, a fully equipped kitchen, a queen size bed, a LCD TV with international channels, a CD player and free WiFi. The spacious bathroom is outfitted with a hair dryer and bathtub/ shower combination. Smoking is allowed only on the balcony and a garage can be booked separately. Clean linen and towels will be provided. The building complex is located directly next to Weinbergspark and on a sidestreet of Brunnenstrasse where you find many galleries, stores, boutiques and restaurants. The tram and subway stop Rosenthaler Platz is within three minutes walking distance. Sites such as the Berlin Wall Memorial, Museums Island, Berlin Cathedral, Mauerpark and Hacke

host_about: I am a trained Jazz musician with a degree from Berklee College of Music. After 10 years in the music business I switched into real estate selling condos in Manhattan and Brooklyn. In 2006 I made my first Berlin purchase and laid the foundation for my furnished rental business.  After moving from New York to Berlin in 2009 furnished rentals in Berlin became my main focus.

name: Cozy, bright room in Schöneberg
summary: Cozy room in Schöneberg, right next to the U-Bahnhof Bülowstraße (U2). Very well connected to various public transport options (U2, U1, U7, bus to Hbf), but located in a quiet street. Supermarkets, Spätis and restaurants are on every corner and the cool Gleisdreieck Park is within walking distance - and even Potsdamer Platz is only three stops away!
space: The room comes with a sustainable cardboard bed (queensize), a desk, chair, shelf and lamp and guests can use the shared kitchen and bathroom.  Coffee, tea, oil, spices, etc. can be used as well as the washing machine, iron and hairdryer.  My roommate and I both work / study - so while we are open for the occasional glass of wine, this is no party apartment :)

name: Nice, cozy and light apartment in Berlin Kreuzberg
summary: This is a cozy one bedroom apartment situated between Kreuzberg and Neukölln. There are a multitude of little shops, vintage stores, restaurants, bars and cafés in walking distance. Parks Hasenheide and Tempelhofer Feld are 10 to 20 minutes by foot. Supermarkets autumns the corner and Ubahn stations 5 minutes away. The flat has a fully equipped kitchen and a spacious bathroom. (The second room in the flat will be closed as it is used as a storage room.)
space: The flat offers a spacious bathroom with a shower. There's also a raging machine. The kitchen is small but made for cooking and well equipped. The bedroom is light and sunny with wooden floor boards.

name: Nice, cosy room in the city center.
summary: The apartment is directly in Berlin Mitte in a quiet side street. The nightlife starts already 800 meters away on foot at Rosenthaler Platz. Most sights such as Alexanderplatz or Museum Island are within a radius of 2 km.   The equipment is altogether quite old but very cosy. Please be aware of the regular check in time from 2pm to 6pm. Although you may even ask me for a check in at 10am or 11pm I can't assure you a check in between 6pm and 10pm if we did not talked about it in advance.

name: Im Herzen Kreuzbergs zwischen Berlin Wall & Spree
summary: If you want to safe service fees, contact me on What'sApp (look at the pictures) Schönes Zimmer in einer Altbauwohnung im Wrangelkiez mit gemütlichem Doppelbett (160x200) für maximal zwei Personen. Ich selbst wohne in der Wohnung, putze täglich und bin für Fragen zugänglich. Beide abgebildeten Zimmer (mit grauem oder weißem Boden) werden vermietet, eines der beiden erhältst du. Die U-Bahn „Schlesisches Tor“ ist nur fünf Gehminuten entfernt.
space: Das Wrangelkiez in Kreuzberg ist super angesagt, beliebt und alle coolen Events/Bars/Clubs befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe. Trotzdem lebe ich an einem ruhigen Fleckchen Kreuzbergs (Gott sei Dank) und putze die Wohnung täglich. Gerne darf die Waschmaschine mitbenutzt werden. Ich achte auf gepflegte Gäste, die meine Wohnung mit Respekt behandeln. Ich hatte leider bereits schlechte Erfahrungen und tendiere generell dazu, junge Backpacker abzulehnen! Die Berlin Wall ist innerhalb wenig Gehminuten zu Fuß zu erreichen, die Spree liegt ebenfalls in unmittelbarer Fußnähe mit einladenden Restaurants, Brücken, Ausblicken.

host_about:
Hallo:)
ich bin Bobby, 33 Jahre alt und bin in Berlin geboren und aufgewachsen. Zusammen mit meiner Schwester biete ich euch meine moderne Wohnung an. 

Derzeit lebe ich im Stadtteil Steglitz. Dies ist ein Stadteil, der mit der größten Einkaufsstraße Berlins (Schlossstraße) und der nähe zum Bezirk Zehlendorf, eine perfekte Mischung aus ruhigen Örtlichkeiten, sowie belebten Gebieten schafft.

Ich freue mich stets neue Menschen aus unterschiedlichsten Kulturen und Ländern begrüßen zu dürfen!
